title: Fury
synopsis: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

title: Sonchiriya
synopsis: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

title: Johnny Gaddaar
synopsis: Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.

title: Ugly
synopsis: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

title: Juzni vetar
synopsis: A young member of an underground gang in Belgrade puts himself and his family in danger when he crosses a mafia leader who works for the chief of police.

title: Manam
synopsis: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.

title: Klass
synopsis: An average Estonian high-schooler decides to defend his bullied classmate. This starts war between him and the informal leader of the class. As teenagers' honour is a touchy thing, everything ends in bloodshed.

title: Avaze gonjeshk-ha
synopsis: When an ostrich-rancher focuses on replacing his daughter's hearing aid, which breaks right before crucial exams, everything changes for a struggling rural family in Iran. Karim motorbikes ... See full summary »

title: Wheels
synopsis: Two suicidal paraplegic junkies hustle their way through the city streets trying to find a reason to live.

title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
synopsis: Feature adaptation of the animated short film interviewing a mollusk named Marcel.

title: The Train
synopsis: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
synopsis: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

title: Gekijouban Jujutsu Kaisen 0
synopsis: Yuta Okkotsu, a high schooler who gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.

title: The Devils
synopsis: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier's protection of the city of Loudun from the corrupt Cardinal Richelieu is undermined by a sexually-repressed nun's accusation of witchcraft.

title: Cet obscur objet du désir
synopsis: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

title: The Music Man
synopsis: Traveling con artist Harold Hill targets the naïve residents of a small town in 1910s Iowa by posing as a boys' band leader to raise money before he can skip town.

title: Hud
synopsis: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

title: Imitation of Life
synopsis: An aspiring white actress takes in an African-American widow whose mixed-race daughter is desperate to be seen as white.

title: Johnny Got His Gun
synopsis: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

title: Babettes gæstebud
synopsis: During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.

title: Au hasard Balthazar
synopsis: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

title: Playtime
synopsis: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

title: Yin shi nan nu
synopsis: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
synopsis: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in an inhumanely grueling dance marathon.

title: Seven Days in May
synopsis: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

title: Days of Wine and Roses
synopsis: An alcoholic marries a young woman and systematically addicts her to booze so that they can share his "passion" together.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
synopsis: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

title: Scarlet Street
synopsis: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

title: The Court Jester
synopsis: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful King.

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
synopsis: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

title: Metri shesh va nim
synopsis: The police are after a drug lord named Naser Khakzad, but when they finally manage to catch him, he tries whatever he can think of to escape and save his family.

title: The Children's Hour
synopsis: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.

title: El abrazo de la serpiente
synopsis: The story of the relationship between Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and last survivor of his people, and two scientists who work together over the course of forty years to search the Amazon for a sacred healing plant.

title: Brat
synopsis: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

title: La ciociara
synopsis: In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

title: Berserk: Ougon jidai-hen III - Kourin
synopsis: A year has passed since Guts parted ways with Griffith. The Band of the Hawk is plotting a rescue mission to save Griffith who is confined to prison.

title: Systemsprenger
synopsis: On her wild quest for love, 9-year-old Benni's untamed energy drives everyone around her to despair.

title: Becket
synopsis: King Henry II of England comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant Thomas Becket, who finds his true honor by observing God's divine will rather than the King's.

title: Oliver Twist
synopsis: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
synopsis: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Tystnaden
synopsis: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

title: Pelle erobreren
synopsis: When his wife dies, Lasse takes his 12-year-old son, Pelle, from their home in Sweden to Denmark in search of a better life.

title: The Servant
synopsis: Upper-class Tony hires servant Hugo Barrett, who turns out to have a hidden agenda.

title: Boruto: Naruto the Movie
synopsis: It's been some years since the end of the Shinobi War. Naruto Uzumaki is the 7th Hokage of Konohagakure, in this new era. His son, Boruto Uzumaki, will soon enter the Chûnin exams, alongside Sarada Uchiha and the mysterious Mitsuki.

title: Shi
synopsis: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.

title: Ernest et Célestine
synopsis: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

title: El espíritu de la colmena
synopsis: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

title: Stranger: Mukô hadan
synopsis: A swordsman from a strange land is caught in a struggle between morality, righteousness, and devotion as he reluctantly agrees to take a raggedy boy and his dog to a remote, Buddhist temple.

title: 'Breaker' Morant
synopsis: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.

title: Birdman of Alcatraz
synopsis: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

title: I vitelloni
synopsis: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

title: Die Büchse der Pandora
synopsis: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

title: Hotarubi no mori e
synopsis: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.

title: Ma nuit chez Maud
synopsis: A devout Catholic man's rigid principles are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

title: Kono sekai no katasumi ni
synopsis: Set in Hiroshima during World War II, an eighteen-year-old girl gets married and now has to prepare food for her family despite the rationing and lack of supplies. As she struggles with the... See full summary »

title: The Bad and the Beautiful
synopsis: An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.

title: Utomlennye solntsem
synopsis: In the Soviet Union in 1936, shadow of Stalin's repressions lie on a famous revolution hero. The accusations of being him a foreign spy are nonsense, and all known that, but a slow process of his life's downfall is already running.

title: Stroszek
synopsis: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.

title: Journal d'un curé de campagne
synopsis: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

title: Ninotchka
synopsis: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: Popiól i diament
synopsis: As WWII and the German occupation ends, the Polish resistance and the Russian forces turn on each other in an attempt to take over leadership in Communist Poland.

title: Nora inu
synopsis: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

title: Le fantôme de la liberté
synopsis: A series of surreal sequences that critique morality and society in a stream of consciousness style.

title: L'Atalante
synopsis: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

title: Kader
synopsis: Bekir loves Ugur, who loves Zagor, who is about to get out of jail. An already tense love triangle is thrown into turmoil on a hot summer night, when Zagor kills someone, and Ugur disappears.

title: El hijo de la novia
synopsis: A dissatisfied 40-year-old, separated and without time for his own daughter and girlfriend must rethink his life when his father decides to marry his mother, who suffers from Alzheimer's disease, by church.

title: Monsieur Verdoux
synopsis: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

title: Interstella 5555: The 5tory of the 5ecret 5tar 5ystem
synopsis: A continuation of the story told in the Daft Punk music videos "One More Time," "Aerodynamic," "Digital Love," and "Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger."

title: Germania anno zero
synopsis: A young German boy faces the problems of the tough life in the immediate post-WWII Berlin.

title: Ostrov
synopsis: Somewhere in Northern Russia in a small Russian Orthodox monastery lives an unusual man whose bizarre conduct confuses his fellow monks, while others who visit the island believe that the man has the power to heal, exorcise demons and foretell the future.

title: Bang Bang You're Dead
synopsis: Trevor is a troubled high school student, thanks to the effects of bullying. This is the story of his fight to break free.

title: Our Hospitality
synopsis: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

title: Moartea domnului Lazarescu
synopsis: Mr. Lãzãrescu, a dying old man, is shuttled from hospital to hospital by a loyal paramedic as doctors refuse to operate and no one can agree on a diagnosis.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

title: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
synopsis: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

title: Wo de fu qin mu qin
synopsis: Prompted by the death of his father and the grief of his mother, a man recalls the story of how they met in flashback.

title: Goodachari
synopsis: A young NSA agent is framed for the murder of his bosses making him realize that now his mission is darker than expected and has some personal scores to settle regarding his father's death, a former NSA agent.

title: Lakshya
synopsis: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

title: Kabadayi
synopsis: Ali Osman is living a quiet life after years of struggle, and tears. And he is slowly slipping into dementia. He made his peace with the horrible life he had and waiting for his final day ... See full summary »

title: Joji
synopsis: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

title: Seven Chances
synopsis: A man learns that he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7PM that evening.

title: Le corbeau
synopsis: A French village doctor becomes the target of poison-pen letters sent to village leaders, accusing him of affairs and practicing abortion.

title: Sen Aydinlatirsin Geceyi
synopsis: In a small Anatolian town, life goes on; Cemal is an assistant referee in football matches, Yasemin works in an egg factory, Defne is a street vendor who sells books, Doctor Irfan is ... See full summary »

title: Gönül Yarasi
synopsis: A single mother with a child meets a retired teacher who tries to keep pace with his new life and to protect them from her ex-husband.

title: Itirazim Var
synopsis: There is a murder while at prayer. Selman Bulut, the imam of mosque, starts to investigate the murder and faces with people in the neighborhood.

title: Nayak: The Real Hero
synopsis: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

title: Gangaajal
synopsis: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.

title: Argentina, 1985
synopsis: A team of lawyers takes on the heads of Argentina's bloody military dictatorship during the 1980s in a battle against odds and a race against time.

title: The Teacher
synopsis: Follows Amala, whose seemingly perfect life is turned upside down after a scandalous video involving her goes viral, becoming a social pariah, but she fights on her own to try to get out of the hole.

title: What's Up, Doc?
synopsis: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

title: Waterloo Bridge
synopsis: Myra and Roy meet and fall in love on Waterloo Bridge during an air raid. Their love will be one of the war's unspoken casualties.

title: Chup
synopsis: A psychopath killer, targeting film critics. The film is a fast-paced thriller that raises many questions of the ethics of criticism.

title: Werk ohne Autor
synopsis: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

title: My Dinner with Andre
synopsis: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

title: Maurice
synopsis: After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.

title: Sorcerer
synopsis: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

title: Plein soleil
synopsis: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

title: The Women
synopsis: A study of the lives and romantic entanglements of various interconnected women.

title: 3 Women
synopsis: Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other an awkward teenager, share an increasingly bizarre relationship.

title: My Darling Clementine
synopsis: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

title: Breaking Away
synopsis: A working-class Indiana teen obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl while searching for life goals with his friends.

title: The Joy Luck Club
synopsis: The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

title: Wait Until Dark
synopsis: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

title: Marty
synopsis: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: The Awful Truth
synopsis: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

title: Shelter
synopsis: When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.

title: The Cure
synopsis: Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.

title: A Place in the Sun
synopsis: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

title: Il grande silenzio
synopsis: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

title: Splendor in the Grass
synopsis: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

title: The Castle
synopsis: A working-class family from Melbourne, Australia fights city hall after being told they must vacate their beloved family home to allow for infrastructural expansion.

title: How Green Was My Valley
synopsis: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

title: Missing
synopsis: When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

title: The Killers
synopsis: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

title: Magadheera
synopsis: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

title: Le doulos
synopsis: A burglar betraying other criminals, prepares for a big heist with a trusted friend that might be as untrustworthy as he.

title: A torinói ló
synopsis: A rural farmer is forced to confront the mortality of his faithful horse.

title: Mon oncle
synopsis: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.

title: A Thursday
synopsis: Naina, a playschool teacher, takes 16 students hostage. Rattling the police and the leaders, her demands send shockwaves through the country.

title: When the Wind Blows
synopsis: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

title: Bad Day at Black Rock
synopsis: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

title: Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages
synopsis: The story of a poor young woman separated by prejudice from her husband and baby is interwoven with tales of intolerance from throughout history.

title: Sergeant York
synopsis: A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I, and struggles with his pacifist inclinations before becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

title: L'eclisse
synopsis: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

title: Holiday
synopsis: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

title: Ball of Fire
synopsis: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia while living in a Manhattan mansion take in a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mob boss lover.

title: Boze Cialo
synopsis: Daniel experiences a spiritual transformation in a detention center. Although his criminal record prevents him from applying to the seminary, he has no intention of giving up his dream and decides to minister a small-town parish.

title: Mouchette
synopsis: A young girl living in the French countryside suffers constant indignities at the hand of alcoholism and her fellow man.

title: Tuntematon sotilas
synopsis: A film adaptation of Väinö Linna's best selling novel The Unknown Soldier (1954) and the novel's unedited manuscript version, Sotaromaani.

title: Nightmare Alley
synopsis: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

title: Sans toit ni loi
synopsis: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

title: L'année dernière à Marienbad
synopsis: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

title: Captain Blood
synopsis: After treating a Monmouth rebel against King James II in 1680s England, a young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

title: The Lady Eve
synopsis: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

title: Die Ehe der Maria Braun
synopsis: Maria marries Hermann Braun in the last days of World War II, only for him to go missing in the war. Alone, Maria puts to use her beauty and ambition in order to find prosperity during Germany's "economic miracle" of the 1950s.

title: L'ours
synopsis: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

title: Top Hat
synopsis: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

title: Twelve O'Clock High
synopsis: A hard-as-nails general (Gregory Peck as General Savage) takes over a B-17 bomber unit suffering from low morale and whips them into fighting shape.

title: Les demoiselles de Rochefort
synopsis: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

title: Aile Arasinda
synopsis: Life of a singer, her daughter and her friends change when they meet with a divorced man.

title: La historia oficial
synopsis: During the final months of Argentinian Military Dictatorship in 1983, a high school teacher sets out to find out who the mother of her adopted daughter is.

title: Mephisto
synopsis: In early-1930s Germany, a passionate stage actor finds himself before a dilemma: renounce his apolitical stance and comply with the Reich's doctrine, or face oblivion. But, Faustian bargains never end well. What is the price of success?

title: Der blaue Engel
synopsis: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

title: Bheeshmaparvam
synopsis: Michael helms his ancestral family in Kochi, inspiring fear and respect through his past. When a few younger members of the household find his power over their lives too aggravating, they join hands with foes to clamp down on him.

title: Elmer Gantry
synopsis: A fast-talking traveling salesman with a charming, loquacious manner convinces a sincere evangelist that he can be an effective preacher for her cause.

title: The Gunfighter
synopsis: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

title: Odd Man Out
synopsis: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

title: Que Horas Ela Volta?
synopsis: When the estranged daughter of a hard-working live-in housekeeper suddenly appears, the unspoken class barriers that exist within the home are thrown into disarray.

title: Sommarnattens leende
synopsis: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

title: Il vangelo secondo Matteo
synopsis: The life of Jesus Christ according to the Gospel of Matthew. Pasolini shows Christ as a Marxist avant-la-lettre and therefore uses half of the text of Matthew.

title: Przypadek
synopsis: Witek runs after a train. Three variations follow on how such a seemingly banal incident could influence the rest of Witek's life.

title: Shyam Singha Roy
synopsis: Centers in the theme of reincarnation, unfolding in Kolkata and Hyderabad.

title: Berserk: Ougon jidai-hen II - Dorudorei koryaku
synopsis: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.

title: Kikujirô no natsu
synopsis: A young, naive boy sets out alone on the road to find his wayward mother. Soon he finds an unlikely protector in a crotchety man and the two have a series of unexpected adventures along the way.

title: Nanban
synopsis: 10 years after leaving college, two best friends and their rival go on a search for their third friend, while finding out some truths along the way.

title: Dear Frankie
synopsis: After having responded to her son's numerous letters in the guise of his father, a woman hires a stranger to pose as his dad when meeting him.

title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
synopsis: A dreamer falls for a girl who is in love with someone else and tries to create a rift between her and the man she loves.

title: A Letter to Three Wives
synopsis: A letter is addressed to three wives from their "best friend" Addie Ross, announcing that she is running away with one of their husbands - but she does not say which one.

title: Kelebegin Rüyasi
synopsis: In a small Turkish town, two young tuberculous poets try to survive while publishing their poems. As they both fall in love, their life would never be the same.

title: Ivan Groznyy
synopsis: During the early part of his reign, Ivan the Terrible faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.

title: Nanjing! Nanjing!
synopsis: In 1937, Japan occupied Nanjing, the Chinese capital. There was a battle and subsequent atrocities against the inhabitants, especially those who took refuge in the International Security Zone.

title: O-jik geu-dae-man
synopsis: A love story centered on ex-boxer Chul-min and a blind telemarketer Jung-hwa.

title: Shall we dansu?
synopsis: A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

title: Three Wishes for Cinderella
synopsis: Life changes dramatically for a Czech housemaid when the chauffeur gives her three magical hazelnuts.

title: Yoidore tenshi
synopsis: A drunken doctor with a hot temper and a violence-prone gangster with tuberculosis form a quicksilver bond.

title: Sibirskiy tsiryulnik
synopsis: At the turn of the century, a young Russian cadet falls in love with an American beauty, endangering his career and even their lives.

title: Im Juli
synopsis: A young, insecure teacher embarks on a journey through Europe to Turkey, where he wants to see a woman again whom he believes to be his fate.

title: Machuca
synopsis: Two 12-year-old Chilean children from different social classes become friends in 1973. They both discover each other's world as political tensions in their country increase.

title: Jeder für sich und Gott gegen alle
synopsis: A young man named Kaspar Hauser suddenly appears in Nuremberg in 1828, barely able to talk or walk, and bearing a strange note.

title: Kolja
synopsis: A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires and leaves him with a pint-sized new roommate.

title: Guru
synopsis: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

title: Mr. India
synopsis: A poor but big-hearted man takes orphans into his home. After discovering his scientist father's invisibility device, he rises to the occasion and fights to save his children and all of India from the clutches of a megalomaniac.

title: Inside I'm Dancing
synopsis: When the kinetic Rory moves into his room in the Carrigmore Residential Home for the Disabled, his effect on the home is immediate. Most telling is his friendship with Michael, a young man with cerebral palsy and nearly unintelligible speech. Somehow, Rory understands Michael, and encourages him to experience life outside the confines of home.

title: Geetha Govindam
synopsis: An innocent young lecturer is misunderstood as a pervert and despised by a woman who co-incidentally turns out to be the younger sister of his brother-in-law. Eventually differences subside and love blooms between them.

title: Karakter

title: Chaharshanbe-soori

Rouhi, spending her first day at a new job, finds herself in the midst of a different kind of fireworks -- a domestic dispute between her new boss and his wife.

title: Mankatha

title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!

title: Brat 2

title: Water

title: Rock On!!
synopsis: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

title: Tabutta Rövasata
synopsis: Mahsun is homeless and unemployed. He lives in Rumelihisari (one of the most picturesque and oldest quarters of Istanbul), and tries to stay alive with the help of local fishermen. Mahsun ... See full summary »

title: Don
synopsis: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.

title: Nerkonda Paarvai
synopsis: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

title: Miss Lovely

title: A Man Called Otto

synopsis: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live a life of his own.

title: Jeanne Dielman 23,Quai du Commerce 1080 Bruxelles

title: Mass

title: Le souffle au coeur

title: The Sand Pebbles

title: 3:10 to Yuma

title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
synopsis: Instead of coming in from the Cold War, British agent Alec Leamas chooses to face another mission.

title: Le procès
synopsis: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

title: The Swimmer
synopsis: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

title: The Night of the Iguana

title: Wings

title: The Defiant Ones
synopsis: Two chained-together escaped convicts, white and Black, must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

title: Sorry We Missed You

title: Scum
synopsis: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the '70s.

title: Leave Her to Heaven

title: Europa

title: Seconds

title: Shiddat

title: Shurayukihime

title: Winchester '73

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
synopsis: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

title: El infierno

title: The Naked City

title: The Public Enemy

title: The Last: Naruto the Movie

title: Mister Roberts

title: Mrs. Miniver
synopsis: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: Lenny

title: The Woman in the Window
synopsis: When a conservative middle aged professor engages in a relationship with a femme fatale, he's plunged into a nightmarish world of blackmail and murder.

title: Maudie

title: Mutiny on the Bounty

title: Wandafuru raifu

title: Lost Horizon

title: All That Heaven Allows

title: Mai wei

title: Hamlet
synopsis: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.

title: Europa Europa
synopsis: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
synopsis: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.

title: The Bishop's Wife
synopsis: A debonair angel comes to Earth to help an Episcopalian bishop and his wife in their quest to raise money for the new church.

title: Mucize
synopsis: 1960s Turkey countryside. A newly assigned teacher finds out that the solitary village is missing a school. He gets fond of the village people and especially a disabled man. The teacher ... See full summary »

title: Dead of Night

title: Only Angels Have Wings
synopsis: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air-freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract as a traveling American showgirl stops in town.

title: Shao Lin san shi liu fang
synopsis: A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.

title: Baisers volés
synopsis: After being discharged from the army, Antoine Doinel centers a screwball comedy where he applies for different jobs and tries to make sense of his relationships with women.

title: Bakemono no ko

synopsis: Alex, who's homeless and addicted to alcohol, and Michèle, who's losing her sight, form a relationship while sleeping rough on Paris's Pont-Neuf bridge.

Thrown into a world where greed and injustice rule all, Bilal finds the courage to raise his voice and make a change. Inspired by true events, this is a story of a real hero who earned his remembrance in time and history.

title: Johnny Guitar

synopsis: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

title: Un coeur en hiver
synopsis: Stéphane is an emotionally distant but professionally dedicated violin restorer whose cold heart is tested when his employer's new girlfriend, a beautiful violinist, falls for him.

title: Müslüm
synopsis: A biopic about turkish vocal artist Müslüm Gürses, drama, childhood, his life.

title: The Letter
synopsis: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

title: Destry Rides Again
synopsis: Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.

title: Bob le flambeur
synopsis: After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.

title: The Pride of the Yankees
synopsis: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

title: Pickup on South Street
synopsis: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

title: Gun Crazy
synopsis: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

title: Sharmaji Namkeen
synopsis: A light-hearted coming-of-age story of a lovable 60-year-old-man.

title: Karwaan
synopsis: Two friends and a chirpy teenager take a road trip from Bangalore to Kochi.

title: Una pura formalità
synopsis: Onoff is a famous writer who hasn't published any new books for quite some time and has become a recluse. When he is picked up by the police one stormy night, without any identification, ... See full summary »

title: Darr
synopsis: A woman plans to marry a navy officer but she is also the object of another man's obsession.

title: Na xie nian, wo men yi qi zhui de nu hai
synopsis: A group of close friends who attend a private school all have a debilitating crush on the sunny star pupil, Shen Jiayi. The only member of the group who claims not to is Ke Jingteng, but he ends up loving her as well.

synopsis: A group of indomitable Gauls are challenged by Roman Emperor Julius Caesar to accomplish twelve impossible tasks.

title: Mahaan
synopsis: Gandhi Mahaan, a school teacher, is abandoned by his family after he decides to live a life of his own, with personal freedom.

title: Newton

synopsis: After an emotional exchange between a Lebanese Christian and a Palestinian refugee escalates, the men end up in a court case that gets national attention.

synopsis: An apprentice train dispatcher at a village station seeks his first sexual encounter and becomes despondent when he is unable to perform.

title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
synopsis: Ashwat Raina and his teammates arrive in Pokhran to re-conduct a confidential nuclear test, where they face challenges from the American Lacrosse satellite and local spies.

synopsis: A Catholic Priest and an English teacher get stranded in a school in Kigali during the 1994 Rwandan genocide.

title: Agir Roman
synopsis: A young car mechanic, while in the middle of an unlikely love affair, tries to protect the people in his poor gypsy neighborhood from a gangster who terrorizes the locals.

title: Dag

title: Dragon Ball Z: Fukkatsu no Fusion!! Gokuu to Vegeta
synopsis: The universe is thrown into dimensional chaos as the dead come back to life. Now Goku and Vegeta must track down the cause of this uproar.

title: Il y a longtemps que je t'aime
synopsis: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.

title: Madras Cafe
synopsis: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

title: Ansiktet
synopsis: A traveling magician and his assistants are persecuted by authorities in Sweden of the 19th century. Their capture, however, didn't bring victory to those in power.

title: Madaari

title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of a chemist, a detective uncovers a larger conspiracy to unsettle Calcutta.

title: Neerja

title: The Navigator
synopsis: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

title: Hungama
synopsis: The story of a bunch of misfits whose misconception about each others backgrounds end up in a series of chaotic, yet comic outcomes.
Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.

title: Ayan
synopsis: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.

title: O Homem Que Copiava
synopsis: A Brazilian photocopier operator falls in love with a girl who lives in an opposite house and spends his evenings looking at her through his binoculars.

title: Aamir
synopsis: A doctor of Indian origin returning to Mumbai from London is forced to participate in a terrorist plot.

title: Bheja Fry
synopsis: Ranjit, who makes fun of idiots, gets completely annoyed when he invites a tax inspector and a singer to his house.

title: Irudhi Suttru

title: Bhediya

title: Ballon

title: Elle s'appelait Sarah

title: Die Blechtrommel
synopsis: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

title: Wuthering Heights
synopsis: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.

title: Santa Sangre

title: Freier Fall

title: Foreign Correspondent
synopsis: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

title: Fresh
synopsis: Death and violence anger a twelve-year-old drug courier, who sets his employers against each other.

title: Adam's Rib
synopsis: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

title: Sinsegye
synopsis: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.

title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte

title: Professione: reporter
synopsis: Unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, a frustrated war correspondent takes the risky path of co-opting the identity of a dead arms-deal acquaintance.

title: Noises Off...
synopsis: A travelling theater group find so much action going on behind-the-scenes, they almost ruin the performances.

title: Memorîzu
synopsis: An animated science fiction anthology from the visionary anime director, Katsuhiro Otomo.

title: Lilies of the Field
synopsis: A travelling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
synopsis: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

title: High Sierra
synopsis: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.

title: Cyrano de Bergerac

title: Umimachi Diary
synopsis: A story that revolves around three sisters who live in their grandmother's home and the arrival of their thirteen-year-old half sister.

title: Support Your Local Sheriff!

title: Kaybedenler Kulübü
synopsis: Kaan and Mete, co-hosts of a mid 1990s radio show called Kaybedenler Kulübü (Losers' Club), struggle to deal with their daily lives after their show becomes an instant hit. Kaan meets ... See full summary »

title: Berserk: Ougon Jidai-hen I - Haou no Tamago
synopsis: A lone sellsword named Guts gets recruited into a mercenary band and attempts to help the Band's leader, Griffith, on his rise to power.

title: The Collector
synopsis: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there.

title: Suddenly, Last Summer
synopsis: A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.

title: Lucifer

title: Lazzaro felice
synopsis: An unceasingly kind Italian peasant and his family are blatantly exploited by a tobacco baroness.

title: Sunshine

title: Living in Oblivion

title: The Phantom of the Opera
synopsis: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

title: The Namesake

title: Sonatine

title: Frantz

title: Blinkende lygter

title: Charley Varrick
