title: La vita davanti a sé
synopsis: In seaside Italy, a Holocaust survivor with a daycare business takes in a 12-year-old street kid who recently robbed her.

title: Juste la fin du monde
synopsis: Louis (Gaspard Ulliel), a terminally ill writer, returns home after a long absence to tell his family that he is dying.

title: Veronica Guerin
synopsis: An Irish journalist writes a series of stories about drug dealers.

title: A Perfect Day
synopsis: A group of aid workers work to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone.

title: She's Gotta Have It
synopsis: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

title: To Be or Not to Be
synopsis: At the onset of WW2, a Polish actor's family and the Polish Resistance help the troupe of a theatre escape Poland and the invading Nazis.

title: Dreamer: Inspired by a True Story
synopsis: Cale Crane catalyzes the rescue and rehabilitation of Sonador, a race horse with a broken leg.

title: The Wild Geese
synopsis: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

title: Rooster Cogburn
synopsis: Marshal Rooster Cogburn unwillingly teams up with Eula Goodnight to track down her father's murderers.

title: Dolphin Tale
synopsis: A story centered on the friendship between a boy and a dolphin whose tail was lost in a crab trap.

title: Night Train to Lisbon
synopsis: Swiss Professor Raimund Gregorius (Jeremy Irons) abandons his lectures and buttoned-down life to embark on a thrilling adventure that will take him on a journey to the very heart of himself.

title: Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui
synopsis: Manu, a bodybuilder from Chandigarh, India, falls in love with Maanvi, a Zumba teacher. All seems well until a revelation causes turmoil in their love story.

title: Attack
synopsis: Witness the rise of an army soldier as he realizes his destiny and comes to terms to becoming India's first super soldier created to combat terrorists as he fights his inner demons and outer enemies.With lots of action

title: Tengo ganas de ti
synopsis: The sequel of Three Meters Above The Sky, starts with the return of H to his hometown where reconnecting with the past means struggle and also a new love.

title: La ragazza nella nebbia
synopsis: Special agent Vogel is sent to an isolated town in a remote mountain valley to investigate the case of a sixteen years old's disappearance.

title: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
synopsis: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from real noirs appear as scenes from various films are intercut.

title: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
synopsis: When an alien with amazing powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the intergalactic visitor home before a sinister organization can capture her.

title: One Chance
synopsis: The true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night who became a phenomenon after being chosen for -- and ultimately winning -- Britain's Got Talent (2007).

title: Heaven & Earth
synopsis: During the Vietnam War, a Vietnamese woman struggles hustling on the streets, where she comes face to face with those involved in the conflict around her.

title: The History Boys
synopsis: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

title: Ink
synopsis: A mysterious creature, known as Ink, steals a child's soul in hopes of using it as a bargaining chip to join the Incubi - the group of supernatural beings responsible for creating nightmares.

title: Red Road
synopsis: Jackie works as a CCTV operator. Each day she watches over a small part of the world, protecting the people living their lives under her gaze. One day a man appears on her monitor, a man she thought she would never see again, a man she never wanted to see again. Now she has no choice, she is compelled to confront him.

title: Patti Cake$
synopsis: PATTI CAKE$ is centered on aspiring rapper Patricia Dombrowski, a.k.a. Killa P, a.k.a. Patti Cake$, who is fighting an unlikely quest for glory in her downtrodden hometown in New Jersey.

title: An Ideal Husband
synopsis: London 1895: Cabinet minister, Sir Chiltern, and bachelor, Lord Goring, are victims of scheming women.

title: Flashbacks of a Fool
synopsis: A fading Hollywood star looks back at the days of his youth as he returns home from his best friend's funeral.

title: Cemetery Junction
synopsis: A 1970s-set comedy centered on three young working class friends in a dreary suburb of Reading.

title: Puncture
synopsis: A David and Goliath law drama about a drug-addicted lawyer who takes on a health supply corporation while battling his own personal demons.

title: Kafka
synopsis: Kafka works during the day at an insurance company, where events lead him to discover a mysterious underground society with strange suppressive goals.

title: Music of the Heart
synopsis: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids.

title: Love Aaj Kal
synopsis: An old-fashioned romantic tells his personal love story to a modern man who has just broken up with his girlfriend. Has love really ever changed?

title: Meari to majo no hana
synopsis: Based on "The Little Broomstick" by Mary Stewart, a strange flower grants a girl magic powers.

title: Autoreiji
synopsis: The boss of a major crime syndicate orders his lieutenant to bring a rogue gang of drug traffickers in line, a job that gets passed on to his long-suffering subordinate.

title: Storytelling
synopsis: College and high school serve as the backdrop for two stories about dysfunction and personal turmoil.

title: The Nativity Story
synopsis: A drama that focuses on the period in Mary and Joseph's life where they journeyed to Bethlehem for the birth of Jesus.

title: The War Wagon
synopsis: The story of a man who was shot, robbed and imprisoned who returns to steal a large gold shipment from the man who wronged him. The gold is transported in an armored stage coach, the War Wagon.

title: Mou gaan dou III: Jung gik mou gaan
synopsis: Months after the events of the original film, Ming suspects a police superintendent as being a new mole for the triads, while years earlier, Yan embarks on his first mission.

title: New York
synopsis: A contemporary story of 3 friends discovering a new world set against the larger than life New York City. But one day the world around them changed.

title: My Life
synopsis: A terminally ill man prepares for his death.

title: Populaire
synopsis: 1958. Rose is a terrible secretary but a demon typist. Her handsome boss resolves to turn her into the fastest girl in the world.

title: Suchîmubôi
synopsis: In 1860s Britain, a boy inventor finds himself caught in the middle of a deadly conflict over a revolutionary advance in steam power.

title: Big Bad Wolves
synopsis: After a little girl is brutally murdered, a suspect avoids arrest due to lack of evidence. Working separately, her father and a cop decide to do something about it.

title: Xin shao lin si
synopsis: After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation.

title: OSS 117: Rio ne répond plus
synopsis: Another mission of world-known French secret agent leads him to exotic Brazil.

title: Jalla! Jalla!
synopsis: Roro, a foreign worker in Swedish parks, loves his girlfriend and wants to marry her, but he is about to marry another girl to prevent her from being sent back to her homeland, Lebanon. ... See full summary »

title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Him
synopsis: Told from the male perspective, the story of a couple trying to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

title: Baadshah
synopsis: A small time detective is mistaken as a CBI agent and gets embroiled in a deadly mission to save the Chief Minister from an assassination attempt.

title: Karan Arjun
synopsis: Karan and Arjun reincarnate in the different parts of the country. But the faith of their previous mother brings them together in order to avenge their death.

title: Young and Innocent
synopsis: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.

title: Good Newwz
synopsis: Two couples with the same surnames pursue in-vitro fertilization and wait for their upcoming babies. Trouble ensues when they find that the sperms of each couple have been mixed with each other.

title: Mammoth
synopsis: While on a trip to Thailand, a successful American businessman tries to radically change his life. Back in New York, his wife and daughter find their relationship with their live-in Filipino maid changing around them. At the same time, in the Philippines, the maid's family struggles to deal with her absence.

title: Le sens de la fête
synopsis: A hectic wedding party held in an 17th century French palace comes together with the help of the behind-the-scenes staff.

title: The Reluctant Fundamentalist
synopsis: A young Pakistani man chasing corporate success on Wall Street finds himself embroiled in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis, and the enduring call of his family's homeland.

title: Paris
synopsis: A ex-dancer has a heart problem and even with a transplant, he may still only have a few months to live. Time's spent looking at people/life in Paris from his balcony. His single mom sister moves in with her 3 kids to look after him.

title: Singham
synopsis: A truly honest police officer is transferred to a town controlled by a gangster he has humiliated. The gangster believes he can use good power to bring down this officer who made him look foolish and weak.

title: Hasee Toh Phasee
synopsis: Nikhil is re-introduced to Meeta nearly ten years after their first meeting. Now, as Nikhil has one week to prove himself worth enough to marry Meeta's sister Karishma, the old acquaintances become quite close to each other.

title: Mary Kom
synopsis: A chronicle of the life of Indian boxer Mary Kom, who went through several hardships before audaciously accomplishing her ultimate dream.

title: Snow Angels
synopsis: A drama that interweaves the life of a teenager, with his old baby sitter, her estranged husband, and their daughter.

title: Cookie's Fortune
synopsis: Conflict arises in the small town of Holly Springs when an old woman's death causes a variety of reactions among family and friends.

title: Torrente, el brazo tonto de la ley
synopsis: José Luis Torrente, a former policeman fights against the oriental mafia in Madrid.

title: Issiz Adam
synopsis: Tells about those people whose lives have been isolated by modern lifestyles; It is also Foods, mothers, old songs and love that this movie is consists of.

title: People Places Things
synopsis: Will Henry is a newly single graphic novelist balancing parenting his young twin daughters and a classroom full of students while exploring and navigating the rich complexities of new love and letting go of the woman who left him.

title: À bout portant
synopsis: Samuel, a male nurse, saves the life of a thief whose henchmen take Samuel's wife hostage and force him to spring their boss.

title: Intacto
synopsis: In a world where luck can be taken from a lucky person by a luckier person's touch, a small group of lucky people compete to be the luckiest and for the other contestants' luck.

title: Neruda
synopsis: An inspector hunts down Nobel Prize-winning Chilean poet, Pablo Neruda, who becomes a fugitive in his home country in the late 1940s for joining the Communist Party.

title: Fifty Dead Men Walking
synopsis: Martin McGartland joins the I.R.A. and feeds information to Britain's Special Branch Agent Fergus.

title: Les émotifs anonymes
synopsis: Jean-René, owner of a chocolate factory, and Angélique, a talented chocolate maker, are too shy to admit their love for each other. Will they come together thanks to their common passion?

title: Sherni
synopsis: An upright Forest Officer who strives for balance in a world of man-animal conflict while she also seeks her true calling in a hostile environment.

title: Interview
synopsis: After falling out with his editor, a fading political journalist is forced to interview America's most popular soap actress.

title: Azumi
synopsis: Raised to deal in cold blooded death, the teenage assassin girl Azumi must defeat three evil warlords while also battling her own heart.

title: Lymelife
synopsis: A family unit begins to bow under the pressure of a failing marriage.

title: Ishq
synopsis: Two rich friends, hating the poor, were challenged by their children's love lives. Thus starts the war between love and money.

title: Tanu Weds Manu
synopsis: Manu comes to India to find a bride and falls for Tanu at first sight, but free-spirited Tanu has no plan to marry him.

title: The Boys Are Back
synopsis: A sports writer becomes a single parent in tragic circumstances.

title: Shinobi
synopsis: Star-crossed lovers must fight on opposing sides in a battle that will determine the next Shogun.

title: Devotion
synopsis: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War and become some of the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.

title: Slumberland
synopsis: A young girl discovers a secret map to the dreamworld of Slumberland, and with the help of an eccentric outlaw, she traverses dreams and flees nightmares, with the hope that she will be able to see her late father again.

title: After Yang
synopsis: In a near future, a family reckons with questions of love, connection, and loss after their A.I. helper unexpectedly breaks down.

title: Benedetta
synopsis: A 17th-century nun in Italy suffers from disturbing religious and erotic visions. She is assisted by a companion, and the relationship between the two women develops into a romantic love affair.

title: Denial
synopsis: Acclaimed writer and historian Deborah E. Lipstadt must battle for historical truth to prove the Holocaust actually occurred when David Irving, a renowned denier, sues her for libel.

title: Doctor G
synopsis: Uday Gupta finds himself as the lone male resident in the Gynaecology department. His reluctance leads to chaos, confusion, comedy and eventually, great camaraderie with his fellow classmates.

title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
synopsis: A pair of interwoven stories set in the past and present follow an ambitious journalist determined to solve the mystery of a forbidden love affair at the center of a trove of secret love letters from 1965.

title: Fire Island
synopsis: A group of queer best friends gather in Fire Island Pines for their annual week of love and laughter, but a sudden change of events might make this their last summer in gay paradise.

title: Streets of Fire
synopsis: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

title: Rio Lobo
synopsis: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the two traitors whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

title: Heaven's Gate
synopsis: During the Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, a sheriff born into wealth does his best to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

title: Colette
synopsis: Colette is pushed by her husband to write novels under his name. Upon their success, she fights to make her talents known, challenging gender norms.

title: Vivo
synopsis: Vivo, Sony Pictures Animation's first-ever musical adventure featuring all-new original songs from Lin-Manuel Miranda, will take audiences on an epic adventure to gorgeous and vibrant locations never before seen in animation.

title: The Best Man
synopsis: Just before his best friend's wedding, the life of a Chicago writer becomes crazy when his best friend guesses that his new book's story is based on his bride's fervent past.

title: My Summer of Love
synopsis: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

title: The Valet
synopsis: A movie star enlists a parking valet at a Beverly Hills restaurant to pose as her lover to cover for her relationship with a married man.

title: A Christmas Story Christmas
synopsis: Follows the now-adult Ralphie as he returns to the house on Cleveland Street to give his kids a magical Christmas like the one he had as a child, reconnecting with childhood friends, and reconciling the passing of his Old Man.

title: Damage
synopsis: A member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's fiancée despite the dangers of discovery.

title: With Honors
synopsis: Convinced his thesis will have him graduate with honors from Harvard University, a stuffy student finds himself at the mercy of a homeless man's demands when he holds the papers hostage.

title: A Futile and Stupid Gesture
synopsis: In the 1970s and '80s, National Lampoon's success and influence creates a new media empire overseen in part by the brilliant and troubled Douglas Kenney.

title: Used Cars
synopsis: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

title: Ben Is Back
synopsis: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

title: Taps
synopsis: Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

title: Passing
synopsis: "Passing" follows the unexpected reunion of two high school friends, whose renewed acquaintance ignites a mutual obsession that threatens both of their carefully constructed realities.

title: Carrie Pilby
synopsis: A person of high intelligence struggles to make sense of the world as it relates to morality, relationships, sex, and leaving her apartment.

title: Kicking and Screaming
synopsis: A bunch of guys hang around their college for months after graduation, continuing a life much like the one before graduation.

title: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
synopsis: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.

title: Flesh+Blood
synopsis: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors - commoners.

title: Der goldene Handschuh
synopsis: A serial killer strikes fear in the hearts of residents of Hamburg during the early 1970s.

title: The Sugarland Express
synopsis: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

title: Midway
synopsis: A dramatization of the battle that was widely heralded as a turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.

title: Ballerina
synopsis: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera House.

title: The Kindergarten Teacher
synopsis: A kindergarten teacher in New York becomes obsessed with one of her students whom she believes is a child prodigy.

title: The Entity
synopsis: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

title: Night of the Creeps
synopsis: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

title: Wuthering Heights
synopsis: A man becomes obsessed with vengeance when his soul mate marries another man.

title: The Stepfather
synopsis: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

title: A Dog's Way Home
synopsis: A female dog travels four hundred miles in search of her owner throughout a Colorado wilderness.

title: Postcards from the Edge
synopsis: A substance-addicted actress tries to look on the bright side even as she is forced to move back in with her mother to avoid unemployment.

title: Yashoda
synopsis: In a highly regimented facility housing surrogate mothers, a pregnant woman discovers that things are not as they seem.

title: Albert Nobbs
synopsis: Albert Nobbs struggles to survive in late 19th-century Ireland, where women aren't encouraged to be independent. Posing as a man so she can work as a butler in Dublin's most elegant hotel, Albert meets a handsome painter and looks to escape the lie she has been living.

title: T-34
synopsis: SS Panzer Division uses T-34 manned by Soviet POWs as a target in their training field, but the prisoners plot a daring maneuver.

title: The Accidental Tourist
synopsis: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

title: Naissance des pieuvres
synopsis: After meeting at a local pool over their summer break, a love triangle forms between three adolescent girls, which proves difficult to sustain as they each desire the love of another.

title: A Boy Called Christmas
synopsis: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

title: Swing Kids
synopsis: A group of teens adores forbidden music in Nazi Germany just before the outbreak of World War II.

title: Their Finest
synopsis: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

title: Exodus
synopsis: The State of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

title: 8-Bit Christmas
synopsis: In 1980s Chicago, a 10-year-old sets out on a quest to get the Christmas gift of his generation: the latest and greatest video-game system.

title: Crossing Over
synopsis: Crossing Over is about illegal aliens of many nationalities in the Los Angeles area and the authorities and individuals dealing with them.

title: White Fang
synopsis: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

title: A Private War
synopsis: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
synopsis: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

title: Astérix: Le secret de la potion magique
synopsis: Getafix/Panoramix decides it's time to pass the magic potion recipe on to a young, trustworthy druid. He looks all over Gaul with Asterix and Obelix as Demonix is out to get the recipe.

title: The Last Man on Earth
synopsis: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

title: F/X
synopsis: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

title: Mugen no jûnin
synopsis: Cursed with a life of immortality, a samurai is tasked by a young girl to help avenge the death of her father. Based on the manga series by Hiroaki Samura.

title: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
synopsis: High-level demons collect low-level demons as warriors in attempt to obtain a key containing the blood of Christ. The key is guarded by immortal warriors called Demon Knights.

title: The War
synopsis: A Vietnam veteran helps his kids battle over a tree house while recovering from his traumatic war experience.

title: Cat Ballou
synopsis: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

title: Fever Pitch
synopsis: A sports fan's romantic courtship clashes with his obsession with his favorite football team.

title: Nakitai watashi wa neko o kaburu
synopsis: Miyo Sasaki is in love with her classmate Kento Hinode and tries repeatedly to get Kento's attention by transforming into a cat, but at some point, the boundary between herself and the cat becomes ambiguous.

title: Tallulah
synopsis: Desperate to be rid of her toddler, a dissatisfied Manhattan housewife hires a stranger to babysit and ends up getting much more than she bargained for.

title: The Children Act
synopsis: As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.

title: Snabba cash
synopsis: When JW becomes a drug runner in order to maintain his double life, his fate becomes tied to two other men: Jorge, a fugitive on the run from both the Serbian mafia and the police, and mafia enforcer Mrado, who is on the hunt for Jorge.

title: Hamlet
synopsis: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, finds out that his uncle Claudius killed his father to obtain the throne, and plans revenge.

title: Borgman
synopsis: A vagrant enters the lives of an arrogant upper-class family, turning their lives into a psychological nightmare in the process.

title: Starter for 10
synopsis: Set in 1985, working-class student Brian Jackson (McAvoy) navigates his first year at Bristol University.

title: Reign of the Supermen
synopsis: After the death of Superman, several new people present themselves as possible successors.

title: El fotógrafo de Mauthausen
synopsis: Based on real events, Francesc Boix is a Spaniard inmate in the Nazi concentration camp of Mauthausen in Austria who tries to save the evidences of the horrors committed inside its walls.

title: Rebel in the Rye
synopsis: The life of celebrated but reclusive author, J.D. Salinger, who gained worldwide fame with the publication of his novel, "The Catcher in the Rye".

title: Zulu
synopsis: Policemen Ali Sokhela and Brian Epkeen investigate the brutal murder of a young white woman, apparently provoked by the availability of a new illegal drug and somehow connected to the disappearance of black street children.

title: The Last Days of Disco
synopsis: Story of two female Manhattan book editors fresh out of college, both finding love and themselves while frequenting the local disco.

title: The Sheltering Sky
synopsis: An American couple travel abroad to revitalize their relationship. But as the trip drags on, their attempt at recovering what they once had seems futile.

title: Obsession
synopsis: A wealthy New Orleans businessman becomes obsessed with a young woman who resembles his wife.

title: War and Peace
synopsis: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia, including his disastrous 1812 invasion, serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

title: M. Butterfly
synopsis: In 1960s China, French diplomat Rene Gallimard falls in love with an opera singer, Song Liling - but Song is not at all who Gallimard thinks.

title: Xi you: Xiang mo pian
synopsis: Tang Sanzang, an aspiring Buddhist hero tries to protect a village from three demons. He develops complex feelings for Miss Duan, the demon hunter who repeatedly helps him, and finally quests to meet the legendary Monkey King.

title: Forbrydelsens element
synopsis: A cop in a dystopian Europe investigates a serial killings suspect using controversial methods written by his now disgraced former mentor.

title: The Robe
synopsis: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

title: A Prairie Home Companion
synopsis: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

title: Gorky Park
synopsis: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

title: Journey's End
synopsis: Set in a dugout in Aisne in 1918, it is the story of a group of British officers, led by mentally-disintegrating young Officer Stanhope, as they await their fate.

title: Le Mans
synopsis: Two car racing champions, an American and a German, face off on the world's hardest endurance course: Le Mans in France.

title: Battlestar Galactica
synopsis: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet on a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

title: The Pirates of Somalia
synopsis: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself with the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

title: Film Stars Don't Die in Liverpool
synopsis: A romance sparks between a young actor and a Hollywood leading lady.

title: Silent Movie
synopsis: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.

title: Smashed
synopsis: A married couple whose bond is built on a mutual love of alcohol gets their relationship put to the test when the wife decides to get sober.

title: Please Stand By
synopsis: A young autistic woman runs away from her caregiver in an attempt to submit her 500-page manuscript to a "Star Trek" writing competition at Paramount Pictures.

title: The Wild One
synopsis: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

title: Brideshead Revisited
synopsis: A poignant story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence set in England prior to World War II.

title: Loong Boonmee raleuk chat
synopsis: Dying of kidney disease, a man spends his last, somber days with family, including the ghost of his wife and a forest spirit who used to be his son, on a rural northern Thailand farm.

title: Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy XV
synopsis: King Regis, who oversees the land of Lucis, commands his army of soldiers to protect the kingdom from the Niflheim empire's plans to steal the sacred crystal which gives Lucis its magic and power.

title: The Giant Mechanical Man
synopsis: An offbeat romantic comedy about a silver-painted street performer and the soft spoken zoo worker who falls for him.

title: Ride with the Devil
synopsis: During the American Civil War, two friends join the Bushwhackers, a militant group loyal to the Confederacy.

title: Flirting with Disaster
synopsis: A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.

title: The Hoax
synopsis: In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.

title: Mænd & høns
synopsis: Through getting to know their unknown family, two outcast brothers discover a horrible truth about themselves and their relatives.

title: Behind the Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon
synopsis: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo.

title: Ghosts of Mississippi
synopsis: A Mississippi district attorney and the widow of Medgar Evers struggle to finally bring a white racist to justice for the 1963 murder of the civil rights leader.

title: Faults
synopsis: A cult deprogrammer is hired to help a couple whose daughter is under the influence of a mysterious cult.

title: The Last Supper
synopsis: A group of idealistic, but frustrated, liberals succumb to the temptation of murdering rightwing pundits for their political beliefs.

title: Seems Like Old Times
synopsis: Wrongfully accused of a bank robbery, a writer seeks the help of his ex-wife, who is now married to the soon-to-be Attorney General of California.

title: The Mummy
synopsis: In 1895, British archaeologists find and open the tomb of Egyptian Princess Ananka with nefarious consequences.

title: Grandma
synopsis: A teenager facing an unplanned pregnancy seeks help from her acerbic grandmother, a woman who is long estranged from her daughter.

title: Mo' Better Blues
synopsis: Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic lives.

title: Witchfinder General
synopsis: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch-hunter when the latter terrorizes his fiancée and kills her uncle.

title: Elegy
synopsis: Cultural critic, David Kepesh, finds his life, which he indicates is a state of "emancipated manhood," thrown into tragic disarray by Consuela Castillo, a well-mannered student who awakens a sense of sexual possessiveness in her teacher.

title: Un monstre à Paris
synopsis: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.

title: Mirrormask
synopsis: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a fifteen-year-old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.

title: OXV: The Manual
synopsis: In an alternate reality, children learn how lucky they will be (their "frequency"), knowledge which shapes their destiny. The unluckiest boy must parse the mysteries of free will in order to pursue his forbidden love of the luckiest girl.

title: Snow Falling on Cedars
synopsis: A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race figures into the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.

title: French Connection II
synopsis: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

title: Catch a Fire
synopsis: A drama about terrorism in Apartheid-era South Africa, revolving around a policeman and a young man who carries out solo attacks against the regime.

title: Buffalo Soldiers
synopsis: A criminal subculture operates among U.S. soldiers stationed in West Germany just before the fall of the Berlin wall.

title: Comet
synopsis: Set in a parallel universe, Comet bounces back and forth over the course of an unlikely but perfectly paired couple's six-year relationship.

title: Kopps
synopsis: When a small-town police station is threatened with shutting down because of too little crime, the police realize that something must be done.

title: Copying Beethoven
synopsis: A fictionalized account of the last year of Beethoven's life.

title: State and Main
synopsis: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.

title: The Legend of Hell House
synopsis: A physicist, his wife and two mediums are hired to investigate the Belasco House, where 27 guests had inexplicably died in 1927, along with most of a team of paranormal investigators that was sent in the early 1950s.

title: Cheap Thrills
synopsis: A scheming couple put a struggling family man and his old friend through a series of increasingly twisted dares over the course of an evening at a local bar.

title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
synopsis: He's a widower in Paris who speaks no French. She's a dance instructor less than half his age. Can they become a family, or will his estranged adult children halt the friendship?

title: Bigil
synopsis: A former football player struggles to train a women's football team and avenge his father's death.

title: Martian Child
synopsis: A science-fiction writer, recently widowed, considers whether to adopt a hyper-imaginative 6-year-old abandoned and socially rejected boy who says he's really from Mars.

title: Kidulthood
synopsis: A day in the life of a group of troubled 15-year-olds growing up in west London.

title: Redbelt
synopsis: A fateful event leads to a job in the film business for top mixed-martial arts instructor Mike Terry. Though he refuses to participate in prize bouts, circumstances conspire to force him to consider entering such a competition.

title: Morvern Callar
synopsis: After her beloved boyfriend's suicide, a mourning supermarket worker and her best friend hit the road in Scotland, but find that grief is something that you can't run away from forever.

title: Love Is Strange
synopsis: After Ben and George get married, George is fired from his teaching post, forcing them to stay with friends separately while they sell their place and look for cheaper housing -- a situation that weighs heavily on all involved.

title: Saints and Soldiers
synopsis: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

title: Merantau
synopsis: A young man from the countryside uses his skills in silat martial arts to survive the slave trade.

title: Beyond the Sea
synopsis: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin and specifically his relationship with wife Sandra Dee.

title: Bon Cop, Bad Cop
synopsis: Two Canadian detectives, one from Ontario and the other from Quebec, must work together when a murdered victim is found on the Ontario-Quebec border.

title: Girlfight
synopsis: Diana, without her father knowing it, trains as a boxer and achieves impressive success, blazing new trails for female boxers.

title: Dracula: Prince of Darkness
synopsis: Dracula is resurrected, preying on four unsuspecting visitors to his castle.

title: All the Real Girls
synopsis: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

title: Dou foh sin
synopsis: A hot-headed inspector takes on a small but powerful Vietnamese-Chinese gang, after a series of crimes and murder attempts committed and putting an undercover cop and his girlfriend in great danger.

title: Don't Think Twice
synopsis: When a member of a popular New York City improv troupe gets a huge break, the rest of the group - all best friends - start to realize that not everyone is going to make it after all.

title: Gangster No. 1
synopsis: Chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent, and particularly ruthless English gangster.

title: Shadows and Fog
synopsis: With a serial strangler on the loose, a bookkeeper wanders around town searching for the vigilante group intent on catching the killer.

title: Me and Orson Welles
synopsis: In 1937, a teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar", directed by a young Orson Welles.

title: Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
synopsis: An action epic that explores the origins of Master Shake, Frylock, and Meatwad, better known as the Aqua Teen Hunger Force, who somehow become pitted in a battle over an immortal piece of exercise equipment.

title: Samba
synopsis: Senegalese Samba has worked 10 years in France. He's arrested and befriends the woman helping him with legal matters as volunteer after a burnout at work. He's released after being told to leave France. Chemistry?

title: Palindromes
synopsis: Aviva is thirteen, awkward and sensitive. Her mother Joyce is warm and loving, as is her father, Steve, a regular guy who does have a fierce temper from time to time. The film revolves around her family, friends and neighbors.

title: El crimen del padre Amaro
synopsis: Politics and sexual passions threaten to corrupt a young, newly-ordained priest in a small Mexican town.

title: He Was a Quiet Man
synopsis: An unhinged office worker who planned to go on a shooting spree at his workplace struggles with his newfound status as a hero after he ends up stopping a shooting spree instead.

title: Fourth Man Out
synopsis: A car mechanic in a small, working class town comes out of the closet to his unsuspecting, blue-collar best friends.

title: Babysitting
synopsis: What was supposed to be a quiet night of babysitting turns into a complete chaos after a few of the babysitter's friends arrive.

title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
synopsis: Sameer, fast at losing his temper is re-located to Goa where he falls in love with Rani. But Sameer's new roommate Sunny, has some plans of his own.

title: Delibal
synopsis: Two young people figure out how to shape their future according to love and/or career. Then one of them finds himself having to decide whether to live happily with his beloved wife with the... See full summary »

title: Sleepwalk with Me
synopsis: A burgeoning stand-up comedian struggles with the stress of a stalled career, a stale relationship, and the wild spurts of severe sleepwalking he is desperate to ignore.

title: The Escapist
synopsis: Frank is 14 years into a life sentence when he decides to break out of the London prison to set things right with his ill junkie daughter. He plans an ingenious escape requiring 4 inmates with different skills.

title: Garam Masala
synopsis: A rib tickling tale of two flirts who constantly flirt with women despite one of them being engaged. Chaos ensues when the fiancé finds out that her to-be groom is cheating on her.

title: Cinayet Süsü
synopsis: A serial killer keeps creating crime scenes that are ridiculously decorated with paints, markings and poems everywhere. The team begin solving the most mysterious murder case of the country, using the most wrong methods.

title: A Cock and Bull Story
synopsis: Director Michael Winterbottom (Northam) attempts to shoot the adaptation of Laurence Sterne's essentially unfilmable novel, "The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman."

title: Resurrecting the Champ
synopsis: Up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man ("Champ") only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

title: Chhalaang
synopsis: Chhalaang is a hilarious yet inspiring journey by Montu.

title: Sarkar
synopsis: An NRI businessman learns his vote has been cast by someone else and decides to investigate the matter, eventually finding himself pitted against two corrupt politicians.

title: Restless
synopsis: The story of a terminally ill teenage girl who falls for a boy who likes to attend funerals and their encounters with the ghost of a Japanese kamikaze pilot from WWII.

title: Tarde para la ira
synopsis: A hard-working single mother and wife of a getaway driver who is about to be released is approached by an unassuming and gentle man, completely unaware though of his inscrutable and utterly impelling motives.

title: Howl
synopsis: As Allen Ginsberg talks about his life and art, his most famous poem is illustrated in animation while the obscenity trial of the work is dramatized.

title: Der Schuh des Manitu
synopsis: The hilarious adventures of two best friends, Apache chief Abahachi and cowboy Ranger, in the Wild West.

title: Yes Boss
synopsis: Rahul Joshi wants to be a successful businessman so he works hard for his boss Siddharth. One day Rahul meets Seema, an up and coming model, and he feels like he's finally met his match. Will Seema fall for Rahul?

title: Sanak
synopsis: Sanak is an action-thriller film, summarizing the emotion and journey of a lone hero, who fights overwhelming odds in a restricted environment, to save his wife and other unfortunates, helpless hostages, from the perils of evil.

title: Ensemble, c'est tout
synopsis: When Camille (Audrey Tautou) falls ill, she is forced to live with Philibert and Franck (Guillaume Canet). A moving trio story.

title: Kedarnath
synopsis: Mansoor, a reserved and reticent Pithoo, helps pilgrims make an arduous journey upwards to the temple town. His world turns around when he meets the beautiful and rebellious Mukku who draws him into a whirlwind of intense love.

title: Habemus Papam
synopsis: A story centered on the relationship between the newly elected Pope and his therapist.

title: Lady Chatterley's Lover
synopsis: An unhappily married aristocrat begins a torrid affair with the gamekeeper on her husband's country estate.

title: Speak No Evil
synopsis: A Danish family visits a Dutch family they met on a holiday. What was supposed to be an idyllic weekend slowly starts unraveling as the Danes try to stay polite in the face of unpleasantness.

title: The Stranger
synopsis: Two men who meet on a bus and strike up a conversation that turns into friendship. For Henry Teague, worn down by a lifetime of physical labour and crime, this is a dream come true.

title: Biloxi Blues
synopsis: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi, Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

title: The Final Countdown
synopsis: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

title: The Legend of Billie Jean
synopsis: A Texas teenager cuts her hair short and becomes an outlaw martyr with her brother and friends.

title: Forever My Girl
synopsis: After being gone for a decade a country star returns home to the love he left behind.

title: I Want You Back
synopsis: Newly-dumped thirtysomethings Peter and Emma team up to sabotage their exes' new relationships and win them back for good.

title: Rock 'n' Roll High School
synopsis: Ramones fanatic and delinquent Riff Randell battles it out with the strict new principal of Vince Lombardi High School, Miss Togar, with help from the Ramones.

title: Ai no korîda
synopsis: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to an obsessive and ultimately destructive sexual relationship.

title: Slums of Beverly Hills
synopsis: In 1976, a lower-middle-class teenager struggles to cope living with her neurotic family of nomads on the outskirts of Beverly Hills.

title: Avengement
synopsis: After years of assaults on him in prison, convicted felon Cain Burgess escapes for avengement on those responsible.

title: Juliet, Naked
synopsis: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) has an unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

title: The Company of Wolves
synopsis: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves prowling the woods below her bedroom window.

title: Respect
synopsis: Following the rise of Aretha Franklin's career from a child singing in her father's church's choir to her international superstardom, RESPECT is the remarkable true story of the music icon's journey to find her voice.

title: White Squall
synopsis: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

title: The Nutty Professor
synopsis: A timid, nearsighted chemistry teacher discovers a magical potion that can transform him into a suave and handsome Romeo. The Jekyll and Hyde game works well enough until the concoction starts to wear off at the most embarrassing times.

title: Summer School
synopsis: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.

title: Mommie Dearest
synopsis: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

title: Land
synopsis: A bereaved woman seeks out a new life, off the grid in Wyoming.

title: Center Stage
synopsis: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
synopsis: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

title: Lords of Chaos
synopsis: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
synopsis: In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.

title: Fame
synopsis: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

title: Super Dark Times
synopsis: Teenagers Zach and Josh have been best friends their whole lives, but when a gruesome accident leads to a cover-up, the secret drives a wedge between them and propels them down a rabbit hole of escalating paranoia and violence.

title: Tommy
synopsis: A psychosomatically blind, deaf, and mute boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

title: Above the Rim
synopsis: Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.

title: The Miseducation of Cameron Post
synopsis: In 1993, a teenage girl is forced into a gay conversion therapy center by her conservative guardians.

title: Toy Soldiers
synopsis: A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.

title: Luce
synopsis: A married couple is forced to reckon with their idealized image of their son, adopted from war-torn Eritrea, after an alarming discovery by a devoted high school teacher threatens his status as an all-star student.

title: Brain on Fire
synopsis: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

title: Snowtown
synopsis: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother's new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

title: Darlings
synopsis: It follows the lives of two women as they find courage and love in exceptional circumstances.

title: The Greatest Show on Earth
synopsis: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer are told against a background of circus spectacle.

title: ...E tu vivrai nel terrore! L'aldilà
synopsis: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.

title: Revenge of the Pink Panther
synopsis: To prove that he still is strong and powerful, Philippe Douvier decides to kill Clouseau. Once news of his "death" has been announced, Clouseau tries to take advantage of it and goes undercover with Cato to find out who tried to kill him.

title: Plus One
synopsis: In order to survive a summer of wedding fever, longtime single friends, Ben and Alice, agree to be each other's plus one at every wedding they've been invited to.

title: Airport
synopsis: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

title: The Adventures of Bob & Doug McKenzie: Strange Brew
synopsis: Canada's most famous hosers, Bob and Doug McKenzie, get jobs at the Elsinore Brewery, only to learn that something is rotten with the state of it.

title: Gigi
synopsis: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship which may not stay platonic for long.

title: CBGB
synopsis: A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.

title: Tuck Everlasting
synopsis: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

title: Soapdish
synopsis: An ambitious television soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.

title: Dragonslayer
synopsis: A young wizarding apprentice is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom.

title: Dèmoni
synopsis: A group of random people is invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.

title: Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!
synopsis: Three go-go dancers holding a young girl hostage come across a crippled old man living with his two sons in the desert. After learning he's hiding a sum of cash around, the women start scheming on him.

title: Yentl
synopsis: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

title: High Art
synopsis: A young female intern at a small magazine company and a drug-addicted lesbian photographer slowly fall in love while exploiting each other to advance their respective careers.

title: Shaft
synopsis: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

title: Paint Your Wagon
synopsis: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

title: Ging chaat goo si 4: Gaan dan yam mo
synopsis: This fourth installment of Chan's Police Story film franchise has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

title: Kursk
synopsis: The 2000 K-141 Kursk submarine disaster is followed by governmental negligence. As the sailors fight for survival, their families desperately battle political obstacles and impossible odds to save them.

title: The Best Man Holiday
synopsis: When college friends reunite after 15 years over the Christmas holidays, they discover just how easy it is for long-forgotten rivalries and romances to be reignited.

title: Hands of Stone
synopsis: The legendary Roberto Duran and his equally legendary trainer Ray Arcel change each other's lives.

title: Jungle Fever
synopsis: Friends and family of a married black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.

title: Aknyeo
synopsis: A female assassin leaves a trail of bodies behind her as she seeks revenge.

title: Il portiere di notte
synopsis: A concentration camp survivor rekindles her sadomasochistic relationship with her lover, a former SS officer - now working as a night porter at a Vienna hotel - but his former Nazi associates begin stalking them.

title: Judgment Night
synopsis: Four young friends, while taking a shortcut en route to a local boxing match, witness a brutal murder which leaves them running for their lives.

title: High Anxiety
synopsis: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

title: Light of My Life
synopsis: Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested.

title: The Business
synopsis: Frankie is sent from London to Spain to make a delivery to Charlie, who likes the kid and shows him the ropes including the use of guns and drugs. Frankie likes the sun, pools and the cute, bikini clad girls and stays in Spain.

title: Ice Station Zebra
synopsis: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

title: New York, New York
synopsis: An egotistical saxophonist and a young lounge singer meet on VJ Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, uphill climb.

title: Hello, My Name Is Doris
synopsis: A self-help seminar inspires a sixty-something woman to romantically pursue her younger co-worker.

title: Next Gen
synopsis: A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.

title: Easy Virtue
synopsis: A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.

title: Thank You for Your Service
synopsis: A group of U.S. soldiers returning from Iraq struggle to integrate back into family and civilian life, while living with the memory of a war that threatens to destroy them long after they've left the battlefield.

title: Meet the Feebles
synopsis: Multiple animals and insects experience the sleazier side of show business while working on a variety show.

title: All of Me
synopsis: A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

title: Dark Blue
synopsis: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

title: Romeo Is Bleeding
synopsis: A womanizing, crooked cop on the payroll of the mafia is confronted with the reality of his double life after he is asked to kill a beautiful and ruthless Russian gangster.

title: The Great Raid
synopsis: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

title: Black or White
synopsis: A grieving widower is drawn into a custody battle over his granddaughter, whom he helped raise her entire life.

title: Small Town Crime
synopsis: An alcoholic ex cop finds a woman on the roadside, left for dead. He offers to find the killer pro bono as P.I. Her granddad hires him. Things get nasty.

title: Auto Focus
synopsis: The life of TV star Bob Crane and his strange friendship with electronics expert John Henry Carpenter.

title: The Door in the Floor
synopsis: A writer's young assistant becomes both pawn and catalyst in his boss's disintegrating household.

title: Guava Island
synopsis: A young musician seeks to hold a festival to liberate the oppressed people of Guava Island, even if only for a day.

title: Cracks
synopsis: A look at the lives and relationships among girls at an elite boarding school.

title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
synopsis: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

title: The Angel
synopsis: As his country prepares for war, top Egyptian official Ashraf Marwan makes contact with Israel and wades into a shadowy game of high-stakes espionage.

title: These Final Hours
synopsis: A self-obsessed young man makes his way to the party-to-end-all-parties on the last day on Earth, but ends up saving the life of a little girl searching for her father. Their relationship ultimately leads him on the path to redemption.

title: Hoffa

title: Dhoom
synopsis: A mysterious gang of bikers is on a robbing spree. ACP Jai gets Ali, a mechanic, to assist him in the case. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to nab the thieves red-handed.

title: The Dead Girl
synopsis: The clues to a young woman's death come together as the lives of seemingly unrelated people begin to intersect.

title: One Eight Seven
synopsis: 15 months after being stabbed 9 times by a student at work as a high school teacher in NYC, Mr. Garfield is working in LA as a substitute teacher come full-time. He refuses to be a victim anymore.

title: Louder Than Bombs
synopsis: The fractious family of a father and his two sons confront their different feelings and memories of their deceased wife and mother, a famed war photographer.

title: Happy End
synopsis: A well-to-do French family deals with a series of setbacks and crises.

title: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
synopsis: When an English cartographer must tell a Welsh village that their mountain is only a hill, the offended community sets out to change that.

title: The Shape of Things
synopsis: A quiet, unassuming man begins to change in a major way as a result of meeting a new, art-student girlfriend, and his friends are unsettled by the transformation.

title: The Hollars
synopsis: A man returns to his small hometown after learning that his mother has fallen ill and is about to undergo surgery.

title: Arn: Tempelriddaren
synopsis: Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman, is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.

title: Black Beauty
synopsis: The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

title: Corrina, Corrina

title: Something New

title: When the Game Stands Tall
synopsis: The journey of legendary football coach Bob Ladouceur, who took the De La Salle High School Spartans from obscurity to a 151-game winning streak that shattered all records for any American sport.

title: Luther

title: River of No Return
synopsis: The titular river unites a farmer recently released from prison, his young son, and an ambitious saloon singer. In order to survive, each must be purged of anger, and each must learn to understand and care for the others.

title: Killer's Kiss
synopsis: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed-up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

title: Sala samobójców
synopsis: After suffering extreme humiliation at school, Dominik holes himself up in his room and begins spending all his time in a virtual reality chat room.

title: The Paper
synopsis: New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.

title: Kissing Jessica Stein
synopsis: A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.

title: 5x2
synopsis: Five stages in the romance between a woman and a man.

title: Le daim
synopsis: A man's obsession with his designer deerskin jacket causes him to blow his life savings and turn to crime.

title: Feast of Love
synopsis: A meditation on love and its various incarnations, set within a community of friends in Oregon. and is described as an exploration of the magical, mysterious and sometimes painful incarnations of love.

title: That Touch of Mink
synopsis: A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.

title: Suspect
synopsis: When a homeless man is accused of murdering a Justice Department file clerk, a public defender is tasked with mounting his legal defense.

title: Freeheld
synopsis: New Jersey police lieutenant Laurel Hester and her registered domestic partner Stacie Andree battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.

title: Bamboozled

title: Reservation Road

title: Black Gold

title: Sound of My Voice

title: Animal Factory
synopsis: A young man goes to prison and a tough, older convict takes him under his wing as a mentor.

title: Il gatto a nove code
synopsis: Two journalists try to solve a series of murders connected to a pharmaceutical company's secret experiments, becoming targets of the killer themselves.

title: What Doesn't Kill You

title: Experimenter

title: Rocket Science
synopsis: Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.

title: Little Man Tate
synopsis: A single mother raises a child prodigy on her own, struggling to give him every opportunity he needs to express his gift.

title: La habitación de Fermat
synopsis: 4 mathematicians are invited to solve an enigma. Once there, they're locked in a mechanically shrinking room and given 1 minute to solve each puzzle via cellphone while also figuring out why they're there.

title: Clockwise

title: De-Lovely
synopsis: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

title: A Home at the End of the World
synopsis: A boy who has experienced many losses in his life grows to manhood and enters into a love triangle with a woman and his boyhood friend.

title: Last Chance Harvey
synopsis: In London for his daughter's wedding, a rumpled man finds his romantic spirits lifted by a new woman in his life.

title: Race
synopsis: Destiny makes two brothers- Ranvir and Rajiv - enemies of each other. Everything is fair in love and war.

title: Kagittan Hayatlar
synopsis: Mehmet is a cherished fellow who runs the solid waste warehouse in the neighborhood, he helps everyone in need, especially homeless children and teenagers since he was one too.

title: Shrink

title: Nabbeun namja

title: Comme un chef

title: Ripley's Game

title: Gamgi
synopsis: Chaos ensues when a lethal, airborne virus infects the population of a South Korean city less than 20 kilometers from Seoul.

synopsis: After hearing that his wife sleeps with Clay, Earl kills himself, making it look like Clay shot him. The widow doesn't like it when Clay starts sees another woman instead. Bodies start piling up.

title: Creation
synopsis: Torn between faith and science, and suffering hallucinations, English naturalist Charles Darwin struggles to complete 'On the Origin of Species' and maintain his relationship with his wife.

title: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy
synopsis: A wacky inventor and his wife invite two other couples for a weekend party at a romantic summer house in the 1900s countryside.

title: Factotum
synopsis: This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

title: Ronal Barbaren
synopsis: The 100 Barbarian Sons of Krull get attacked by a superior force and captured. It's up to the young, weak but smart Ronal to free them. 3 join his dangerous quest.

title: Moonlight Mile
synopsis: As he copes with the death of his fiancée, a young man befriends her parents and must figure out what he wants out of life.

title: The Trip to Italy
synopsis: Two men, six meals in six different places on a road trip around Italy. Liguria, Tuscany, Rome, Amalfi and ending in Capri.

title: King of California
synopsis: An unstable dad who after getting out of a mental institution tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.

title: Sherrybaby
synopsis: Sherry tries to integrate again into society and become a good mother.

title: La délicatesse

title: Please Give

title: Di Renjie zhi Tongtian diguo
synopsis: An exiled detective is recruited to solve a series of mysterious deaths that threaten to delay the inauguration of Empress Wu.

title: Adulthood
synopsis: Six years after KiDULTHOOD, Sam Peel is released from jail for killing Trife, he realizes that life is no easier on the outside than it was on the inside and he's forced to confront the ... See full summary »

title: Alice
synopsis: A spoiled Manhattan housewife re-evaluates her life after visiting a Chinatown healer.

title: Wanted
synopsis: Radhe is a ruthless gangster who will kill anyone for money. He is attracted towards Jhanvi, a middle class girl, who does not approve of his work and wants him to change.

title: Direktøren for det hele
synopsis: An IT company hires an actor to serve as the company's president in order to help the business get sold to a cranky Icelander.

title: Words and Pictures
synopsis: An art instructor and an English teacher form a rivalry that ends up with a competition at their school in which students decide whether words or pictures are more important.

title: Chasseurs de dragons
synopsis: A fantastic tale telling the adventures of two dragon hunters!

title: The Big Kahuna

title: Kumiko, the Treasure Hunter

title: El desconocido

title: La doublure
synopsis: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.

synopsis: Poonam, a traditionally brought-up young woman, is to marry Prem, a groom chosen by her uncle. Poonam and Prem's faith and love are to be tested however, when an accident occurs and Poonam might be scarred for life.

title: Renaissance

title: Astérix le Gaulois
synopsis: Asterix, the most cunning warrior of a Gaulish village resisting Roman occupation, must save their magic potion-brewing druid when he is kidnapped by a Centurion.

title: Go Goa Gone
synopsis: A group of friends, just looking to have a good time in a rave party on a remote island in Goa, find out that the island is infested with Zombies.

title: Aitraaz
synopsis: A man is accused of sexual harassment by his former lover and he has to prove his innocence in order to restore his dignity.

title: Rosewater
synopsis: Iranian-Canadian journalist Maziar Bahari is detained by Iranian forces who brutally interrogate him under suspicion that he is a spy.

title: Eyyvah Eyvah 2
synopsis: A clarinetist from a village in Turkey's Thracian region tries to reach his fiancé, who works as a nurse in a village near Çanakkale, to give her a ring to win back her heart.

title: Driving Lessons

title: Viswasam
synopsis: A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.

title: Eva
synopsis: A shy genius is employed by his former university to design robot software.

title: No Entry
synopsis: Kishan and Sunny's life are troubled after their womanizing friend Prem sets them up with a hooker named Bobby, leading to web of lies and confusions.

title: Causeway
synopsis: A US soldier suffers a traumatic brain injury while fighting in Afghanistan and struggles to adjust to life back home.

title: Pretty Baby
synopsis: A preteen girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

title: My Policeman
synopsis: The arrival of Patrick into Marion and Tom's home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previously.

title: Father Stu
synopsis: Follows the life of Father Stuart Long, a boxer-turned-priest who inspired countless people during his journey from self-destruction to redemption.

title: Confess, Fletch
synopsis: After becoming the prime suspect in multiple murders, Fletch strives to prove his innocence while simultaneously searching for his fiancé's stolen art collection.

title: Ku bei
synopsis: A young couple trying to reunite amid a city ravaged by a plague that turns its victims into deranged, bloodthirsty sadists.

title: Black Bear
synopsis: A filmmaker at a creative impasse seeks solace from her tumultuous past at a rural retreat, only to find that the woods summon her inner demons in intense and surprising ways.

title: Red Eye

synopsis: An Internal Affairs agent becomes obsessed with bringing down a cop who has managed to maintain a spotless reputation despite being involved in a web of corruption.

title: House Party
synopsis: Kid decides to go to his friend Play's house party, but neither of them can predict what's in store for them on what could be the wildest night of their lives.

title: Cruising
synopsis: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

title: Zola
synopsis: A stripper named Zola embarks on a wild road trip to Florida.

title: 3096 Tage
synopsis: A young Austrian girl is kidnapped and held in captivity for eight years. Based on the factual case of Natascha Kampusch.

title: Against the Ice
synopsis: In 1909, two explorers fight to survive after they're left behind while on a Denmark expedition in ice-covered Greenland.

title: Ammonite

title: Cirkus

title: The Secret: Dare to Dream
synopsis: A feature film adaptation of the self-help book, 'The Secret', which focuses on the power of positive thinking.

title: Fire and Ice

title: Nightbreed

title: Society

title: Just One of the Guys
synopsis: Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at the Sun Tribune go to two guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

title: Swallow

title: 2 Days in the Valley
synopsis: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

title: Ocean's Eleven

title: Beirut

title: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
synopsis: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

title: The Duke of Burgundy
synopsis: A woman who studies butterflies and moths tests the limits of her relationship with her lesbian lover.

title: Spontaneous
synopsis: Get ready for the outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up. When students in their school begin exploding (literally), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

title: My Fellow Americans

title: When a Man Loves a Woman
synopsis: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

title: Aterrados
synopsis: When strange events occur in a neighborhood in Buenos Aires, a doctor specializing in the paranormal, her colleague, and an ex police officer decide to investigate further.

title: Dutch
synopsis: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.

title: Ophelia
synopsis: A reimagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.

title: Class of 1984
synopsis: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

title: The One and Only Ivan
synopsis: A gorilla named Ivan tries to piece together his past with the help of an elephant named Ruby as they hatch a plan to escape from captivity.

title: Running Scared
synopsis: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

title: Kairo
synopsis: Two groups of people discover evidence that suggests spirits may be trying to invade the human world through the Internet.

title: The Greatest Story Ever Told
synopsis: An all-star, large scale epic movie that chronicles the life and ministry of Jesus Christ.

title: Bulbbul
synopsis: A man returns home after years to find his brother's child bride now grown up and abandoned, and his ancestral village plagued by mysterious deaths.

title: City of Lies
synopsis: Russell Poole and Jack Jackson investigate the murder of rapper Notorious B.I.G.

title: The Cotton Club
synopsis: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner, and guests (like gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-1930s Harlem.

title: Curious George
synopsis: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

title: Pánico en el Transiberiano
synopsis: While on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a parasitic life-form.

title: Wonderland

title: Total Eclipse

title: Ramona and Beezus
synopsis: An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.

title: The Notorious Bettie Page

title: Hounds of Love

title: Geronimo: An American Legend
synopsis: The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the U.S. Government's subjugation of his people.

title: Purple Rain
synopsis: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

title: PCU
synopsis: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stays at the wildest house on campus.

title: The Love Bug
synopsis: Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

title: Jagged Edge
synopsis: A wealthy woman is murdered in her beach house. The husband is allegedly knocked out first. He inherits all. He has a female ex criminal prosecutor represent him in court.

title: The Bookshop
synopsis: England 1959. In a small East Anglian town, Florence Green decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop.

title: A Family Man
synopsis: A headhunter whose life revolves around closing deals in a survival-of-the-fittest boiler room battles his top rival for control of their job placement company, but his dream of owning the company clashes with the needs of his family.

title: A Little Chaos
synopsis: Two talented landscape artists become romantically entangled while building a garden in King Louis XIV's palace at Versailles.

title: Emperor
synopsis: As the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, General Fellers is tasked with deciding if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Influencing his ruling is his quest to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

title: Dead & Buried

title: The Ballad of Jack and Rose
synopsis: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once-thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

title: Home for the Holidays
synopsis: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

title: Paper Man
synopsis: A washed-up writer forms an unlikely friendship with a teenager from Long Island.

title: Blood Ties
synopsis: Two brothers on either side of the law face off over organized crime in Brooklyn during the 1970s.

title: Foxy Brown
synopsis: A voluptuous black vigilante takes a job as a high-class prostitute to get revenge on the mobsters who murdered her boyfriend.

title: Inferno
synopsis: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

title: The Party
synopsis: Janet hosts a party to celebrate her new promotion, but once the guests arrive, it becomes clear that not everything will be going down as smoothly as the red wine.

title: The Raven
synopsis: A magician, who has been turned into a raven, turns to a former sorcerer for help.

title: Brad's Status
synopsis: A father takes his son to tour colleges on the East Coast and meets up with an old friend who makes him feel inferior about his life's choices.

title: Anek
synopsis: A socio political, action thriller set against the geopolitical backdrop of Northeast India.

title: Brain Damage
synopsis: One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.

title: The Birth of a Nation

title: The Program
