title: Shattered
synopsis: After a horrific car wreck leaves him an amnesiac, a man slowly begins to unravel his shocking past.

title: Paulie
synopsis: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

title: Dracula
synopsis: In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

title: Ecologia del delitto

title: Falling in Love
synopsis: Although they live married lives, two strangers keep running into each other, starting a friendship that could blossom into so much more.

title: Malang - Unleash the Madness

title: The Big Easy

title: Facing the Giants

title: Margaret
synopsis: A young woman witnesses a bus accident, and is caught up in the aftermath, where the question of whether or not it was intentional affects many people's lives.

title: The Missouri Breaks

title: Enter Nowhere

title: Escobar: Paradise Lost

title: Robin and Marian

title: Bijitâ Q
synopsis: A troubled and perverted family find their lives intruded by a mysterious stranger who seems to help find a balance in their disturbing natures.

title: The Paradine Case
synopsis: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

title: The Dream Team
synopsis: Four mental patients on a field trip in New York City must save their caring chaperon, who ends up being taken to a hospital in a coma after accidentally witnessing a murder, before the killers can find him and finish the job.

title: Meek's Cutoff
synopsis: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

title: The Pillow Book
synopsis: A woman with a body writing fetish seeks to find a combined lover and calligrapher.

title: Big Miracle
synopsis: In small-town Alaska, a news reporter recruits his Greenpeace-volunteer ex-girlfriend on a campaign to save a family of gray whales trapped by rapidly-forming ice in the Arctic Circle.

title: Hero
synopsis: A not-so-nice man rescues passengers from a crashed airliner, only to see someone else take credit.

title: It Came from Outer Space
synopsis: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

title: Subway
synopsis: On improvising a burglary at a shady tycoon's home, Fred takes refuge in the hip and surreal universe of the Paris Metro and encounters its assorted denizens, the tycoon's henchmen and his disenchanted young wife.

title: Killing Zoe
synopsis: The cab driver sets American Zed up with Zoe in his Paris hotel. Despite FFR1000 charged, she's an art student with day jobs e.g. bank. Safecracker Zed meets his junkie friend after 11 years to rob a bank.

title: The Ledge
synopsis: A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision.

title: 10 Items or Less
synopsis: An actor prepping for an upcoming role meets a quirky grocery clerk, and together they hit the road to show each other their respective worlds.

title: Chalte Chalte
synopsis: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.

title: Head in the Clouds
synopsis: From the roaring 1920s to the ruinous Spanish Civil War and Adolf Hitler's rise into power, the lives of an Irish schoolteacher, a provocative heiress and her Spanish muse are intricately interlaced, sharing the same destiny and passion.

title: Ek Villain
synopsis: When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

title: The Fourth Protocol
synopsis: John Preston is a British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK. The Russians are hoping this will shatter the "special relationship" between the two countries.

title: Moscow on the Hudson
synopsis: A Russian saxophonist visiting New York with a circus troupe suddenly decides to defect from the USSR during a shopping trip to a department store, but he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

title: A Good Woman
synopsis: A 1930s American socialite creates a scandal in the expatriate high society of the Amalfi Coast of Italy when she forms a secretive relationship with a wealthy American unbeknownst to his young wife.

title: Jisatsu sâkuru
synopsis: A detective is trying to find the cause of a string of suicides.

title: A Royal Night Out
synopsis: On V.E. Day in 1945, as peace extends across Europe, Princesses Elizabeth and Margaret are allowed out to join the celebrations. It is a night full of excitement, danger and the first flutters of romance.

title: Le temps du loup
synopsis: When Anna and her family arrive at their holiday home, they find it occupied by strangers. This confrontation is just the beginning of a painful learning process.

title: Dostana
synopsis: Two straight guys pretend to be gay in order to secure a Miami apartment. When both of them fall for their roommate Neha, hilarity ensues as they strive to convince one and all that they're gay whilst secretly trying to win her heart.

title: Den skaldede frisør
synopsis: A hairdresser who has lost her hair to cancer, finds out her husband is having an affair, travels to Italy for her daughter's wedding, and meets a widower who still blames the world for the loss of his wife.

title: L'écume des jours
synopsis: Wealthy, inventive bachelor Colin endeavors to find a cure for his lover Chloe after she's diagnosed with an unusual illness caused by a flower growing in her lungs.

title: Recess: School's Out
synopsis: T.J. and the gang must save summer vacation from disappearing forever.

title: Dobermann
synopsis: Dobermann is the world's most ruthless bank robber and with his gang rob bank after bank, now in Paris. What can the police do but to let the mad, morally bankrupt police commissioner loose on him?

title: Where the Buffalo Roam
synopsis: Semi-biographical film based on the experiences of gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.

title: Mission Mangal
synopsis: Based on true events of the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) successfully launching the Mars Orbiter Mission (Mangalyaan), making it the least expensive mission to Mars.

title: White Hunter Black Heart
synopsis: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

title: Jakob the Liar
synopsis: During World War II, an ordinary inhabitant of a ghetto fakes news about Allied offensives to inspire hope for other victims of the Nazi regime.

title: Forget Paris
synopsis: Mickey, an NBA referee, meets Ellen, an American airline official, in Paris. It develops into a relationship of ups and downs.

title: Thumbsucker
synopsis: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

title: Triage
synopsis: The wife of a photojournalist sets out to discover why he came home from a recent assignment without his colleague.

title: The Powerpuff Girls Movie
synopsis: After destroying the city of Townsville in a game of tag, a trio of super-powered little girls must redeem themselves by stopping a vengeful monkey's plot for world domination.

title: Breaking and Entering
synopsis: A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.

title: Balada triste de trompeta
synopsis: A young trapeze artist must decide between her lust for Sergio, the Happy Clown, or her affection for Javier, the Sad Clown, both of whom are deeply disturbed.

title: Kika
synopsis: Kika, a cute cosmetologist, prepares Ramon for funeral when he revives. He proposes to the much older Kika who has his dad as lover. Did Ramon's dad murder his mom? What about the escaped rapist and the PSYCHOlogist video reporter?

title: Ocho apellidos vascos
synopsis: Rafael, a Sevillian who has never left Andalucia, decides to leave his homeland to follow Amaia, a Basque girl unlike other women whom he has ever known.

title: Kolpaçino
synopsis: After a violent shootout, a group of men have to hide two corpses.

title: Scenic Route
synopsis: Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.

title: The Good Thief
synopsis: An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.

title: Pretty Persuasion
synopsis: A 15-year-old girl incites chaos among her friends and a media frenzy when she accuses her drama teacher of sexual harassment.

title: December Boys
synopsis: One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.

title: The Deep End
synopsis: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.

title: TiMER
synopsis: If a clock could count down to the moment you meet your soul mate, would you want to know?

title: Bhagam Bhag
synopsis: The members of a drama troupe fall in trouble when they are framed for a murder. Things go worse when they find their actress committing suicide, which is somehow linked with the murder.

title: Terra
synopsis: A peaceful alien planet faces annihilation, as the homeless remainder of the human race sets its eyes on Terra. Mala, a rebellious Terrian teenager, will do everything she can to stop it.

title: Dear Wendy
synopsis: A young boy in a nameless, timeless American town establishes a gang of youthful misfits united in their love of guns and their code of honor.

title: Etharkkum Thunindhavan
synopsis: A lawyer turns judge jury and executioner and goes after a gang, led by a minister's son, that threatens women with videos of them.

title: Incir Reçeli
synopsis: On a night of despair after being turned down continuously for the scripts he writes, Metin ends up in a bar where he meets a girl named Duygu. After spending the night together, she walks ... See full summary »

title: Keinohrhasen
synopsis: Rainbow press reporter Ludo is sentenced to 8 months; he's released on probation but must work at a local daycare center for 300 hours. He meets Anna, who has unfinished business with him.

title: September
synopsis: At a summer house in Vermont, neighbor Howard falls in love with Lane, who's in a relationship with Peter, who's falling for Stephanie, who's married with children.

title: Günesi Gördüm
synopsis: In the southeast region of Turkey, the Altun family lives in a small mountainside village plagued by a 25-year war that makes their daily lives a hellish struggle. As the war intensifies, ... See full summary »

title: Terri
synopsis: The story of a bullied fifteen-year-old boy in a small town as he struggles to adjust to his difficult life.

title: 7 Aum Arivu
synopsis: A genetic engineering student tries to revive the skills of a past legend and use them to save India from a deadly virus attack orchestrated by China.

title: Mangal Pandey: The Rising
synopsis: This is a film about the leader of the 1857 mutiny and his fight against the British rule.

title: Vizontele Tuuba
synopsis: Vizontele Tuuba is the sequel to Vizontele and recounts the 1980 military coup, the repercussions of the coup in a small southeastern town in Turkey. This is a very confusing period: every ... See full summary »

title: Fall
synopsis: Best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves at the top of a 2,000-foot radio tower.

title: Pleasure
synopsis: Bella Cherry arrives in Los Angeles with dreams of becoming an adult film star, but she soon learns that fame won't come easy as she harnesses her ambition and cunning to rise to the top of this mesmerizing and singular world.

title: Luck
synopsis: The curtain is pulled back on the millennia-old battle between the organizations of good luck and bad luck that secretly affects everyday lives.

title: Fractured
synopsis: A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.

title: Hidden
synopsis: A family takes refuge in a bomb shelter to avoid a dangerous outbreak.

title: The Program
synopsis: Several players from different backgrounds try to cope with the pressures of playing football at a major university. Each deals with the pressure differently, some turn to drinking, others to drugs, and some to studying.

title: Cyrano
synopsis: Too self-conscious to woo Roxanne himself, wordsmith Cyrano de Bergerac helps young Christian nab her heart through love letters.

title: The Goldfinch
synopsis: A boy in New York is taken in by a wealthy family after his mother is killed in a bombing at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In a rush of panic, he steals 'The Goldfinch', a painting that eventually draws him into a world of crime.

title: Archive
synopsis: 2038: George Almore is working on a true human-equivalent AI. His latest prototype is almost ready. This sensitive phase is also the riskiest. Especially as he has a goal that must be hidden at all costs.

title: Dhokha: Round D Corner
synopsis: When a housewife with a personality disorder is taken hostage by a terrorist on the loose and a husband accused of cheating on his wife, have their own versions of reality, how do we know ... See full summary »

title: The Hot Spot
synopsis: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

title: Beach Rats
synopsis: A Brooklyn teenager spends his days experimenting with drugs and looking online for older men to meet.

title: Valley Girl
synopsis: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

title: Extra Ordinary
synopsis: Rose, a mostly sweet and lonely Irish driving instructor, must use her supernatural talents to save the daughter of Martin (also mostly sweet and lonely) from a washed-up rock star who is using her in a Satanic pact to reignite his fame.

title: Hanyo
synopsis: A man's affair with his family's housemaid leads to dark consequences.

title: Less Than Zero
synopsis: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

title: À ma soeur!
synopsis: Two sisters confront their sexual attitudes and experiences while on a family holiday.

title: Joe Kidd
synopsis: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

title: The Assistant
synopsis: A searing look at a day in the life of an assistant to a powerful executive. As Jane follows her daily routine, she grows increasingly aware of the insidious abuse that threatens every aspect of her position.

title: Mississippi Grind
synopsis: Down on his luck and facing financial hardship, Gerry teams up with younger charismatic poker player, Curtis, in an attempt to change his luck. The two set off on a road trip through the South with visions of winning back what's been lost.

title: Bad Samaritan
synopsis: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

title: Urban Cowboy
synopsis: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

title: Injustice
synopsis: On an alternate Earth, the Joker tricks Superman into killing Lois Lane, which causes a rampage in the hero. Superman decides to take control of Earth; Batman and his allies will have to attempt to stop him.

title: Explorers
synopsis: A boy obsessed with '50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

title: Hell House LLC
synopsis: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

title: The Personal History of David Copperfield
synopsis: A modern take on Charles Dickens's classic tale of a young orphan who is able to triumph over many obstacles.

title: Baby Boy
synopsis: In South Central L.A., a misguided 20-year-old African-American man, a "baby boy", faces the commitments of real life.

title: HHhH
synopsis: As the German Fascists expand their borders, scorching Europe from end to end, two brave Czechs of the Resistance prepare for a suicide mission to assassinate Reinhard Heydrich, the hideous mastermind behind the "Final Solution".

title: Brokedown Palace
synopsis: Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.

title: Kajillionaire
synopsis: A woman's life is turned upside down when her criminal parents invite an outsider to join them on a major heist they're planning.

title: Extraordinary Measures
synopsis: A drama centered on the efforts of John and Aileen Crowley to find a researcher who might have a cure for their two children's rare genetic disorder.

title: La belle et la bête
synopsis: An unexpected romance blooms after the the youngest daughter of a merchant who has fallen on hard times offers herself to the mysterious beast to which her father has become indebted.

title: Where the Truth Lies
synopsis: Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

title: Jamón Jamón
synopsis: When a mother disapproves of her son's lover, she hires an underwear model and former bullfighter to seduce her away.

title: Mayhem
synopsis: A virus spreads through an office complex causing white-collar workers to act out their worst impulses.

title: Inventing the Abbotts
synopsis: Two working class brothers court three wealthy and beautiful sisters in a small Illinois town.

title: Gon-ji-am
synopsis: The crew of a horror web series travels to an abandoned asylum for a live broadcast. It soon encounters much more than expected as it moves deeper inside the nightmarish old building.

title: The Souvenir
synopsis: A young film student in the early '80s becomes romantically involved with a complicated and untrustworthy man.

title: Shivers
synopsis: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are being infected by a strain of parasites that turn them into mindless, sex-crazed fiends out to infect others by the slightest sexual contact.

title: The Survivalist
synopsis: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.

title: Black and Blue
synopsis: A rookie New Orleans police officer is forced to balance her identity as a black woman after she witnesses two corrupt cops committing murder.

title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
synopsis: A vulgar private detective is hired to find a missing groupie and is drawn into a mystery involving a series of murders tied to the music industry.

title: Every Day
synopsis: A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.

title: Laurel Canyon
synopsis: When an uptight young man and his fiancée move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.

title: A Boy and His Dog
synopsis: A young man and his telepathic dog wander a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

title: Shampoo
synopsis: On Election Day, 1968, a hairdresser and ladies' man is too busy cutting hair and dealing with his various girlfriends and his mistress, whose husband he meets and finds out is having an affair with his ex-girlfriend.

title: The Kentucky Fried Movie
synopsis: A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.

title: The Opposite of Sex
synopsis: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

title: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
synopsis: A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.

title: I Still Believe
synopsis: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.

title: The Slammin' Salmon
synopsis: The owner of a Miami restaurant indebted to the mob institutes a contest to see what waiter can earn the most money in one night.

title: London
synopsis: London is a drug laden adventure that centers on a party in a New York loft where a young man is trying to win back his ex-girlfriend.

title: Mary Shelley
synopsis: Life and facts of Mary Wollstonecraft Godwin, who at 16 met 21 year old poet Percy Shelley, resulting in the writing of Frankenstein.

title: Blue Thunder
synopsis: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

title: War Room
synopsis: A seemingly perfect family looks to fix their problems with the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman.

title: Hunter Hunter
synopsis: Joseph and his family live in the remote wilderness as fur trappers, but their tranquility is threatened when they think they are being hunted by the return of a rogue wolf, and Joseph leaves them behind to track it.

title: Sputnik
synopsis: The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned home alone - hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature.

title: Chained
synopsis: A young man held prisoner by a cab-driving serial killer must make a life or death choice between following in his captor's footsteps or breaking free.

title: The Congress
synopsis: An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.

title: Blow the Man Down
synopsis: Mary Beth and Priscilla Connolly attempt to cover up a gruesome run-in with a dangerous man. To conceal their crime, the sisters must go deep into the criminal underbelly of their hometown, uncovering the town's darkest secrets.

title: Best of the Best
synopsis: A team from the United States is going to compete against Korea in a Tae Kwon Do tournament. The team consists of fighters from all over the country - can they overcome their rivalry and work together to win?

title: Maniac
synopsis: A psychopathic man goes on a killing and mutilation spree in New York City.

title: Ideal Home
synopsis: A bickering gay couple must suddenly deal with the unexpected task of raising a 10-year-old boy.

title: Pacific Heights
synopsis: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

title: Elvis & Nixon
synopsis: The untold true story behind the meeting between Elvis Presley, the King of Rock 'n Roll, and President Richard Nixon, resulting in this revealing, yet humorous moment immortalized in the most requested photograph in the National Archives.

title: Communion
synopsis: In 1961, a divorced Catholic couple's life is turned upside-down when one of their two adolescent daughters is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her First Holy Communion and a series of subsequent stabbings.

title: Young Adam
synopsis: A young drifter working on a river barge disrupts his employers' lives while hiding the fact that he knows more about a dead woman found in the river than he admits.

title: The High Note
synopsis: A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers.

title: Fireproof
synopsis: In an attempt to save his marriage, a firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as "The Love Dare."

title: Forsaken
synopsis: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father Reverend Samuel Clayton while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

title: Switchback
synopsis: An FBI agent tries to catch a serial killer who kidnapped his son.

title: Force 10 from Navarone
synopsis: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

title: Angel of Mine
synopsis: A woman grieving over the death of her daughter loses grip of reality when she begins to think her girl may still be alive.

title: Message from the King
synopsis: Jacob King, a mysterious outsider from South Africa, arrives in Los Angeles to look for his missing younger sister.

title: Hogar
synopsis: Javier Muñoz, once a successful executive, makes the fateful decision to leave his home, which he and his family can no longer afford.

title: Dirty Girl
synopsis: It's 1987 and Danielle, the high-school 'Dirty Girl', is running away. With her is chubby, gay Clarke, a bag of flour called Joa and a Walkman full of glorious '80s tunes.

title: Brainstorm
synopsis: Researchers develop a system where they can jump into people's minds. But when people involved bring their personal problems into the equation, it becomes dangerous - perhaps deadly.

title: Chances Are
synopsis: A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory.

title: Big Business
synopsis: Two couples of sisters from New York and from the countryside discover that they are connected in an incredible way.

title: El guardián invisible
synopsis: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

title: The Mortuary Collection
synopsis: An eccentric mortician recounts several macabre and phantasmagorical tales that he's encountered in his distinguished career.

title: The Freshman
synopsis: An N.Y.C. film school student accepts a job with a local mobster who resembles a famous cinema godfather and who takes the young man under his wing, after demanding total loyalty.

title: Shining Through
synopsis: An American woman of Irish and Jewish-German parentage goes undercover in Nazi Germany.

title: Into the Night
synopsis: After discovering that his wife is cheating on him, an insomniac aerospace engineer accidentally meets, and tries to help, a beautiful model on the run from some extremely dangerous people.

title: Tom Jones
synopsis: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th-century England.

title: Kid Cannabis
synopsis: An eighteen year old high school drop out and his twenty-seven year old friend start trafficking marijuana across the border of Canada in order to make money and their lives are changed forever.

title: Wheelman
synopsis: A getaway driver for a bank robbery realizes he has been double crossed and races to find out who betrayed him.

title: Enigma
synopsis: A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.

title: Parkland
synopsis: A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Memorial Hospital on the day President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.

title: Burnt Offerings
synopsis: A family moves into a large old mansion in the countryside which seems to have a mysterious and sinister power over its new residents.

title: The Devil's Candy
synopsis: A struggling painter's possessed by dark forces after he and his young family move into their dream home in rural Texas, in this creepy haunted-house tale.

title: Boys on the Side
synopsis: Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close friends.

title: Factory Girl
synopsis: Based on the rise and fall of socialite Edie Sedgwick, concentrating on her relationships with Andy Warhol and a folk singer.

title: Not Without My Daughter
synopsis: An American woman trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutal husband must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.

title: Big Trouble
synopsis: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

title: Down in the Valley
synopsis: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

title: The Gauntlet
synopsis: A hard but mediocre cop is assigned to escort a prostitute into custody from Las Vegas to Phoenix, so that she can testify in a mob trial. But a lot of people are literally betting that they won't make it into town alive.

title: Love in the Time of Cholera
synopsis: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

title: The Jazz Singer
synopsis: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

title: New York Stories
synopsis: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12-year-old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three Gotham tales.

title: When a Stranger Calls
synopsis: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

title: The Yards
synopsis: Leo is released from prison after serving time for car theft. His plan to go straight falls apart when he meets his corrupt uncle for a job and later an old friend working there. It culminates at the (railroad) yards.

title: Unlawful Entry
synopsis: A burglar holds a knife to Karen's throat while her husband does nothing. The couple ends up befriending the cop that comes. The friendship ends when the cop beats up the culprit. Karen isn't ready to end it. Things get ugly with the cop.

title: Naboer
synopsis: John has just been left by his girlfriend Ingrid. That day he allows himself to be seduced into a mystical and scary world, where it is impossible to separate truth from the lies

title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
synopsis: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.

title: Fierce Creatures
synopsis: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

title: The Other Sister
synopsis: A mentally challenged young woman seeks independence by obtaining her own apartment and attending college while her family plans her sister's wedding.

title: I Love You to Death
synopsis: Joey Boca (Kevin Kline) owns a pizza parlor, and is married to Rosalie (Tracey Ullman). He's also a serial womanizer. Rosalie goes to extremes when she finds he has been cheating.

title: Anna
synopsis: A man with the ability to enter people's memories takes on the case of a brilliant, troubled sixteen-year-old girl to determine whether she is a sociopath or a victim of trauma.

title: Certain Women
synopsis: The lives of three women intersect in small-town America, where each is imperfectly blazing a trail.

title: Evening
synopsis: A drama exploring the romantic past and emotional present of Ann Lord (Vanessa Redgrave) and her daughters, Constance Haverford (Natasha Richardson) and Nina Mars (Toni Collette). As Ann lays dying, she remembers, and is moved to convey to her daughters, the defining moments in her life fifty years ago, when she was a young woman. Harris Arden (Patrick Wilson) is the man Ann loves in the 1950s ... See full summary »

title: Remo Williams: The Adventure Begins
synopsis: An officially "dead" cop is trained to become an extraordinary unique assassin in service of the US President.

title: Errementari
synopsis: A quiet village is thrown into turmoil upon disturbing a reclusive and feared blacksmith rumored to be in league with the devil.

title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
synopsis: The tale of an outlaw who escapes from prison and sets out across the Texas hills to reunite with his wife and the daughter he has never met.

title: Coogan's Bluff
synopsis: Arizona Deputy Sheriff Coogan is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

title: Goliyon Ki Rasleela Ram-Leela
synopsis: Modern adaptation of William Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet' with an Indian twist, the film focuses on the story of Ram and Leela, their love, lust and the drama afterwards.

title: Lonely Hearts
synopsis: Based on the true story, two homicide detectives track Martha Beck and Raymond Martinez Fernandez, a murderous pair known as the "Lonely Hearts Killers" who lured their victims through the personals.

title: The Package
synopsis: Experienced Green Beret sergeant Johnny Gallagher is escorting a prisoner, Airborne Ranger Thomas Boyette, back to the US, but Boyette escapes and Gallagher must risk life and limb to catch him.

title: Flawless
synopsis: An ultraconservative security guard suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons with the drag queen next door.

title: Lust Stories
synopsis: Four short films by four of India's biggest directors exploring love, sex and relationships in modern India.

title: Chappaquiddick
synopsis: Depicting Ted Kennedy's involvement in the fatal 1969 car accident that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne.

title: Crying Freeman
synopsis: A woman sees an assassin outside San Francisco killing yakuza men and later in Vancouver. She's been told that he leaves no witness. Will she be his next victim or...?

title: Mr. Destiny
synopsis: Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could've been like, had he made that winning home run as a teenager.

title: Good Kill
synopsis: A family man begins to question the ethics of his job as a drone pilot.

title: Red Joan
synopsis: The story of Joan Stanley, who was exposed as the K.G.B.'s longest-serving British spy.

title: The Addiction
synopsis: A New York philosophy grad student turns into a vampire after getting bitten by one, and then tries to come to terms with her new lifestyle and frequent craving for human blood.

title: Asoka
synopsis: The epic tale of King Asoka's life is recounted.

title: Nativity!
synopsis: An uptight but secretly heartbroken primary school teacher's little white lie about Hollywood coming to see his class' nativity play grows like wildfire in his rag-tag school low on self-esteem.

title: Black Widow
synopsis: A federal investigator tracks down a gold-digging woman who moves from husband to husband to kill them and collect the inheritance.

title: Seong lung wui
synopsis: Identical twins are separated at birth, one becoming a streetwise mechanic, and the other an acclaimed classical concert conductor. Finally meeting in adulthood, they each become mistaken for the other and entangled in each other's world.

title: Alpeis
synopsis: A group of people start a business where they impersonate the recently deceased in order to help their clients through the grieving process.

title: Rogue Trader
synopsis: The story of Nick Leeson, an ambitious investment broker who singlehandedly bankrupted one of the oldest and most important banks in Britain.

title: Phantasm II
synopsis: Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, meets with Reggie, and discover his dreams ( the events of the original film) are real, and they both journey to find and stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.

title: Cheung gong 7 hou
synopsis: A poor Chinese laborer learns important lessons after his son gets a strange new toy.

title: The Odd Couple II
synopsis: Oscar and Felix take a road trip to their son and daughter's wedding.

title: Human Nature
synopsis: A woman is in love with a man in love with another woman, and all three have designs on a young man raised as an ape.

title: Just Before I Go
synopsis: On the verge of giving up on life, a guy travels to his hometown to make amends.

title: Fireflies in the Garden
synopsis: The Taylor family is devastated by an accident that takes place on the day their matriarch is due to graduate from college -- decades after leaving to raise her children.

title: Yi ge ren de wu lin
synopsis: A martial arts instructor from the police force gets imprisoned after killing a man by accident. But when a vicious killer starts targeting martial arts masters, the instructor offers to help the police in return for his freedom.

title: Soul Men
synopsis: Though it's been about twenty years since they have spoken with one another, two estranged soul-singing legends agree to participate in a reunion performance at the Apollo Theater to honor their recently deceased band leader.

title: Vidocq
synopsis: Paris, 1830: Vidocq is killed by a mirror masked man. A thief turned investigator, he was working on a case of men killed by lightning. His biographer tries to solve the case.

title: Ginger Snaps 2: Unleashed
synopsis: Ginger's sister Brigitte, now a werewolf herself, must try to find a cure for her blood lust before the next full moon while hiding out in a rehab clinic from a relentless werewolf.

title: Jingle Jangle: A Christmas Journey
synopsis: An imaginary world comes to life in a holiday tale of an eccentric toymaker, his adventurous granddaughter, and a magical invention that has the power to change their lives forever.

title: Stop-Loss
synopsis: A veteran soldier returns from his completed tour of duty in Iraq, only to find his life turned upside down when he is arbitrarily ordered to return to field duty by the Army.

title: Charlotte Gray
synopsis: A young Scottish woman joins the French Resistance during World War II to rescue her Royal Air Force boyfriend who is lost in France.

title: Miles Ahead
synopsis: An exploration of the life and music of Miles Davis.

title: Tarantula
synopsis: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

title: The Great Buck Howard
synopsis: A young man, much to the chagrin of his father, becomes the new assistant to an illusionist in decline.

title: Baiohazado: Damuneshon
synopsis: Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe.

title: Being Flynn
synopsis: Working in a Boston homeless shelter, Nick Flynn re-encounters his father, a con man and self-proclaimed poet. Sensing trouble in his own life, Nick wrestles with the notion of reaching out yet again to his dad.

title: Largo Winch
synopsis: After a powerful billionaire is murdered, his secret adoptive son must race to prove his legitimacy, find his father's killers, and stop them from taking over his financial empire.

title: Avalon
synopsis: In a dystopian world, a woman spends her time playing an illegal and dangerous game, hoping to find meaning in her world.

title: You Kill Me
synopsis: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hitman befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.

title: Las brujas de Zugarramurdi
synopsis: A gang of armed robbers finds a safe haven in a secluded village crammed with witches--only to encounter the bizarre, the unexpected, and the occult. Can they save themselves, and the rest of the world from the next witch apocalypse?

title: Foolproof
synopsis: Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.

title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
synopsis: The wacky adventures of a young man who is willing to sacrifice his own love to insure the happiness of others, even trying to get the girl of his dreams married to the guy of her dreams.

title: Kyaputen Hârokku
synopsis: Mankind is dying. Only one man can do anything about it, Space Captain Harlock, but the Gaia Coalition will stop at nothing to end him.

title: Krrish
synopsis: Krishna is forced by circumstances to use his superpowers and become the masked superhero Krrish, before getting drawn towards his lost legacy.

title: Jagga Jasoos
synopsis: Join Jagga, a gifted teenage detective, who along with a female companion, is on a quest to find his missing father.

title: Criminal
synopsis: Two con artists try to swindle a currency collector by selling him a counterfeit copy of an extremely rare currency bill.

title: Ashby
synopsis: High-school student Ed Wallis enters into a friendship with his neighbor, Ashby, a retired CIA assassin who only has a few months left to live.

title: Rien à déclarer
synopsis: A Belge-Francophobe customs officer is forced to team up with a Frenchman during the elimination of the Franco-Belge borders in the 90s.

title: Extracted
synopsis: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.

title: It's a Disaster
synopsis: Four couples meet for Sunday brunch, then discover they are stuck in a house together as the world may be about to end.

title: Henry Poole Is Here
synopsis: Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighborhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a "miracle" by a nosy neighbor ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life.

title: Juan de los muertos
synopsis: A group of slackers face an army of zombies. The Cuban government and media claim the living dead are dissidents revolting against the government.

title: Brothers
synopsis: After living many years together, two brothers discover that they are not blood related so square off in a mixed martial arts tournament to determine whose blood is stronger.

title: Potiche
synopsis: A housewife and grandma takes over the family business 1977, after her husband is hurt during a strike.

title: Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi
synopsis: Story of Rani Lakshmibai, one of the leading figures of the Indian Rebellion of 1857, and her resistance to the British Rule.

title: Ritânâ
synopsis: A young woman from the future forces a local gunman to help her stop an impending alien invasion which will wipe out the human race.

title: Karakomik Filmler: 2 Arada
synopsis: Metin Arici who has been working as a staff for a ferry in Istanbul for a long time, also has been living in the same vehicle for 6 years. An interviewer visits them one day to evaluate how... See full summary »

title: Hot Summer Nights
synopsis: In 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

title: Clerks III
synopsis: Dante, Elias, and Jay and Silent Bob are enlisted by Randal after a heart attack to make a movie about the convenience store that started it all.

title: Chloe
synopsis: Suspecting her husband of infidelity, gynecologist Dr. Catherine Stewart hires an escort named Chloe in order to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.

title: Pahanhautoja
synopsis: A young gymnast, who tries desperately to please her demanding mother, discovers a strange egg. She hides it and keeps it warm, but when it hatches, what emerges shocks them all.

title: Look Both Ways
synopsis: On the eve of her college graduation, Natalie's life diverges into parallel realities: one in which she becomes pregnant and remains in her hometown to raise her child and another in which she moves to LA to pursue her dream career.

title: Newness
synopsis: In contemporary Los Angeles, two millennials navigating a social media-driven hookup culture begin a relationship that pushes both emotional and physical boundaries.

title: The Burning
synopsis: A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.

title: Sand Castle
synopsis: The story follows a young soldier, and his introduction into the 2003 invasion of Iraq. Based on true events, it bears witness to the destruction, and horrors of war.

title: The Fury
synopsis: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.

title: The Frisco Kid
synopsis: A Polish rabbi wanders through the Old West on his way to lead a synagogue in San Francisco. On the way, he is nearly burned at the stake by Native Americans and almost killed by outlaws.

title: The Nest
synopsis: Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.

title: Run Hide Fight
synopsis: 17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.

title: Barb and Star Go to Vista Del Mar
synopsis: Lifelong friends Barb and Star embark on the adventure of a lifetime when they decide to leave their small Midwestern town for the first time - ever.

title: Eight for Silver
synopsis: In rural 19th-century France, a mysterious, possibly supernatural menace threatens a small village. John McBride, a pathologist, comes to town to investigate the danger - and exorcise some of his own demons in the process.

title: Queenpins
synopsis: A pair of housewives create a $40 million coupon scam.

title: Annette
synopsis: A stand-up comedian and his opera singer wife have a two-year-old daughter with a surprising gift.

title: One Crazy Summer
synopsis: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

title: Lake Mungo
synopsis: Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.

title: The Starling
synopsis: After Lilly suffers a loss, a combative Starling takes nest beside her quiet home. The feisty bird taunts and attacks the grief-stricken Lilly. On her journey to expel the Starling, she rediscovers her will to live and capacity for love.

title: The Only Living Boy in New York
synopsis: Adrift in New York City, a recent college graduate's life is upended by his father's mistress.

title: The Aftermath
synopsis: Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.

title: Irresistible
synopsis: A Democratic strategist helps a retired veteran run for mayor in a small, conservative Midwest town.

title: Vacation Friends
synopsis: An uptight couple makes friends with a rowdy couple while on vacation in Mexico, but their friendship takes an awkward turn when they get back home.

title: Night of the Comet
synopsis: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

title: The Deep End of the Ocean
synopsis: A film about a family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son is kidnapped and then found nine years later, living in the same town, where his family had just moved.

title: Henry & June
synopsis: Anaïs Nin meets American writer Henry Miller in Paris in 1931. She keeps a diary of her sexual awakening, which includes Henry and his wife June.

title: Feel the Beat
synopsis: After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

title: License to Drive
synopsis: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

title: Convoy
synopsis: Truckers form a mile-long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff - Based on the country song of the same title by C.W. McCall.

title: Chemical Hearts
synopsis: A high-school transfer student finds a new passion when she begins to work on the school's newspaper.

title: Because of Winn-Dixie
synopsis: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

title: Over the Moon
synopsis: In this animated musical, a girl builds a rocket ship and blasts off, hoping to meet a mythical moon goddess.

title: Womb
synopsis: A woman's consuming love forces her to bear the clone of her dead beloved. From his infancy to manhood, she faces the unavoidable complexities of her controversial decision.

title: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote
synopsis: Toby, a disillusioned film director, is pulled into a world of time-jumping fantasy when a Spanish cobbler believes himself to be Sancho Panza. He gradually becomes unable to tell dreams from reality.

title: Mulholland Falls
synopsis: In 1950's Los Angeles, a special crime squad of the LAPD investigates the murder of a young woman.

title: Escape to Witch Mountain
synopsis: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

title: Noruwei no mori
synopsis: Toru recalls his life in the 1960s, when his friend Kizuki killed himself and he grew close to Naoko, Kizuki's girlfriend, and another woman, the outgoing, lively Midori.

title: Baby Boom
synopsis: The life of super-yuppie J.C. is thrown into turmoil when she inherits a baby from a distant relative.

title: The United States vs. Billie Holiday
synopsis: Follows Holiday during her career as she is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by black Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with whom she has a tumultuous affair.

title: Rabid
synopsis: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.

title: Dreamscape
synopsis: A man who can enter and manipulate people's dreams is recruited by a government agency to help cure the President of the United States of his nightmares about nuclear war but stumbles upon an assassination plot.

title: The Willoughbys
synopsis: Convinced they'd be better off raising themselves, the Willoughby children hatch a sneaky plan to send their selfish parents on vacation. The siblings then embark on their own high-flying adventure to find the true meaning of family.

title: Austenland
synopsis: Obsessed with Pride and Prejudice (1995), a woman travels to a Jane Austen theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.

title: The Eiger Sanction
synopsis: Classical art professor and collector Dr. Jonathan Hemlock, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

title: The Sentinel
synopsis: A young woman moves into an apartment in a building which houses a sinister evil.

title: Uncommon Valor
synopsis: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.

title: Freaky Friday
synopsis: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

title: The Limehouse Golem
synopsis: In Victorian London, a Scotland Yard inspector hunts down the sadistic killer behind a series of gory, Jack the Ripper-Like murders.

title: Country Strong
synopsis: A rising country-music songwriter works with a fallen star to work their way to fame, causing romantic complications along the way.

title: Hoodlum
synopsis: Black gangsters in 1930 Harlem fights Dutch Schultz who is trying to horn in on their numbers racket.

title: On Chesil Beach
synopsis: In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.

title: Balle perdue
synopsis: A small time delinquent, turned police mechanic for a go fast task force, is forced to defend his innocence when his mentor is killed by dirty cops.

title: Wizards
synopsis: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a wizard and his faire folk comrades fight an evil wizard who's using technology in his bid for conquest.

title: Resolution
synopsis: A man imprisons his estranged junkie friend in an isolated cabin in the boonies of San Diego to force him through a week of sobriety, but the events of that week are being mysteriously manipulated.

title: Threesome
synopsis: A girl named Alex is by mistake housed with 2 guys, Stuart and Eddy, in a college dorm suite. After initial problems they become friends. Stuart has the hots for Alex, Alex for Eddy and Eddy for Stuart. Can it work?

title: Wakefield
synopsis: Bryan Cranston gives the performance of a lifetime as Howard Wakefield, a lawyer on the edge of madness who has decided to disassociate himself from his own life.

title: Nighthawks
synopsis: When one of Europe's most lethal terrorists shows up in New York, an elite undercover cop is assigned to take him down by any means necessary.

title: He Never Died
synopsis: Jack, a social outcast, is thrust out of his comfort zone when the outside world bangs on his door and he can't contain his violent past.

title: Breathe In
synopsis: When a foreign exchange student arrives in a small upstate New York town, she challenges the dynamics of her host family's relationships and alters their lives forever.

title: Dolls
synopsis: A dysfunctional family of three stop by a mansion during a storm -- father, stepmother, and child. The child discovers that the elderly owners are magical toy makers and have a haunted collection of dolls.

title: Art School Confidential
synopsis: Starting from childhood attempts at illustration, the protagonist pursues his true obsession to art school. But as he learns how the art world really works, he finds that he must adapt his vision to the reality that confronts him.

title: Loving Pablo
synopsis: A journalist strikes up a romantic relationship with notorious drug lord Pablo Escobar.

title: The Baytown Outlaws
synopsis: When three redneck brothers agree to help a woman save her godson from an abusive stepfather, they become targets on the run from an odd cast of characters.

title: Shimmer Lake
synopsis: An inventive crime thriller told backwards reversing day by day through a week following a local sheriff's quest to unlock the mystery of three small-town criminals and a bank heist gone wrong.

title: Fast Food Nation
synopsis: An examination of the health risks involved in the fast food industry as well as its environmental and social consequences.

title: Noelle
synopsis: Santa's daughter must take over the family business when her father retires and her brother, who is supposed to inherit the Santa role, gets cold feet.

title: Little Monsters
synopsis: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids'-show personality to protect young children from a sudden outbreak of zombies.

title: Great Expectations
synopsis: A series of events change the orphaned Pip's life forever as he eagerly abandons his humble origins to begin a new life as a gentleman.

title: Alien Nation
synopsis: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

title: Koma
synopsis: After a mysterious accident, a young architect comes back to his senses in a very odd world. He must find out the exact laws and regulations of it while he fights for his life and keeps looking for an exit to the real world.

title: Loving Annabelle
synopsis: The intelligent Annabelle starts in an elite Catholic girls' boarding high school after being expelled from the previous 2 schools. She's open about being lesbian. She's attracted to her teacher, Simone.

title: Greedy
synopsis: Rich, old uncle Joe is surrounded by relatives waiting/hoping for him to die while trying to look good and backstabbing the competition. What should he do?

title: Headshot
synopsis: Uwais plays a young man who washes ashore, an amnesiac with a serious head injury whose past comes back to haunt him shortly after being nursed back to health by a young doctor. Violence ensues. Sweet, sweet violence.

title: 20 ans d'écart
synopsis: Alice works for "Rebelle" magazine, where she needs to let her hair down to get a promotion. When Balthazar returns a lost USB to Alice, the appearance of dating someone half her age helps her. Does it get real?

title: For Your Consideration
synopsis: Three actors learn that their respective performances in the film "Home for Purim," a drama set in the mid-1940s American South, are generating award-season buzz.

title: Bandslam
synopsis: A new kid in town assembles a fledgling rock band -- together, they achieve their dreams and compete against the best in the biggest event of the year, a battle of the bands.

title: Tightrope
synopsis: New Orleans single dad and cop Wes Block goes after a serial rapist-killer, but when he gets too close the hunter suddenly becomes the hunted.

title: The Principal
synopsis: A teacher is assigned to be the principal of a violent and crime-ridden high school.

title: Lo squartatore di New York
synopsis: A burned-out New York police detective teams up with a college psychoanalyst to track down a vicious serial killer randomly stalking and killing various young women around the city.

title: Mayor Grom: Chumnoy Doktor
synopsis: Supercop Grom fights crime in St. Petersburg - an uphill battle. A vigilante starts killing the powerful, who escaped justice.

title: Made
synopsis: Two aspiring boxers, life-long friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

title: Lone Wolf McQuade
synopsis: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

title: Bleach: Burîchu
synopsis: A Japanese teenager with the ability to see ghosts gains a soul reaper's powers and begins his duties as a substitute soul reaper.

title: Mad City
synopsis: A distraught man inadvertently takes a group of children hostage in a museum while a hungry, seasoned reporter tries to resurrect his career covering the story.

title: Don't Let Go
synopsis: After a man's family dies in what appears to be a murder, he gets a phone call from one of the dead, his niece. He's not sure if she's a ghost or if he's going mad, but as it turns out, he's not.

title: Mindhorn
synopsis: A has-been actor best known for playing the title character in the 1980s detective series "Mindhorn" must work with the police when a serial killer says that he will only speak with Detective Mindhorn, whom he believes to be a real person.

title: Only the Lonely
synopsis: A Chicago cop must balance loyalty to his overbearing mother and a relationship with a shy funeral home worker.

title: Blind Fury
synopsis: A blind Vietnam vet, trained as a swordfighter, comes to America and helps to rescue the son of a fellow soldier.

title: Alex Strangelove
synopsis: Alex, high school class president, nerd and a straight A student, has been dating Claire a long time. They decide to sleep together but then he meets a gay guy and he's confused.

title: The Private Lives of Pippa Lee
synopsis: After her much older husband forces a move to a suburban retirement community, Pippa Lee engages in a period of reflection and finds herself heading toward a quiet nervous breakdown.

title: Gung Ho
synopsis: When a Japanese car company buys an American plant, the American liaison must mediate the clash of work attitudes between the foreign management and native labor.

title: Jennifer Eight
synopsis: John Berlin, a former Los Angeles homicide detective, investigates a multiple murder case in San Diego. The only witness is a blind girl to whom he is immediately attracted.

title: Green Card
synopsis: A man wanting to stay in the US enters into a marriage of convenience, but it turns into more than that.

title: Deathgasm
synopsis: Two teenage boys unwittingly summon an ancient evil entity known as The Blind One by delving into black magic while trying to escape their mundane lives.

title: How to Make an American Quilt
synopsis: Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.

title: Surveillance
synopsis: Two FBI agents attempt to clarify the murders occurring in a desolate region. They approach the witnesses of the latest incident with the help of the local police. All of them hide something and all have wildly different stories to tell.

title: The Rewrite
synopsis: An Oscar-winning writer in a slump leaves Hollywood to teach screenwriting at a college on the East Coast, where he falls for a single mom taking classes there.

title: Grabbers
synopsis: When an island off the coast of Ireland is invaded by bloodsucking aliens, the heroes discover that getting drunk is the only way to survive.

title: Sing si lip yan
synopsis: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

title: Gloria Bell
synopsis: A free-spirited woman in her 50s seeks out love at L.A. dance clubs.

title: Les aventures extraordinaires d'Adèle Blanc-Sec
synopsis: An adventure set in the early part of the 20th century and focused on a popular novelist and her dealings with would-be suitors, the cops, monsters, and other distractions.

title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
synopsis: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

title: Jamaica Inn
synopsis: In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.

title: Great Balls of Fire!
synopsis: The life and career of wildly controversial rock 'n' roll star Jerry Lee Lewis.

title: Prince Avalanche
synopsis: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.

title: The Hard Way
synopsis: An action movie star researching a role is allowed to tag along with a hardboiled New York City policeman, who finds him superficial and irritating.

title: David Brent: Life on the Road
synopsis: A camera crew catches up with David Brent, the former star of the fictional British TV series The Office (2001), as he now fancies himself a rock star on the road.

title: The Conspiracy
synopsis: A documentary about conspiracy theories takes a horrific turn after the filmmakers uncover an ancient and dangerous secret society.

title: Wolfen
synopsis: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

title: The Three Caballeros
synopsis: Donald receives his birthday gifts, which include traditional gifts and information about Brazil (hosted by Zé Carioca) and Mexico (by Panchito, a Mexican Charro Rooster).

title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
synopsis: Turning her back on her wealthy, established family, Diane Arbus falls in love with Lionel Sweeney, an enigmatic mentor who introduces Arbus to the marginalized people who help her become one of the most revered photographers of the twentieth century.

title: The Ramen Girl
synopsis: An American woman is stranded in Tokyo after breaking up with her boyfriend. Searching for direction in life, she trains to be a râmen chef under a tyrannical Japanese master.

title: The Big White
synopsis: To remedy his financial problems, a travel agent has his eye on a frozen corpse, which just happens to be sought after by two hitmen.

title: Forces spéciales
synopsis: A French journalist in Afghanistan is kidnapped by the Taliban.

title: Pecker
synopsis: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

title: Cike Nie Yin Niang
synopsis: A female assassin receives a dangerous mission to kill a political leader in eighth-century China.

title: New Kids Turbo
synopsis: Five friends from 'Maaskantje' are getting fired because of the economic crisis. They decide that they won't pay for anything anymore.

title: Trespass
synopsis: Two firemen in a burning building get a treasure map - stolen gold church items are hidden in a closed down factory in St. Louis. Once there, they're trapped in by a black gang considering it their territory.

title: Der Rote Baron
synopsis: German biopic loosely based on the World War I fighter ace Manfred Von Richthofen, nicknamed the Red Baron by friend and foe alike.

title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Them
synopsis: One couple's story as they try to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

title: Love and Other Impossible Pursuits
synopsis: The story of a woman dealing with her infant daughter's death while trying to keep her marriage and her relationship with her stepson.

title: The Good Neighbor
synopsis: A pair of mischievous high school kids create the illusion of a haunting on an unsuspecting elderly neighbor while keeping his every reaction under surveillance. A series of coincidences leads to tragedy.

title: Bus Stop
synopsis: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

title: The Astronaut Farmer
synopsis: A NASA astronaut, forced to retire years earlier so he could save his family farm, has never given up his dream of space travel and looks to build his own rocket, despite the government's threats to stop him.

title: Solitary Man
synopsis: A car magnate watches his personal and professional life hit the skids because of his business and romantic indiscretions.

title: The Tigger Movie
synopsis: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

title: Shade
synopsis: A group of hustlers encounter "The Dean" and pull off a successful sting that results in their pursuit by a vengeful gangster.

title: The Meddler
synopsis: An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.

title: Je ne suis pas un homme facile

title: Plunkett & Macleane
synopsis: Two robbers are persecuted by the law, whose servants are not much better and even worse.

title: Billu

title: Paheli

title: Luka Chuppi

synopsis: After seeing his son married in the first movie of the series, Ismail is now having stress over his grandson's circumcision. When the old crew reunites, Ismail finds himself in all kinds of... See full summary »

title: The Little Shop of Horrors

title: Prozac Nation

title: Young People Fucking

title: A Dark Song

synopsis: 5 young Norwegians head up to the mountains to snowboard. One breaks his leg and it's getting dark soon, so they spend the night in a big, abandoned hotel, closed 30 years ago. They are not alone.

title: The Deep Blue Sea

title: Una
synopsis: When a young woman unexpectedly arrives at her much-older former lover's workplace, looking for answers, the secrets of their dark past threaten to unravel his new life. What follows is an ... See full summary »

title: The Eyes of My Mother
synopsis: In their secluded farmhouse, a mother (a former surgeon) teaches her daughter, Francisca, anatomy, and how life and death are not to be feared. One afternoon, a mysterious visitor shatters ... See full summary »

title: Renaissance Man

title: Sommersby

title: Tamara Drewe

title: Wyrmwood

title: D.A.R.Y.L.

title: Afflicted

title: Maggie's Plan

title: OtherLife

title: Resident Evil: Vendetta

title: Infinity Chamber

title: Mother's Day

title: Cuban Fury

title: Innocent Blood

title: UFO

title: Down and Out in Beverly Hills

title: Ginger & Rosa
synopsis: A look at the lives of two teenage girls - inseparable friends Ginger and Rosa -- growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms, and the pivotal event that comes to redefine their relationship.

title: Bill

title: Peacock
synopsis: A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk.

title: Three Fugitives

title: Mad Dog and Glory

title: The Limits of Control
synopsis: The story of a mysterious loner, a stranger in the process of completing a criminal job.

title: The Onion Movie
synopsis: Satirical interpretations of world events and curious human behavior.

title: Butter

title: Nightwatch
synopsis: A law student, who takes a job as a night watchman at a morgue, begins to discover clues that implicate him as the suspect of a series of murders.

title: Shadow Dancer

title: Impostor

title: Bride of Re-Animator

title: Sweet Virginia

title: I Am Not a Serial Killer

title: Extreme Measures

title: Bachna Ae Haseeno
synopsis: Raj is a heartbreaker. His love stories with Mahi, Radhika, and Gayatri finally teach him about love and life in their own sweet, sexy, and sassy ways.

title: Cecil B. Demented

title: White Zombie

title: Struck by Lightning

title: Jing wu feng yun: Chen Zhen
synopsis: Chen Zhen, believed dead, returns to 1930s Shanghai under a false name. He joins a mob boss for info on the Japanese incl. a long kill list and at night fights the Japanese masked.

title: Edmond
synopsis: A fortune-teller's teasing rumination sends Edmond Burke lurching into New York City's hellish underworld.

title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done

title: Tiny Furniture

title: Chakushin ari

title: Assassination of a High School President

synopsis: Douglas leads a simple and uneventful existence as a pharmacist in a small town.

title: Cleanskin

title: Casino Jack
synopsis: A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.

title: My Sassy Girl
synopsis: A sweet Midwestern guy with his life planned out for himself is wooed, groomed, and ultimately dumped by a complicated, elusive gal.

synopsis: Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.

title: Jilla

title: Thalaivaa
synopsis: A son steps into his father's shoes and has to win a bloody war before he becomes the leader.

title: No War
synopsis: John a CIA contractor goes to Ukraine with his team to look for Russian weapons of mass destruction and along the way takes with him a Ukrainian little girl found during a gunfight against ... See full summary »

title: Habitación en Roma
synopsis: A hotel room in the center of Rome serves as the setting for two young and recently acquainted women to have a physical adventure that touches their very souls.

title: Dear Evan Hansen

synopsis: A former cop who now earns a wage as a crime scene cleaner unknowingly participates in a cover-up at his latest job.
A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

title: A Perfect Pairing
synopsis: It follows a hard-driving LA wine-company executive who travels to an Australian sheep station to land a major client and there she ends up working as a ranch hand and sparking with a rugged local.

title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
synopsis: A group of 30-year-olds who have been friends since high school attempt to throw an end-of-summer orgy.

synopsis: The story of a man who returns home on Christmas to settle his estranged mother's estate. Once there, he discovers a diary that may hold secrets to his own past and of a beautiful young woman on a mysterious journey of her own.

synopsis: Four high school students look to redefine themselves after graduation.

synopsis: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

synopsis: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs, and sleaze.

title: Level 16

title: ATL
synopsis: As four friends prepare for life after high school, different challenges bring about turning points in each of their lives. The dramas unfold and resolve at their local rollerskating rink, Cascade.

title: The Kid Who Would Be King
synopsis: A band of kids embark on an epic quest to thwart a medieval menace.

title: The Sea of Trees

title: Shirley

title: Excision
synopsis: A disturbed, delusional high-school student with aspirations of a career in medicine goes to extremes to earn the approval of her controlling mother.

title: Below
synopsis: Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.

title: Like Father
synopsis: After she's left at the altar, a workaholic advertising executive ends up on her Caribbean honeymoon cruise with her estranged father.

title: In a Valley of Violence

title: The Lazarus Project
synopsis: A paroled former criminal is drawn into an endeavor that puts life with his family at risk and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.

title: No Escape

title: O

synopsis: Grieving hairdresser, Justice, goes on a road trip from South Central L.A. to Oakland on a mail truck alongside her friend and a postal worker which she cannot stand

synopsis: A group of young friends stranded at a secluded roadside museum are stalked by a masked assailant who uses his telekenetic powers to control the attraction's mannequins.

title: Sniper

title: God's Pocket

title: Waxwork

title: The Seasoning House
synopsis: Sold at a brothel deep in the woods to work as a caretaker, a hapless deaf girl must summon the courage to fight for her life.

title: Stockholm

A modern and stylish kaleidoscope of interconnected love and relationships linking characters from different cities and countries in a vivid, suspenseful and deeply moving tale of romantic life in the 21st century.

title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie - Rugrats II

title: In Hell

title: Someone to Watch Over Me

title: Employee of the Month
synopsis: It just isn't David's day. First he gets fired at the bank, then his fiancee breaks up and throws him out of the house. The bank gets robbed and he gets shot. Twists follow.

title: What's New Pussycat

title: Johnny Handsome

title: Calvaire

title: Alatriste

title: Love and Other Disasters

title: The Newton Boys
synopsis: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

title: Snow White: A Tale of Terror
synopsis: In this dark take on the fairy tale, the growing hatred of a noblewoman, secretly a practitioner of the dark arts, for her stepdaughter, and the witch's horrifying attempts to kill her.

title: Sukiyaki uesutan Jango

title: Hacker

title: The Cottage

title: Noel

title: Desierto

title: Valimai

title: Redacted

title: Wilderness

title: Assassination Games

title: Shivaay

title: Josh

title: Code 46

title: Bellbottom

title: Buster's Mal Heart

title: Greta

title: Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II

title: Smart People
synopsis: Into the life of a widowed professor comes a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

title: Brake

title: Yip Man: Jung gik yat zin
synopsis: In postwar Hong Kong, legendary Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man is reluctantly called into action once more, when what begin as simple challenges from rival kung fu styles soon draw him into ... See full summary »

title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
synopsis: Badrinath is looking for a typical bride; Vaidehi is looking for an independent life. Together they must break with tradition and redefine their role.

title: Yamakasi - Les samouraïs des temps modernes
synopsis: 7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.

title: Kabali
synopsis: A reformed gangster is released from prison and attempts to protect his family from his enemies.

title: Velayudham
synopsis: After a villager unwittingly prevents a number of terrorist attacks in Chennai, a young journalist identifies and persuades him to take on the disguise of a superhero to fight terrorism and corruption.

title: Billa 2
synopsis: David Billa builds up his drug and arms dealing empire, becoming a feared underworld boss.

title: The Voyeurs
synopsis: Pippa and Thomas move into their dream apartment, they notice that their windows look directly into the apartment opposite, this will set in motion a chain of events that will lead to disaster.

title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
synopsis: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

title: Not Okay

title: Home Team

title: Killshot

Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.

title: The Room

title: The Lair of the White Worm

title: Cold Skin

synopsis: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

title: Dead Man on Campus
synopsis: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

title: The Woman
synopsis: When a successful country lawyer captures and attempts to "civilize" the last remaining member of a violent clan that has roamed the Northeast coast for decades, he puts the lives of his family in jeopardy.

title: The Escort
synopsis: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

title: The Substitute
synopsis: Shale's Mercenary team is retired after a (not so) covert mission in Cuba. He becomes a substitute teacher at his teacher fiancee's Miami high school to get those behind kneecapping her. His team helps him.

title: Assassination Nation
synopsis: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
