synopsis: Under a dystopian religious tyranny, most women cannot conceive children. Those young women who can live in a form of sexual slavery to provide children for influential families.

title: True History of the Kelly Gang
synopsis: Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang flee from authorities during the 1870s.

title: Censor
synopsis: After viewing a strangely familiar video nasty, Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the past mystery of her sister's disappearance, embarking on a quest that dissolves the line between fiction and reality.

title: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
synopsis: Two female friends become sexual rivals at maturity.

title: Camp Nowhere
synopsis: A group of junior high kids don't want to go to summer camps chosen by their parents. They make their own adult-free camp and "hire" an ex drama teacher to help.

title: The Jungle Book
synopsis: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

title: The Caller
synopsis: A young divorcee is getting her life back together by moving into an apartment. But what will she do when a strange person repeatedly calls her, and threatens to change her new life around?

title: Harlem Nights
synopsis: During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.

title: Wuthering Heights
synopsis: A poor boy of unknown origins is rescued from poverty and taken in by the Earnshaw family where he develops an intense relationship with his young foster sister, Cathy.

title: The Wizard
synopsis: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross-country, with help from a girl they meet, to compete in the ultimate video-game championship.

title: Arkansas
synopsis: Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.

title: Ricki and the Flash
synopsis: A musician who gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom returns home, looking to make things right with her family.

title: Mil gritos tiene la noche
synopsis: The co-eds of a Boston college campus are targeted by a mysterious killer who is creating a human jigsaw puzzle from their body parts.

title: Backcountry
synopsis: An urban couple goes camping in the woods and find themselves lost in the territory of a predatory black bear.

title: The Riot Club
synopsis: Two first-year students at Oxford University join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single evening.

title: Little Monsters
synopsis: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

title: The Doom Generation
synopsis: Jordan White and Amy Blue, two troubled teens, pick up an adolescent drifter, Xavier Red. Together, the threesome embark on a sex-and-violence-filled journey through an America of psychos and quickie marts.

title: Split Second
synopsis: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.

title: The Alamo
synopsis: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

title: The Gate
synopsis: Kids left home alone accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

title: Happy Birthday to Me
synopsis: At the snobby Crawford Academy, Virginia's group of friends start to go missing years after horrible events that happened to her as a child around her birthday.

title: She's the One
synopsis: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

title: The Object of My Affection
synopsis: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

title: My Cousin Rachel
synopsis: A young Englishman plots revenge against his late cousin's mysterious, beautiful wife, believing her responsible for his death. But his feelings become complicated as he finds himself falling under the beguiling spell of her charms.

title: Ask Me Anything
synopsis: A confused teenager writes a blog revealing her daily activities and secrets, advised to do so by her high school guidance counselor in lieu of moving onto her first year in college.

title: Half Light
synopsis: Rachel Carlson, a successful novelist moves to a small Scottish village to move on with her life after the death of her son. Strange things start to happen when she is haunted by ghosts and real life terror.

title: Moonwalker
synopsis: Anthology movie by, and starring, Michael Jackson in his prime, combining a number of music videos from his bestselling "Bad" album with a fantasy tale of Michael's confrontation with a ruthless drug dealer known as Mr. Big.

title: How to Be a Latin Lover
synopsis: Finding himself dumped after twenty-five years of marriage, a man who made a career of seducing rich older women must move in with his estranged sister, where he begins to learn the value of family.

title: Starry Eyes
synopsis: A hopeful young starlet uncovers the ominous origins of the Hollywood elite and enters into a deadly agreement in exchange for fame and fortune.

title: La nuit a dévoré le monde
synopsis: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

title: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
synopsis: A time traveling scientist goes back to prehistoric times and feeds dinosaurs a magic cereal that increases their intelligence - next they land in modern New York City for a series of comic adventures.

title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
synopsis: Cheech and Chong live in a decrepit old house and drive their neighbour crazy with their loud music, weed smoking and general anarchy and slacker view on life. Then Chong meets Cheech's Texan cousin Red and things kick up a notch.

title: Three to Tango
synopsis: A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay, and begins to fall for the woman himself.

title: Bailout: The Age of Greed
synopsis: Jim, an average New Yorker, lives with a sick but loving wife. Suddenly, everything changes when the economy crashes and causes him to lose everything. Filled with anger and rage, Jim goes to seek revenge for the life taken from him.

title: Body Snatchers
synopsis: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

title: Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
synopsis: After years of mother-daughter tension, Siddalee receives a scrapbook detailing the wild adventures of the "Ya-Yas", her mother's girlhood friends.

title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
synopsis: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

title: Brainscan
synopsis: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.

title: The Polka King
synopsis: Local Pennsylvania polka legend Jan Lewan develops a plan to get rich that shocks his fans and lands him in jail.

title: Maniac Cop
synopsis: A killer dressed in a police uniform begins murdering innocent people on the streets of New York City.

title: The Secret of Moonacre
synopsis: Maria inherits a book of secrets from her dad. She moves to her uncle's Moonacre estate. A family curse was cast on the valley. Only Maria can break it using her book.

title: The Night Flier
synopsis: A reporter is on the trail of a vampiric murderer who travels by plane.

title: Motel Hell
synopsis: A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.

title: Medicine Man
synopsis: In the beautiful and dangerous Amazon rainforest, dissimilar people must make their choices between business, science, and love.

title: Senseless
synopsis: A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.

title: Raising Cain
synopsis: The oncologist wife of a prominent child psychologist suspects her husband has an unhealthy scientific obsession with their child, unaware of what - or who - is really going on inside his head.

title: Sap ji sang ciu
synopsis: A man searches the world for a set of mystic artifacts. The twelve bronze heads of the animals from the Chinese zodiac.

title: Lord of Illusions
synopsis: A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captivate the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.

title: Anna and the Apocalypse
synopsis: A zombie apocalypse threatens the sleepy town of Little Haven - at Christmas - forcing Anna and her friends to fight, slash and sing their way to survival, facing the undead in a desperate race to reach their loved ones. But they soon discover that no one is safe in this new world, and with civilization falling apart around them, the only people they can truly rely on are each other.

title: The Den
synopsis: While studying the habits of web cam chat users from the apparent safety of her own home, a young woman's life begins to spiral out of control after witnessing a grisly murder online.

title: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
synopsis: Dev, a former football player is married to Rhea, a successful fashion editor. Maya is a kindergarten teacher who is married to Rishi, an outgoing event planner. These couples' lives intersect and they each question their own marriage.

title: About Last Night
synopsis: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.

title: Night Moves
synopsis: Three radical environmentalists look to execute the protest of their lives: the explosion of a hydroelectric dam.

title: Come to Daddy
synopsis: A man in his thirties travels to a remote cabin to reconnect with his estranged father.

title: The Dark Half
synopsis: A writer's fictional alter ego wants to take over his life...at any price.

title: Churchill
synopsis: Ninety-six hours before the World War II invasion of Normandy, British Prime Minister Winston Churchill struggles with his severe reservations with Operation Overlord and his increasingly marginalized role in the war effort.

title: Dying Young
synopsis: A nurse falls in love with a terminally ill man.

title: Beatriz at Dinner
synopsis: A holistic medicine practitioner attends a wealthy client's dinner party after her car breaks down.

title: Bordertown
synopsis: A journalist investigates a series of murders near American-owned factories on the border of Juarez and El Paso.

title: Tragedy Girls
synopsis: A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.

title: The Maiden Heist
synopsis: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum.

title: Margot at the Wedding
synopsis: Margot and her son Claude decide to visit her sister Pauline after she announces that she is marrying less-than-impressive Malcolm.

title: Gerry
synopsis: A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.

title: Gekijô-ban poketto monsutâ: Maboroshi no pokemon: Rugia bakutan
synopsis: Ash Ketchum must gather the three spheres of fire, ice and lightning in order to restore balance to the Orange Islands.

title: Doghouse
synopsis: A group of men, heading to a remote village to help one of their friends get over his divorce, soon discover that all the women have been infected with a virus that makes them man-hating cannibals.

title: The Chamber
synopsis: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

title: Frágiles
synopsis: At her new job in a rundown children's hospital, a nurse desperately tries to keep her patients safe from a plague of random, mysterious attacks.

title: Legal Eagles
synopsis: A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

title: The Signal
synopsis: A horror film told in three parts, from three perspectives, in which a mysterious transmission that turns people into killers invades every cell phone, radio, and television.

title: Blood and Wine
synopsis: A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

title: Boh lei chun
synopsis: A romantic girl travels to Hong Kong in search of certain love but instead meets a kind-hearted professional fighter for whom she begins to fall instead.

title: The Corruptor
synopsis: With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.

title: Mr. Baseball
synopsis: Jack Elliot, once a great baseball player, is forced to play in Japan where his brash, egotistical ways cause friction with his new teammates and friends.

title: For a Good Time, Call...
synopsis: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.

title: Organize Isler: Sazan Sarmali
synopsis: Asim Noyan swindles people with his lies and games. Asim Noyan and his gang, who no one else has been able to catch, gets into a ruse again.

title: Kites
synopsis: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.

title: Violet & Daisy
synopsis: Two teenage assassins accept what they think will be a quick-and-easy job, until an unexpected target throws them off their plan.

title: Parallels
synopsis: A mysterious building is the gateway to infinite parallel Earths.

title: Mine 9
synopsis: Two miles into the earth, nine Appalachian miners struggle to survive after a methane explosion leaves them with one hour of oxygen.

title: 6 Bullets
synopsis: An ex-mercenary known for finding missing children is hired by a mixed martial arts fighter whose daughter has been kidnapped.

title: Heyy Babyy
synopsis: Three bachelors who are compulsive womanizers find their lives turned upside down when a baby is left at their doorstep. The trio suspect each other of being the father.

title: Franklyn
synopsis: A portrait of the broken lives of four people (a vigilante detective, a worried parent, an awkward man looking for love and a suicidal artist) as they all struggle to cope in their religiously-dystopian city.

title: Hak hap
synopsis: A survivor of a supersoldier project must fight his former comrades as a masked hero.

title: Anatomie
synopsis: A cute med student starts a summer course at Heidelberg University. David's on her dissection table. She met him the day before on the train. Something's wrong.

title: The I Inside
synopsis: An amnesiac discovers himself leaping through time between 2000 and 2002 as his past returns to him.

title: Blind Dating
synopsis: A blind young man (Pine) thinks he finds love with an Indian woman (Jay), though their relationship is fraught with cultural differences.

title: Astérix et les Vikings
synopsis: The vikings come to Gaul and kidnap the chief's nephew. The chief sends Asterix and Obelix up north to get him back but the nephew has fallen in love with the viking chief's daughter v.v. What to do?

title: 2 Days in New York
synopsis: Manhattan couple Marion and Mingus, who each have children from prior relationships, find their comfortable family dynamic jostled by a visit from Marion's relatives.

title: Azizler
synopsis: The story of Aziz through an existential crisis longing for his youth: he is not happy with his work nor his private life, which is hijacked by his sister and her family, who have been living with him for some time now.

title: Casshern
synopsis: Live-action sci-fi movie based on a 1973 Japanese animé of the same name (Shinzo Ningen Casshân). Theme song by Utada Hikaru.

title: I Sell the Dead
synopsis: A grave robber reflects on his life of crime.

title: Freaky Deaky
synopsis: Set in 1974, a pair of '60s radicals rely on their bomb-making skills on their way to becoming capitalists.

title: Love Hostel
synopsis: Set against the pulsating backdrop of rustic North India, Love Hostel traces the volatile journey of a spirited young couple, being hunted by a ruthless mercenary.

title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
synopsis: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to be married. When she visits Delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka Ghagra, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree Delhiite, and falls in love with him.

title: MSG: The Messenger of God
synopsis: Guru Ji is a social reformer who works to help people fight against social evils.

title: Ladies vs. Ricky Bahl
synopsis: A smooth and charming conman, Ricky Bahl, cons girls for a living but finally meets his match is this fun-filled "ROM-CON."

title: Vesper
synopsis: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

title: Father of the Bride
synopsis: A father's coming to grips with his daughter's upcoming wedding through the prism of multiple relationships within a big, sprawling Cuban-American clan.

title: Night Hunter
synopsis: A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a troubled, recently-arrested man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

title: The Vanishing
synopsis: Three lighthouse keepers on the remote Flannan Isles find a hidden trunk of gold, leading to their mysterious disappearance.

title: Waiting for the Barbarians
synopsis: At an isolated frontier outpost, a colonial magistrate suffers a crisis of conscience when an army colonel arrives looking to interrogate the locals about an impending uprising, using cruel tactics that horrify the magistrate.

title: The Borrowers
synopsis: A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

title: Hardware
synopsis: The head of a cyborg reactivates, rebuilds itself, and goes on a violent rampage in a space marine's girlfriend's apartment.

title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
synopsis: A young girl's love for a tiny puppy named Clifford makes the dog grow to an enormous size.

title: The Wraith
synopsis: In a small town in Arizona, a mysterious man/spirit descends from the sky and manifests in a sports car and targets a local violent road-racing gang of motor heads, headed by a ruthless bully who'll do anything to get what he wants.

title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
synopsis: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.

title: Against All Odds
synopsis: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

title: Spree
synopsis: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

title: All the Right Moves
synopsis: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.

title: Becky
synopsis: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

title: Piranha
synopsis: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

title: It Takes Two
synopsis: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
synopsis: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.

title: Sirens
synopsis: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
synopsis: Janey is new in town and soon meets Lynne, who shares her passion for dancing in general and "Dance TV" in particular.

title: Grind
synopsis: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

title: Beyond the Black Rainbow
synopsis: Despite being under heavy sedation, a young woman tries to make her way out of the Arboria Institute, a secluded, quasifuturistic commune.

title: Freaks of Nature
synopsis: In the town of Dillford, humans, vampires and zombies were all living in peace - until the alien apocalypse arrived. Now three teenagers - one human, one vampire, and one zombie - have to team up to figure out how to get rid of the visitors.

title: The Funhouse
synopsis: Four teenagers visit a local carnival for a night of innocent amusement, but soon discover that nothing there is innocent or amusing.

title: She's Having a Baby
synopsis: Young newlyweds find out just how unprepared they are for their future together.

title: February
synopsis: Two girls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break.

title: Traffik
synopsis: A couple off for a romantic weekend in the mountains are accosted by a biker gang. Alone in the mountains, Brea and John must defend themselves against the gang, who will stop at nothing to protect their secrets.

title: Mary Magdalene
synopsis: Twelve men heard and spread the message of Jesus. Only one woman understood it.

title: The Stuff
synopsis: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

title: The Prowler
synopsis: An unknown killer, clad in World War II U.S. Army fatigues, stalks a small New Jersey town bent on reliving a 35 year-old double murder by focusing on a group of college kids holding an annual graduation dance.

title: No One Lives
synopsis: A gang of ruthless highway killers kidnap a wealthy couple traveling cross country only to shockingly discover that things are not what they seem.

title: Encounter
synopsis: Two brothers embark on a journey with their father, who is trying to protect them from an alien threat.

title: Earthquake
synopsis: Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles, California.

title: Wasp Network
synopsis: The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.

title: The Woman in Red
synopsis: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte, an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her, but what would his wife say?

title: The Presidio
synopsis: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

title: Marked for Death
synopsis: A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.

title: Game of Death
synopsis: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

title: Barbershop: The Next Cut
synopsis: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much needed change to their neighborhood.

title: Final Analysis
synopsis: A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.

title: Earthquake Bird
synopsis: An enigmatic translator with a dark past is brought in for questioning after an ex-pat friend, who came between her and her photographer boyfriend, ends up missing and presumed dead.

title: A Fall from Grace
synopsis: Disheartened since her ex-husband's affair, Grace Waters feels restored by a new romance. But when secrets erode her short-lived joy, Grace's vulnerable side turns violent.

title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
synopsis: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow, and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing humans, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, searching for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.

title: Waiting to Exhale
synopsis: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

title: Special Correspondents
synopsis: A radio journalist and his technician get in over their heads when they hatch a scheme to fake their own kidnapping during a rebel uprising in South America and hide out in New York instead.

title: Death Wish II
synopsis: Architect Paul Kersey once again becomes a vigilante when he tries to find the five street punks who murdered his daughter and housekeeper, this time on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

title: Nancy Drew
synopsis: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

title: Holy Smoke
synopsis: Ruth's been brainwashed by a guru in Delhi, India. Her parents in Sydney hire a specialist in reversing this. Ruth is tricked to return to Australia and is isolated in an outback cabin with the specialist. It gets messy.

title: Rust Creek
synopsis: An overachieving college student gets lost on her way to a job interview. A wrong turn leaves her stranded deep in the Kentucky forest.

title: Jumpin' Jack Flash
synopsis: An American computer wiz who works at a New York bank is suddenly thrust into the world of international espionage after she inadvertently receives a coded message from a British spy.

title: Fright Night Part 2
synopsis: Charley Brewster and Peter Vincent must face more vampires, out for revenge.

title: Pawn Shop Chronicles
synopsis: An anthology of stories involving meth addicted white supremacists, a man looking for his kidnapped wife and an Elvis impersonator.

title: 200 Cigarettes
synopsis: A collection of twentysomethings try to cope with relationships, loneliness, desire and their individual neuroses.

title: Tôkyô zankoku keisatsu
synopsis: In future Tokyo, a young woman in the privatized police force tracks down her father's killer while battling against mutant rebels known as engineers.

title: American Outlaws
synopsis: 5 Southern friends return home when the war ends 1865. But Yankee soldiers and Pinkerton are busy helping a railroad baron grab land from farmers along the planned railroad west. The 5 friends fight back.

title: Grand Piano
synopsis: A pianist with stage fright endures a performance under the eyes of a mysterious sniper, who will shoot and kill him if a wrong note is played.

title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
synopsis: When Dusty learns that his engine is damaged and he may never race again, he joins a forest fire and rescue unit to be trained as a firefighter, or else his air strip will be shut down.

title: Why Did I Get Married?
synopsis: The big-screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

title: Tian jiang xiong shi
synopsis: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

title: The Rugrats Movie
synopsis: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

title: Batman and Harley Quinn
synopsis: Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.

title: Return of the Living Dead III
synopsis: Having recently witnessed the horrific results of a top secret project to bring the dead back to life, a distraught youth performs the operation on his girlfriend after she's killed in a motorcycle accident.

title: Harriet the Spy
synopsis: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when her friends find her secret notebook, the tables are turned on her. Can she win them back and still keep on going with the spy business?

title: Vice Versa
synopsis: A divorced executive named Marshall and his 11-year-old son, Charlie, casually touch a magical Tibetan skull, releasing a mysterious power that transfers Marshall's mind to Charlie's body and vice versa. Their problems have just begun.

title: The Road to Wellville
synopsis: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.

title: Canadian Bacon
synopsis: The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

title: Very Good Girls
synopsis: Two New York City girls make a pact to lose their virginity during their first summer out of high school. When they both fall for the same street artist, the friends find their connection tested for the first time.

title: Blind Date
synopsis: A workaholic needs a date for a dinner with new important clientele, but who his brother sets him up with could lead to disaster.

title: Sex and Death 101
synopsis: A guy's life is turned around by an e-mail that includes the names of everyone he's had sex with--and ever will have sex with. His situation gets worse when he encounters a femme fatale (Ryder) who targets men guilty of sex crime.

title: Entebbe
synopsis: Inspired by the true events of the 1976 hijacking of an Air France flight en route from Tel Aviv to Paris, and the most daring rescue mission ever attempted.

title: Southbound
synopsis: Five interlocking tales of terror follow the fates of a group of weary travellers who confront their worst nightmares - and darkest secrets - over one long night on a desolate stretch of desert highway.

title: The Children
synopsis: A relaxing Christmas vacation turns into a terrifying fight for survival as the children begin to turn on their parents.

title: My Life in Ruins
synopsis: A disgruntled tour guide in Greece gains an unexpected new outlook on life thanks to one of the people on what she intends to be her last tour.

title: This Island Earth
synopsis: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

title: G.B.F.
synopsis: What happens after Tanner is outed by his classmates and becomes the title "gay best friend" for three high school queen bees?

title: Who's Harry Crumb?
synopsis: Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.

title: True Memoirs of an International Assassin
synopsis: After a publisher changes a writer's debut novel about a deadly assassin from fiction to non-fiction, the author finds himself thrust into the world of his lead character, and must take on the role of his character for his own survival.

title: Gossip
synopsis: Three college students base their class project around gossip and how fast it spreads, which soon spirals out of control.

title: Jane Got a Gun
synopsis: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

title: The Distinguished Gentleman
synopsis: A conman discovers during a "job" that US Congress is where the money is. "Name recognition" gets him elected. Will he develop a conscience?

title: Street Trash
synopsis: A liquor store owner sells alcoholic beverages to homeless people, unaware of what the bottles actually contain: toxic brew.

title: Kiss of Death
synopsis: A reformed convict goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to ensnare a psychotic mobster.

title: Man Down
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic America, former U.S. Marine Gabriel Drummer searches desperately for the whereabouts of his son, accompanied by his best friend and a survivor.

title: Igor
synopsis: Animated fable about a cliché hunchbacked evil scientist's assistant who aspires to become a scientist himself, much to the displeasure of the rest of the evil science community.

title: Henry's Crime
synopsis: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.

title: Just Wright
synopsis: A physical therapist falls for the basketball player she is helping recover from a career-threatening injury.

title: Robinson Crusoe
synopsis: 1703: Robinson Crusoe has to leave Scotland for a year, but after months sailing, a storm wrecks his ship. He ends up as only survivor on a desolate island.

title: We Are What We Are
synopsis: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

title: Chi-Raq
synopsis: A modern day adaptation of the ancient Greek play Lysistrata by Aristophanes, set against the backdrop of gang violence in Chicago, Illinois.

title: Wiener-Dog
synopsis: A dachshund passes from oddball owner to oddball owner, whose radically dysfunctional lives are all impacted by the pooch.

title: Backtrack
synopsis: A psychotherapist has nightmares and sinister visions. Ghosts? Is it more than his daughter's death causing this? He returns to his childhood home and dad to put things to rest.

title: Hyde Park on Hudson
synopsis: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret "Daisy" Suckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.

title: iBoy
synopsis: After being shot, Tom awakens from a coma to discover that fragments of his smartphone have been embedded in his head--and worse, that returning to normal teenage life is impossible because he has developed a strange set of superpowers.

title: Kuffs
synopsis: George Kuffs, 21, leaves a pregnant girlfriend. He visits his brother Brad to bum money off him. Brad's shot and George IDs the killer at SFPD but to no avail. He inherits Brad's patrol district. He keeps it to get the killer.

title: Dèmoni 2... l'incubo ritorna
synopsis: A group of tenants and visitors are trapped in a 10-story high-rise apartment building infested with demons who proceed to hunt the dwindling humans down.

title: Life Stinks
synopsis: A filthy rich businessman bets a corporate rival that he can live on the streets of L.A. without the comforts of home or money, which proves to be tougher than he thought.

title: The Story of Us
synopsis: Ben and Katie Jordan are a married couple who go through hard times in fifteen years of marriage.

title: Billy Bathgate
synopsis: In the year 1935, a teen named Billy Bathgate finds first love while becoming the protégé of fledgling gangster Dutch Schultz.

title: Phantom
synopsis: The haunted Captain of a Soviet submarine holds the fate of the world in his hands. Forced to leave his family behind, he is charged with leading a covert mission cloaked in mystery.

title: Welcome to Me
synopsis: When Alice Klieg wins the Mega-Millions lottery, she immediately quits her psychiatric meds and buys her own talk show.

title: Immortel (ad vitam)
synopsis: In the distant future, Earth is occupied by ancient gods and genetically altered humans. When a god is sentenced to death he seeks a new human host and a woman to bear his child.

title: Haunter
synopsis: A teenager is stuck in a time loop that is not quite the same each time. She must uncover the truth but her actions have consequences for herself and others.

title: Cockneys vs Zombies
synopsis: A gang of bank robbers fight their way out of a zombie-infested London.

title: Deathwatch
synopsis: In the middle of World War I, nine British soldiers caught behind enemy lines seek refuge in a complex network of German trenches. What they soon discover is that they aren't alone - and it isn't a German soldier that's hunting them down.

title: Trapped in Paradise
synopsis: Residents of a friendly Pennsylvania town foil three brothers' plan to rob a bank on Christmas Eve.

title: Lucky You
synopsis: A hotshot poker player tries to win a tournament in Vegas, but is fighting a losing battle with his personal problems.

title: At First Sight
synopsis: A blind man has an operation to regain his sight at the urging of his girlfriend and must deal with the changes to his life.

title: The Babe
synopsis: Babe Ruth becomes a baseball legend but is unheroic to those who know him.

title: Waiting for Forever
synopsis: A Hollywood-set romantic tale of a guy who is content to live his life without a job yet with the love of his life, a young actress.

title: Hell
synopsis: In the not too distant future, people struggle to survive their greatest enemy, the sun.

title: Kataude mashin gâru
synopsis: Maimed while seeking revenge, a girl becomes stronger than ever.

title: La horde
synopsis: An end of the world battle between gangsters, cops and zombies.

title: Fack ju Göhte 2
synopsis: Mr. Müller and his class are taking a school trip to Thailand to strengthen the reputation of their school.

title: Then She Found Me
synopsis: April, 39, wants a baby but her husband leaves her. When her adoptive mother dies, she's contacted by her bio mom, a TV talk show host. April starts seeing the divorced dad of one of her students at school.

title: The Night Listener
synopsis: In the midst of his crumbling relationship, a radio show host begins speaking to his biggest fan, a young boy, via the telephone. But when questions about the boy's identity come up, the host's life is thrown into chaos.

title: Jing cha gu shi 2013
synopsis: A man looking for the release of a long-time prisoner takes a police officer, his daughter, and a group of strangers hostage.

title: Ringu 2
synopsis: Reiko takes Yôichi into hiding when her son begins to display frightening powers. Meanwhile, Mai Takano and the authorities begin a desperate search for them, as the mysterious Ring curse spreads.

title: Les rivières pourpres 2 - Les anges de l'apocalypse
synopsis: Pierre Niemans faces the threat of the apocalypse while investigating a series of ritual murders.

title: The Darwin Awards
synopsis: To investigate bizarre insurance claims that transpired in either accidents, death or both, a former cop and an insurance investigator travel throughout the country to look at the cases up close.

title: Columbus Circle
synopsis: An heiress who's been shut inside her apartment building for nearly two decades is forced to confront her fears after one of her neighbors is killed and a detective arrives to begin the investigation.

title: Heartless
synopsis: Jamie Morgan, a young man with a large heart-shaped birthmark on his face, discovers that there are demons on the streets of East London.

title: Turnabout
synopsis: A troubled man survives a suicide attempt. He calls an old friend to rescue him in the middle of the night. Their journey is just beginning, and by daybreak, a tragedy will surface.

title: The Contractor
synopsis: A discharged U.S. Special Forces sergeant, James Harper, risks everything for his family when he joins a private contracting organization.

title: The Little Hours
synopsis: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation.

title: Career Opportunities
synopsis: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

title: Zardoz
synopsis: In the late 23rd century, a savage trained only to kill finds a way into the community of bored immortals that alone preserves humanity's achievements.

title: Look Away
synopsis: Maria, an alienated high-school student, has her life turned upside down when she switches places with her sinister mirror image.

title: Till Death
synopsis: A woman is left handcuffed to her dead husband as part of a sick revenge plot. Unable to unshackle, she has to survive as two killers arrive to finish her off.

title: The Lie
synopsis: A father and daughter are on their way to dance camp when they spot the girl's best friend on the side of the road. When they stop to offer the friend a ride, their good intentions soon result in terrible consequences.

title: Leviathan
synopsis: Perched on the hull of a wrecked Soviet freighter, a team of deep-sea miners led by head oceanographer Steven Beck comes face to face with a mutant creature that's the product of a failed genetic experiment.

title: Romeo & Juliet
synopsis: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

title: Son in Law
synopsis: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

title: Blame It on Rio
synopsis: Best friends and their daughters vacation in Rio de Janeiro only for one to fall for the other's daughter.

title: The Crush
synopsis: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

title: The Wretched
synopsis: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parents' imminent divorce, faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.

title: Into the Forest
synopsis: After a massive power outage, two sisters learn to survive on their own in their isolated woodland home.

title: All Eyez on Me
synopsis: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

title: The Getaway
synopsis: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

title: St. Trinian's
synopsis: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

title: Final Score
synopsis: After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her and prevent mass destruction.

title: Bad News Bears
synopsis: A grizzled little league coach tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.

title: 1BR
synopsis: Sarah tries to start anew in LA, but her neighbours are not what they seem.

title: Silent Night, Deadly Night
synopsis: Little Billy witnesses his parents getting killed by Santa after being warned by his senile grandpa that Santa punishes those who are naughty. Now Billy is 18 and out of the orphanage, and he has just become Santa himself.

title: Miss Bala
synopsis: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

title: Troop Beverly Hills
synopsis: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

title: Runaway
synopsis: In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

title: Black Water
synopsis: A terrifying tale of survival in the mangrove swamps of Northern Australia

title: The Toy
synopsis: An underemployed reporter finds himself literally purchased as a toy for a rich spoiled brat.

title: Vox Lux
synopsis: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.

title: 100 Girls
synopsis: Matt spends the night with a girl in an elevator during power outage in a girls' college dorm. He never sees her. Waking up in the morning, panties are all that's left of her. How does he find her in a building with 100 girls?

title: War on Everyone
synopsis: Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.

title: Captain Ron
synopsis: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

title: Airport '77
synopsis: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

title: Curly Sue
synopsis: A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

title: Feuchtgebiete
synopsis: The adventures of an eccentric girl who has strange attitudes towards hygiene and sexuality longs for the reunion of her divorced parents.

title: Wind Chill
synopsis: Two college students share a ride home for the holidays, but when they break down on a deserted stretch of road, they are preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there.

title: Goon: Last of the Enforcers
synopsis: A hockey player plagued by injuries is confronted with the possibility of retirement when a tough new player challenges his status as the league's top enforcer.

title: Let It Snow
synopsis: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

title: Wishmaster
synopsis: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

title: Life of Crime
synopsis: Two common criminals get more than they bargained for after kidnapping the wife of a corrupt real-estate developer who shows no interest in paying the $1 million dollar ransom for her safe return.

title: All the Pretty Horses
synopsis: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

title: The Reef
synopsis: A great white shark hunts the crew of a capsized sailboat along the Great Barrier Reef.

title: Death Wish 3
synopsis: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods.

title: 24 Hours to Live
synopsis: An assassin seeks redemption after being given a second chance at life.

title: Kin
synopsis: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, an ex-con and his adopted teenage brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

title: Mine
synopsis: After a failed assassination attempt, a United States Marine finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical tolls of the treacherous conditions.

title: The Chase
synopsis: Escaped convict Jack Hammond takes a woman hostage and sets off for the Mexican border with the police hot on his tail.

title: A Very Brady Sequel
synopsis: The Bradys are surprised when a man claiming to be Carol's long lost first husband shows up at their home. Before long, his strange actions cause them to question his motives.

title: Next of Kin
synopsis: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

title: Beowulf & Grendel
synopsis: In Denmark, during the 6th century, Danish king Hrothgar and his warriors kill a troll whose son, Grendel, vows revenge.

title: The Duel
synopsis: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.

title: Terror Train
synopsis: Three years after a prank went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train.

title: Baskin
synopsis: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.

title: Extinction
synopsis: And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now.

title: The Last Five Years
synopsis: A struggling actress and her novelist lover each illustrate the struggle and deconstruction of their love affair.

title: Last Shift
synopsis: A rookie cop's 1st shift alone in the last night of a closing police station turns into a living nightmare.

title: Smiley Face
synopsis: After a young actress unknowingly eats her roommate's marijuana cupcakes, her day becomes a series of misadventures.

title: Mad Money
synopsis: Three female employees of the Federal Reserve plot to steal money that is about to be destroyed.

title: Wonder Park
synopsis: The imagination of a wildly creative girl comes alive in an amusement park.

4 girls out on a 3 days trip in to 2 cities, if they survive. While Jo is working in a supermarket, her 3 friends are all out on their adventures. A chance encounter with diamond thieves sends them on a collision course with fate itself.

title: And So It Goes
synopsis: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

title: Amelia
synopsis: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

title: I Still See You
synopsis: Set ten years after an apocalyptic event that killed millions and left the world inhabited by ghosts.

title: Rampart
synopsis: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

title: Return to Never Land
synopsis: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

title: The Tunnel
synopsis: An investigation into a government cover-up leads to a network of abandoned train tunnels deep beneath the heart of Sydney. As a journalist and her crew hunt for the story it quickly becomes clear the story is hunting them.

title: Free Birds
synopsis: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.

title: Honeymoon in Vegas
synopsis: Jack loses $65,000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding will have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?

title: Pimp
synopsis: An urban love story set on the hard streets of the Bronx. A struggling female Pimp, named Wednesday, grows up learning the game from her dad. Once he's gone she's left to look out for her prostitute mother and girlfriend Nikki.

title: Absentia
synopsis: A woman and her sister begin to link a mysterious tunnel to a series of disappearances, including that of her own husband.

title: A Christmas Prince
synopsis: When a reporter goes undercover as a tutor to get the inside scoop on a playboy prince, she gets tangled in some royal intrigue and ends up finding love - but will she be able to keep up her lie?

title: Murder Party
synopsis: A random invitation to a Halloween party leads a man into the hands of a rogue collective intent on murdering him for the sake of their art, sparking a bloodbath of mishap, mayhem and hilarity.

title: Bounce
synopsis: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

title: For Richer or Poorer
synopsis: An unhappily married Manhattan socialite couple flee from the I.R.S. and end up in Amish country where they pretend to be visiting relatives.

title: Sgt. Bilko
synopsis: Sgt. Bilko is a well-liked conman in charge of the army base's motor pool, developing a hover tank and unofficially of gambling etc. One man hates Bilko and he's coming to inspect the base for possible closure.

title: All About the Benjamins
synopsis: Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their women join.

title: The Seventh Sign
synopsis: Abby Quinn is eagerly awaiting childbirth but is haunted by dreams where she suffers a miscarriage. When she decides to rent a room to a mysterious stranger, she realizes a chain of events that will unleash the end of humanity.

title: Starship Troopers: Invasion
synopsis: A black op has gone terribly wrong. Now, Captain Carmen Ibanez and a hardcore trooper famed as Major Henry "Hero" Varro must lead a team of battle-weary troopers to find the missing ship and discover what went wrong.

title: Laws of Attraction
synopsis: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.

title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
synopsis: This story explores love - the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us and the exhilarating and often terrifying ride it takes us on. It is the journey of two characters, Alizeh and Ayan, as they navigate life, love and heartbreak.

title: The Forger
synopsis: A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.

title: Management
synopsis: A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.

title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
synopsis: Remake of the 1956 film noir film "Beyond a Reasonable Doubt" in which a writer's plan to expose a corrupt district attorney takes an unexpected turn.

title: Dak mo mai sing
synopsis: At a Hong Kong shopping center, Buck Yuen's (Jackie Chan's) intuition warns him. He saves a robbery's loot and gets on television, ends up in Istanbul via South Korea, and accidentally becomes a spy. Fortunately, he knows Kung Fu.

title: A Christmas Horror Story
synopsis: Interwoven stories that take place on Christmas Eve, as told by one festive radio host: A family brings home more than a Christmas tree, a student documentary becomes a living nightmare, a Christmas spirit terrorizes, Santa slays evil.

title: Mary Reilly
synopsis: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

title: Waist Deep
synopsis: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.

title: Gekijô-ban poketto monsutâ: Kesshô-tô no teiô
synopsis: In the town of Greenfield, a young, lonely girl's dreams and wishes are brought into reality by a collective of reality-warping Pokémon.

title: F/X2
synopsis: A special effects man helps his girlfriend's ex, a cop, with a sting operation, where the ex gets killed. Something's off and he investigates with help from an ex-cop PI friend.

title: Beyond Re-Animator
synopsis: After 13 years in prison, the mad scientist from Re-Animator (1985) gets a new chance to experiment with the arrival of a young prison doctor, who secretly hopes to learn to reanimate dead people. Good intentions turn to horror.

title: The Oranges
synopsis: The enduring friendship between the Walling and Ostroff families is tested when Nina, the prodigal Ostroff daughter, returns home for the holidays after a five-year absence and enters into an affair with David, head of the Walling family.

title: Annapolis
synopsis: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

title: Outpost
synopsis: In war-torn Eastern Europe, a mysterious businessman hires a group of mercenaries on a routine mission to protect him not knowing of the long-hidden secret that lies there.

title: Retreat
synopsis: Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.

title: Silk
synopsis: The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town's supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes obsessed with the concubine of a local baron.

title: Kill Me Three Times
synopsis: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.

title: Song One
synopsis: A young woman strikes up a relationship with her ailing brother's favorite musician.

title: A California Christmas
synopsis: With his carefree lifestyle on the line, a wealthy charmer poses as a ranch hand to get a hardworking farmer to sell her family's land before Christmas.

title: Operation Christmas Drop
synopsis: Congressional aide Erica forgoes family Christmas to travel at her boss's behest. At a beach side Air Force base, she clashes with Capt. Andrew Jantz, who knows her assignment is finding reasons to defund the facility.

title: Ginger Snaps Back: The Beginning
synopsis: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves.

title: Suspect Zero
synopsis: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers, and one F.B.I. Agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

title: Let Us Prey
synopsis: Held in a remote police station, a mysterious stranger takes over the minds and souls of everyone inside.

title: Death Defying Acts
synopsis: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini (Guy Pearce) enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con him.

title: Dance of the Dead
synopsis: On the night of the big High-School Prom, the dead rise to eat the living, and the only people who can stop them are the losers who couldn't get dates to the dance.

title: Joshua
synopsis: The arrival of a newborn girl causes the gradual disintegration of the Cairn family; particularly for 9-year-old Joshua (Kogan), an eccentric boy whose proper upbringing and refined tastes both take a sinister turn.

title: The Death and Life of Bobby Z
synopsis: A DEA agent provides former Marine Tim Kearney with a way out of his prison sentence: impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord.

title: Novocaine
synopsis: A dentist finds himself a murder suspect after a sexy patient seduces him and steals all of the drugs from his practice.

title: RRRrrrr!!!
synopsis: A tribe of prehistoric people is puzzled - a murder has happened. The first ever one.

title: StreetDance 3D
synopsis: In order to win the Street Dance Championships, a dance crew is forced to work with ballet dancers from the Royal Dance School in exchange for rehearsal space.

title: The Canal
synopsis: A film archivist finds his sanity crumbling after he is given an old 16mm film reel with footage from a horrific murder that occurred in the early 1900's.

title: The Clearing
synopsis: As an executive is held captive by a former employee, it's up to his wife to deliver the ransom.

title: A Fantastic Fear of Everything
synopsis: A crime novelist whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck must confront his worst fears when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.

title: Wilson
synopsis: A lonely, neurotic, and hilariously honest middle-aged man reunites with his estranged wife, and meets his teenage daughter for the first time.

title: Hurlyburly
synopsis: Hollywood movers and shakers dissect their own personal lives when everything seems to clash together.

title: L'empire des loups
synopsis: A disgraced policeman helps a young detective to hunt down a serial killer who targets Turkish women in Paris.

title: Rowdy Rathore
synopsis: A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the small-town locals and the little girl who insists she's his daughter, from the mob.

title: Partner
synopsis: A 'Love Guru' assists other males, woos a widowed single mother, but becomes embroiled in controversies.

title: Jagame Thandhiram
synopsis: A nomadic gangster finds himself caught between good and evil in a fight for a place to call home. Starring Dhanush, Aishwarya Lekshmi and James Cosmo.

title: Interview with a Hitman
synopsis: An elite hitman returns to erase his past only to find that somebody has messed with his future.

title: Khatta Meetha
synopsis: A seemingly corrupt petty contractor faces challenges from the local municipality, his family, his employees, as well as a former girlfriend and her family.

title: Bairavaa
synopsis: Bairavaa, a gallant debt collector, takes on a violent criminal masquerading as a philanthropist in the education field.

title: Antiviral
synopsis: In a blackly satirical near future, a thriving industry sells celebrity illnesses to their obsessed fans. Employee Syd March's attempts to exploit the system backfire when they involve him in a potentially deadly mystery.

title: Windfall
synopsis: A man breaks into a tech billionaire's empty vacation home, but things go sideways when the arrogant mogul and his wife arrive for a last-minute getaway.

title: Silent Night
synopsis: Nell, Simon, and their son Art are ready to welcome friends and family for what promises to be a perfect Christmas gathering. Perfect except for one thing: everyone is going to die.

title: Studio 666
synopsis: Legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album.

title: Svart krabba
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, six soldiers on a covert mission must transport a mysterious package across a frozen archipelago. Noomi Rapace stars.

title: Night Teeth
synopsis: A college student moonlighting as a chauffeur picks up two mysterious women for a night of party-hopping across LA. But when he uncovers their bloodthirsty intentions - and their dangerous, shadowy underworld - he must fight to stay alive.

title: Wild Mountain Thyme
synopsis: A pair of star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute.
A man's life is derailed when an ominous pattern of events repeats itself in exactly the same manner every day, ending at precisely 2:22 p.m.

title: The Postcard Killings
synopsis: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

title: Savage Grace
synopsis: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...

title: An American Pickle
synopsis: An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.

title: Queen of the Desert
synopsis: A chronicle of Gertrude Bell's life, a traveler, writer, archaeologist, explorer, cartographer, and political attaché for the British Empire at the dawn of the twentieth century.

title: The Sleepover
synopsis: When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

title: Almost Heroes
synopsis: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.

title: The Keep
synopsis: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

title: Come Play
synopsis: A monster named Larry manifests itself through smart phones and mobile devices. Feature film version of the 2017 short film.

title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
synopsis: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.

title: Hour of Lead
synopsis: A husband and wife will stop at nothing to find their missing daughter, who disappeared on a family camping trip. When the police don't have any leads, the duo takes over.

title: Drowning Mona
synopsis: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.

title: Little Italy
synopsis: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

title: Afternoon Delight
synopsis: Rachel tries to spice up her marriage with a trip to a strip club. She befriends McKenna who gave her a lapdance. She moves in with Rachel's family and becomes a nanny for the son.

title: Flowers in the Attic
synopsis: Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.

title: I Think We're Alone Now
synopsis: The apocalypse proves a blessing in disguise for one lucky recluse -- until a second survivor arrives with the threat of companionship.

title: A Classic Horror Story
synopsis: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.

title: White Girl
synopsis: Summer, New York City. A college girl falls hard for a guy she just met. After a night of partying goes wrong, she goes to wild extremes to get him back.

title: Acts of Vengeance
synopsis: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

title: Nowhere to Run
synopsis: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

title: Sugar & Spice
synopsis: A popular high-school cheerleader becomes pregnant by the star quarterback and turns to crime to support her desired lifestyle.

title: Get Over It
synopsis: A high school senior's girlfriend breaks up with him. His friends try to make him think of something else. His friend's sister Kelly helps him with the school musical. Spending time with Kelly has an effect.

title: Reasonable Doubt
synopsis: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.

title: Strange Magic
synopsis: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

title: Blue Steel
synopsis: A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.

title: SpaceCamp
synopsis: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

title: Armed and Dangerous
synopsis: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

title: Drive Me Crazy
synopsis: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?

title: Cuttputlli
synopsis: When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.

title: Security
synopsis: A security guard protects an eleven year-old girl who is being targeted by a gang for participating as a trial witness.

title: Texas Killing Fields
synopsis: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

title: Death Warrant
synopsis: In a violent and corrupt prison, decorated cop Louis Burke must infiltrate the jail to find answers to a number of inside murders. What he finds is a struggle of life and death tied in to his own past.

title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
synopsis: The owner of an historic South Side Chicago barbershop is pressured to sell out to a land developer, but must face the impact this would have on his close-knit community.

title: The Banger Sisters
synopsis: Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after twenty years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.

title: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard
synopsis: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.

title: Uncle Drew
synopsis: An anti-ageist comedy about a man's dream to win the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem.

title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
synopsis: An alien touring the galaxy breaks away from her group and meets two young inhabitants of the most dangerous place in the universe: the London borough of Croydon.

title: Point Blank
synopsis: An ER nurse and a career criminal are forced into an unlikely partnership in taking down a ring of corrupt cops threatening the lives of both their families.

title: The Domestics
synopsis: In the weeks following an apocalyptic event, a husband and wife venture across the countryside inhabited by deadly factions in search of safety, and must work together as they are pushed to the breaking point in order to survive.

title: Return of the Living Dead: Part II
synopsis: Curious kids unearth the barrels that previously helped revive the dead, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
synopsis: A legendary American war veteran is recruited to hunt a mythical creature.

title: Lost River
synopsis: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.

title: Kill Command
synopsis: Set in a near future, technology-reliant society that pits man against killing machines.

title: In the Blood
synopsis: When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.

title: Rules Don't Apply
synopsis: The unconventional love story of an aspiring actress, her ambitious driver, and their eccentric boss, the legendary billionaire Howard Hughes.

title: The Little Vampire
synopsis: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

title: Sea Fever
synopsis: The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

title: Pet
synopsis: A man bumps into an old crush and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.

title: Diario de una ninfómana
synopsis: A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.

title: Clown
synopsis: A loving father finds a clown suit for his son's birthday party, only to realize that it's cursed.

title: Angel Eyes
synopsis: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

title: Little Evil
synopsis: Gary, who has just married Samantha, the woman of his dreams, discovers that her six-year-old son may be the Antichrist.

title: El practicante
synopsis: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.

title: The Flock
synopsis: A hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl whom he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

title: Orca
synopsis: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

title: Think Like a Man Too
synopsis: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

title: The Hallow
synopsis: A family who moved into a remote mill house in Ireland finds themselves in a fight for survival with demonic creatures living in the woods.

title: Airport 1975
synopsis: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

title: Kaboom
synopsis: A sexually "undeclared" college freshman's clairvoyant/prophetic dreams are the first sign that something very strange is going on involving his classmates -- with him at the center.

title: Stitches
synopsis: A clown comes back from the dead to haunt those who took his life during a fatal party mishap.

title: Blue Mountain State: The Rise of Thadland
synopsis: When the Dean of Blue Mountain State threatens to sell the Goat House, Alex throws Thad the party of his dreams in an effort to get him to buy it.

title: Earth to Echo
synopsis: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

title: The Love Punch
synopsis: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

title: Office Uprising
synopsis: An employee at a weapons factory discovers that an energy drink turns his co-workers into zombies.

title: The Gingerbread Man
synopsis: A lawyer uses his power to help his lover put her father behind bars, but when he escapes, they are all in danger.

title: Last Days
synopsis: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent of those of Kurt Cobain.

title: In Darkness
synopsis: A blind musician hears a murder committed in the apartment upstairs from hers that sends her down a dark path into London's gritty criminal underworld.

title: The Hole
synopsis: A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.

title: Jumping the Broom
synopsis: Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.

title: Shut In
synopsis: Anna suffers from agoraphobia so crippling that when a trio of criminals break into her house, she cannot bring herself to flee. But what the intruders don't realize is that agoraphobia is not her only problem.

title: Paparazzi
synopsis: A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.

title: Love Potion No. 9
synopsis: Two scientists who are hopeless with the opposite sex experiment with a substance that makes them irresistible to anyone who hears them speak.

title: The English Teacher
synopsis: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.

title: The Preacher's Wife
synopsis: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

title: We Are Still Here
synopsis: In the cold, wintery fields of New England, a lonely old house wakes up every thirty years - and demands a sacrifice.

title: Son of God
synopsis: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

title: Futureworld
synopsis: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

title: Something to Talk About
synopsis: A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.

title: Grace of Monaco
synopsis: The story of former Hollywood star Grace Kelly's crisis of marriage and identity, during a political dispute between Monaco's Prince Rainier III and France's Charles De Gaulle, and a looming French invasion of Monaco in the early 1960s.

title: Some Kind of Beautiful
synopsis: A drama about a Cambridge poetry professor who begins to re-evaluate his life of Byronic excess.

title: Vampires vs. the Bronx
synopsis: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

title: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn
synopsis: A perpetually angry man is informed he has 90 minutes to live and promptly sets out to reconcile with his family and friends in the short time he has left.

title: Premature
synopsis: A high school senior has to re-live losing his virginity over and over again until he gets it right, with the right girl.

title: The Juror
synopsis: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

title: The Man with One Red Shoe
synopsis: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.

title: Echelon Conspiracy
synopsis: At first, the strange phone messages promised great wealth. Soon, though, government agents pursue the young engineer receiving them around the world.

title: The In-Laws
synopsis: Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.

title: Girl Most Likely
synopsis: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.

title: Ernest Scared Stupid
synopsis: Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

title: King Kong vs. Godzilla
