synopsis: A UN reporter broadcasts a report on the appearance of a prehistoric monster that emerges from hibernation while a pharmaceutical company seeks publicity with a monster of their own. (US Version)

title: Cadillac Man
synopsis: Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.

title: Just Visiting
synopsis: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?

title: Family Business
synopsis: An ex professor offers Adam $1,000,000 to "get" some plasma from a high tech company's lab. Adam asks his criminal grandpa for help. Can they convince Adam's now honest dad to join?

title: Christmas Inheritance
synopsis: To be the CEO, an heiress is challenged by her dad to deliver a Christmas letter in person to his ex-partner in their hometown - traveling by bus, incognito and with only $100. Will she learn something from the people there?

title: The Million Dollar Hotel
synopsis: Tragi-comic, romantic whodunnit set in a run down hotel which plays host to mentally ill people too poor to afford medical insurance.

title: The Pact
synopsis: As a woman struggles to come to grips with her past in the wake of her mother's death and the disappearance of her sister, an unsettling presence emerges in her childhood home.

title: The Factory
synopsis: An obsessed cop is on the trail of a serial killer prowling the streets of Buffalo, N.Y. but when his teenage daughter disappears, he drops any professional restraint to get the killer.

title: The Lady of Heaven
synopsis: Two stories separated by 1400 years. After losing his mother in the midst of a war-torn country, an Iraqi child, learns the importance and power of patience by discovering the historical story of Lady Fatima and her suffering.

title: A Single Shot
synopsis: The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.

title: The Possession of Michael King
synopsis: After poor advice from a psychic leads to the death of his wife, a man vows to disprove the existence of the paranormal by allowing himself to be possessed by demons.

title: Desi Boyz
synopsis: Two friends lose their jobs, then part bitterly after they get exposed as male strippers.

title: Next Day Air
synopsis: Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes 10 people's lives forever.

title: Bait
synopsis: An ex-con is used by police to lure a criminal out of hiding.

title: Faces in the Crowd
synopsis: A horror-thriller centered on a woman living with "face-blindness" after surviving a serial killer's attack. As she lives with her condition, one in which facial features change each time she loses sight of them, the killer closes in.

title: Ernest Saves Christmas
synopsis: Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.

title: Transit
synopsis: A gang of bank robbers hide their loot in the car of a family going camping. They chase down the family to kill them and get the loot back, but run into a fight.

title: The Big Bull
synopsis: The story of the film is based on real events of financial market that took place between 1990 and 2000 involving Harshad Mehta and his financial crimes.

title: The Muse
synopsis: With his career on the skids, a Hollywood screenwriter enlists the aid of a modern-day muse, who proves to test his patience.

title: Outlaw
synopsis: A group of people who feel betrayed by their government and let down by their Police force form a modern-day outlaw posse in order to right what they see as the wrongs of society.

title: White Noise 2: The Light
synopsis: Following the loss of his family, a man attempts suicide only to discover upon waking that he can identify people who are about to die

title: Until Death
synopsis: Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin, and everyone dislikes him. Because of an accident he is put into a coma, and comes out of it a better person. He wakes up wanting to put things right.

title: Singh Is Kinng
synopsis: A comic caper about Happy Singh, a Punjabi villager who goes through a series of misadventures and eventually becomes the King of the Australian underworld.

title: The Holiday Calendar
synopsis: A struggling but talented photographer inherits an antique holiday advent calendar, the contents of which seem to predict the future. Will this magical calendar lead her to love this holiday season?

title: New York'ta Bes Minare
synopsis: In Istanbul, terrorists abduct executives, blow-up the car of a journalist and plan five great attacks to the city. The violent police officer Firat Baran interrogates a terrorist and ... See full summary »

title: You People
synopsis: Follows a new couple and their families, who find themselves examining modern love and family dynamics amidst clashing cultures, societal expectations and generational differences.

title: Disenchanted
synopsis: Fifteen years after her happily ever after, Giselle questions her happiness, inadvertently turning the lives of those in the real world and Andalasia upside down in the process.

title: Last Seen Alive
synopsis: Will's soon-to-be ex-wife mysteriously vanishes at a gas station. He delves into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time to find her.

title: Goodnight Mommy
synopsis: Twin brothers arrive at their mother's house and begin to suspect that something isn't right. Remake of the 2014 Austrian film.

title: Kevin & Perry Go Large
synopsis: Two inseparable, hormonal, English BFF teen boys, avoided by all others, head to Ibiza with Kevin's parents. Will they lose their virginity there?

title: The Princess
synopsis: When a strong-willed princess refuses to wed the cruel sociopath, she is kidnapped and locked in a remote tower of her father’s castle. With her vindictive suitor intent on taking her father’s throne, the princess must save the kingdom.

title: Life After Beth
synopsis: A young man's recently deceased girlfriend mysteriously returns from the dead, but he slowly realizes she is not the way he remembered her.

title: The Package
synopsis: When a group of teenage friends go on a spring break camping trip, an unfortunate accident sets off a race against time to save their friend's most prized possession.

title: The Babysitters
synopsis: A teenager turns her babysitting service into a call-girl service for married guys after fooling around with one of her customers.

title: Thank God
synopsis: An egoistic real estate broker in huge debts, meets with an accident.God appears in front of him and informs him that he will have to play a "GAME OF LIFE". If he win, he will be sent back to earth and if not, he will be sent to hell.

title: Song to Song
synopsis: Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.

title: Dahmer
synopsis: Biopic about notorious American serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, taking place in both the past and the present.

title: The Night Clerk
synopsis: A voyeuristic hotel clerk becomes the subject of a murder investigation.

title: New in Town
synopsis: A Miami, Florida businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a small Minnesota town.

title: Disturbing Behavior
synopsis: The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

title: The War with Grandpa
synopsis: Upset that he has to share the room he loves with his grandfather, Peter decides to declare war in an attempt to get it back.

title: Beauty Shop
synopsis: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

title: Good on Paper
synopsis: After years of putting her career first, a stand-up comic meets a guy who seems perfect: smart, nice, successful and possibly too good to be true.

title: The Slumber Party Massacre
synopsis: A female high school student's slumber party turns into a bloodbath, as a newly escaped psychotic serial killer wielding a power drill prowls her neighborhood.

title: Billionaire Boys Club
synopsis: A group of wealthy boys in Los Angeles during the early 1980s establish a 'get-rich-quick' scam that turns deadly.

title: Spinning Man
synopsis: A happily married professor, known for having many affairs with students, becomes the prime suspect when a young woman has gone missing.

title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
synopsis: 65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the so-called "moonlight murders" begin again. Is it a copycat or something even more sinister? A lonely high school girl may be the key to catching him.

title: The Intruder
synopsis: A young married couple buy a beautiful house on several acres of land, only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

title: Bang Bang
synopsis: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

title: Monster Trucks
synopsis: A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

title: Dread
synopsis: Three college students set out to document what other people dread the most. However, one of the three turns out to secretly be a sadistic psychopath who uses this knowledge to gruesomely torture the subjects.

title: The Lifeguard
synopsis: A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.

title: She-Devil
synopsis: A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

title: The Delta Force
synopsis: After a plane is hijacked by terrorists, The Delta Force is sent in to resolve the crisis.

title: The Punisher
synopsis: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

title: Chopping Mall
synopsis: A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree.

title: Ghosts of War
synopsis: Five American soldiers assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II. This unexpected respite quickly descends into madness when they encounter a supernatural enemy more terrifying than anything seen on the battlefield.

title: Stalingrad
synopsis: A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

title: The Ice Pirates
synopsis: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.

title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
synopsis: Two young friends find a magic book that brings a ventriloquist's dummy to life.

title: No Retreat No Surrender
synopsis: Jason, a Bruce Lee fan, sees his karate instructor/dad beaten by martial art thugs. They move to Seattle where, after humiliations, he trains with Bruce Lee's ghost so he can defend himself and others against thugs.

title: C.H.U.D.
synopsis: A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

title: The Kitchen
synopsis: The wives of New York gangsters in Hell's Kitchen in the 1970s continue to operate their husbands' rackets after they're locked up in prison.

title: The Hole in the Ground
synopsis: A single mother living in the Irish countryside with her son begins to suspect he may not be her son at all, and fears his increasingly disturbing behavior is linked to a mysterious sinkhole in the forest behind their house.

title: Milk Money
synopsis: A group of young boys befriend a prostitute named, V.

title: Falling Inn Love
synopsis: When city girl Gabriela spontaneously enters a contest and wins a rustic New Zealand inn, she teams up with bighearted contractor Jake Taylor to fix and flip it.

title: Triple Threat
synopsis: When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her.

title: Begotten
synopsis: Presented in a surreal, gory and entirely visual manner, Begotten tells of the death of religion, the abuse of nature by Man and a nihilistic outlook on what life ultimately is.

title: Drop Zone
synopsis: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

title: Prityazhenie
synopsis: An alien ship crash lands onto a Russian city, many who saw it and the occupants start to question their own existence, while there are those who demand the aliens leave Earth.

title: No Good Deed
synopsis: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

title: Jue di tao wang
synopsis: A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle against a notorious Chinese criminal.

title: Love Guaranteed
synopsis: To save her small law firm, earnest lawyer Susan takes a high-paying case from Nick, a charming new client who wants to sue a dating website that guarantees love. But as the case heats up, so do Susan and Nick's feelings for each other.

title: Batman Ninja
synopsis: Batman, along with a number of his allies and adversaries, finds himself transplanted from modern Gotham City to feudal Japan.

title: The Promotion
synopsis: Two assistant managers of a corporate grocery store vie for a coveted promotion.

title: After the Dark
synopsis: At an international school in Jakarta, a philosophy teacher challenges his class of twenty graduating seniors to choose which ten of them would take shelter underground and reboot the human race in the event of a nuclear apocalypse.

title: Atlas Shrugged: Part I
synopsis: Railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.

title: Twelve
synopsis: A young drug dealer watches as his high-rolling life is dismantled in the wake of his cousin's murder, which sees his best friend arrested for the crime.

title: The Green Berets
synopsis: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

title: The Perfect Guy
synopsis: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a professional woman gets involved with a man who seems almost too good to be true.

title: They Came Together
synopsis: Molly owns a quaint little sweet shop. Joel works for a gigantic candy company threatening to shut her down. How they meet, fall in love, break up and get back together is hilariously recounted in this rom-com spoof.

title: Dark Was the Night
synopsis: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighboring woods.

title: Jenny's Wedding
synopsis: Jenny's parents and siblings are always trying to set her up with a man when she visits them. What they don't know is that she's already met the right person, her "roommate" Kitty, 5 years ago and she wants to marry her and start a family.

title: The Butterfly Effect 3: Revelations
synopsis: Sam Reide uses his power to time travel to solve the mystery of his girlfriend's death.

title: Collide
synopsis: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Cologne high-speed Autobahn.

title: Unicorn Store
synopsis: Kit, a twenty-something dreamer, receives an invitation that would fulfill her childhood dreams.

title: Imagine That
synopsis: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.

title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
synopsis: Eliza (Lacey Chabert) and Debbie (Danielle Harris) are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals.

title: A Guy Thing
synopsis: A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.

title: A Case of You
synopsis: A young writer tries to impress a girl he meets online with an embellished profile, but he finds himself in a real mess when she falls for him and he has to keep up the act.

title: Detention
synopsis: As a copycat killer named after movie villain Cinderhella stalks the student body at Grizzly Lake High School, a group of co-eds band together to survive while serving detention.

title: Beyond the Reach
synopsis: In the Mojave Desert, a naked and unarmed hunting guide runs from a wealthy hunter who wants to ensure his silence in the death of an old man.

title: Chapter 27
synopsis: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.

title: The Woods
synopsis: Set in 1965 New England, a troubled girl encounters mysterious happenings in the woods surrounding an isolated girls school that she was sent to by her disinterested parents.

title: Borderland
synopsis: On a trip to a Mexican border town, three college friends stumble upon a human-sacrifice cult.

title: The Numbers Station
synopsis: A disgraced black ops agent is dispatched to a remote CIA broadcast station to protect a code operator. Soon, they find themselves in a life-or-death struggle to stop a deadly plot before it's too late.

title: Los amantes pasajeros
synopsis: When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.

title: The Knight Before Christmas
synopsis: A medieval English knight is magically transported to present-day America where he falls for a high school science teacher who is disillusioned by love.

title: Home of the Brave
synopsis: Three soldiers struggle to readjust to life at home after returning home from a lengthy tour in Iraq.

title: Tracers
synopsis: Wanted by the Chinese mafia, a New York City bike messenger escapes into the world of parkour after meeting a beautiful stranger.

title: Mohenjo Daro
synopsis: In 2016 BC, a kind farmer leads an uprising in the city of Mohenjo Daro.

title: Dead Birds
synopsis: A group of Confederate soldiers hole up in an abandoned plantation after robbing a bank and find themselves at the mercy of supernatural forces.

title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
synopsis: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

title: Another Stakeout
synopsis: Two immature detectives are joined by a pesky assistant district attorney in staking out a lakeside home where a Mafia trial witness is believed to be heading.

title: The Pleasure of Your Company
synopsis: A guy proposes to his girlfriend, who drops dead. His BFF tries to get him to date other women but he only talks about his dead big love. At a diner he proposes to a cute waitress just to get his BFF off his back. She says yes.

title: A.C.O.D.
synopsis: A grown man caught in the crossfire of his parents' 15-year divorce discovers he was unknowingly part of a study on divorced children and is enlisted in a follow-up years later, which wreaks new havoc on his family.

title: Mr. 3000
synopsis: Aging baseball star who goes by the nickname, Mr. 3000, finds out many years after retirement that he didn't quite reach 3,000 hits. Now at age 47 he's back to try and reach that goal.

title: Kurtlar Vadisi: Irak
synopsis: The film covers through fiction real-life events like the occupation of Iraq, the execution of Daniel Pearl, the Hood event and the Abu Ghraib torture scandal.

title: A Few Best Men
synopsis: A groom and his three best men travel to the Australian outback for a wedding.

title: The Samaritan
synopsis: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.

title: The Killing Room
synopsis: Four individuals sign up for a psychological research study only to discover that they are now subjects of a brutal, classified government program.

title: Syrup
synopsis: A slacker hatches a million-dollar idea. But, in order to see it through, he has to learn to trust his attractive corporate counterpart. Based on Max Barry's novel.

title: Altered
synopsis: Fifteen years ago, a group of men's lives were forever changed by a strange occurrence. Now, the same group of men will spend a night together ... in terror.

title: Sarkaru Vaari Paata
synopsis: After being conned by the woman he loves, a finance agent arrives in India from USA to retrieve his money from the woman's father, a powerful MP and an industrialist.

title: Ali Baba ve 7 Cüceler
synopsis: Ali and Ilber, the two partners of Senay Cüccaciye, sell garden dwarfs. When their company starts to dwindle, they decide to participate in a gardening fair in Sofia with the plan to meet ... See full summary »

title: Shotgun Wedding
synopsis: Darcy and Tom gather their families for the ultimate destination wedding but when the entire wedding party is taken hostage the bride and groom must save their loved ones--if they don't kill each other first.

title: Inheritance
synopsis: The patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy the family.

title: Below Her Mouth
synopsis: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

title: King of Thieves
synopsis: A true crime movie about a crew of retired crooks who pull off a major heist in London's jewelry district. What starts off as their last criminal hurrah, quickly turns into a brutal nightmare due to greed.

title: The Beach Bum
synopsis: A rebellious stoner named Moondog lives life by his own rules.

title: Little
synopsis: A woman is transformed into her younger self at a point in her life when the pressures of adulthood become too much to bear.

title: Havoc
synopsis: Two affluent suburban girls clash with the Latino gang culture of East Los Angeles.

title: Once Bitten
synopsis: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

title: The Wiz
synopsis: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

title: Iron Eagle
synopsis: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

title: Mom and Dad
synopsis: A teenage girl and her younger brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origin causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

title: Wine Country
synopsis: During a vacation to Napa Valley, a group of long time friends reunite and revisit past choices in this hilarious and heartfelt comedy from director Amy Poehler.

title: Love Wedding Repeat
synopsis: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl who got away in alternate versions of the same day.

title: Josie and the Pussycats
synopsis: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.

title: Marauders
synopsis: When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

title: Hick
synopsis: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.

title: Home Sweet Hell
synopsis: Don Champagne seems to have it all, but when his wife, Mona, learns of his affair with a pretty new salesgirl, she will stop at nothing to maintain their storybook life.

title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
synopsis: A thirty-something former child star hires a foster family to re-create the childhood he never had.

title: Breaking In
synopsis: A woman fights to protect her family during a home invasion.

title: Cherry 2000
synopsis: In 2017, a successful businessman travels to the ends of the earth to find that the perfect woman is always under his nose. He hires a sexy renegade tracker to find an exact duplicate of his android wife.

title: The Big Green
synopsis: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texas school, where she coaches the students in soccer, improving their self-esteem and leading to unexpected success.

title: Picture Perfect
synopsis: A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.

title: My Father the Hero

title: Red Dot

title: Horsemen
synopsis: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

title: The Girlfriend Experience
synopsis: A drama set in the days leading up to the 2008 Presidential election, and centered on a high-end Manhattan call girl meeting the challenges of her boyfriend, her clients, and her work.

title: Maximum Risk

title: Sleepaway Camp II: Unhappy Campers
synopsis: Angela, supposedly reformed and living under an assumed surname, is working at a summer camp. However, when the campers start misbehaving, she soon reverts to her old ways.

title: The Last Summer
synopsis: Standing on the precipice of adulthood, a group of friends navigate new relationships, while reexamining others, during their final summer before college.

title: Critters 2

title: A Castle for Christmas

title: Amityville II: The Possession
synopsis: A dysfunctional family moves into a new house, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

title: Diana
synopsis: During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.

title: Tom and Huck
synopsis: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

title: Action Jackson
synopsis: Vengeance drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power-hungry auto magnate who is systematically eliminating his competition.

title: Joe's Apartment
synopsis: A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

title: Father Figures

title: 6 Years
synopsis: A young couple, bound by a seemingly ideal love, begin to unravel as unexpected opportunities spin them down a volatile and violent path and threaten the future they had always imagined.

title: Hell Fest

title: Deadgirl

title: The Accidental Husband
synopsis: When talk-radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.

title: Knights of Badassdom
synopsis: Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.

title: Whatever It Takes
synopsis: A modern-day remake of the Cyrano DeBergerac tale.

title: Renegades
synopsis: A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake.

title: Shocker
synopsis: After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

title: Valiant

title: Navy Seals
synopsis: A battle-hardened SEAL Team set off on a mission to destroy a shipment of US-built Stinger missiles that have fallen into terrorist hands.

title: Unplanned

title: Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins

title: Joe Somebody
synopsis: When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.

title: Open Season 2

title: Wildling
synopsis: A blossoming teenager uncovers the dark secret behind her traumatic childhood.

title: I Think I Love My Wife
synopsis: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.

title: The Final Conflict
synopsis: The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.

title: Head of State
synopsis: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.

title: I.T.
synopsis: A millionaire has his life turned upside down after firing his I.T. consultant.

title: Ratchet & Clank
synopsis: When the galaxy comes under the threat of a nefarious space captain, a mechanic and his newfound robot ally join an elite squad of combatants to save the universe.

title: The Little Stranger
synopsis: After a doctor is called to visit a crumbling manor, strange things begin to occur.

title: Jane Austen's Mafia!
synopsis: Takeoff on the Godfather with the son of a mafia king taking over for his dying father

title: Ninja
synopsis: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

title: Don't Hang Up
synopsis: An evening of drunken prank calls becomes a nightmare for two teenagers when a stranger turns their own game against them, with deadly consequences.

title: Terminal Velocity
synopsis: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

title: Momentum
synopsis: Four criminals steal diamonds from a safe-deposit box in Cape Town00including a drive containing a US senator's evil plans. He'll do anything to get it back from Alexis Olga Kurylenko.

title: The Out-of-Towners
synopsis: The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of married couple Henry and Nancy Clark as they are vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.

title: Casa de mi Padre
synopsis: Scheming to save their father's ranch, the Alvarez brothers find themselves in a war with Mexico's most feared drug lord.

title: Tales of Halloween
synopsis: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.

title: In Dreams
synopsis: A suburban housewife learns that she has a dreamworld connection to a serial murderer, and must stop him from killing again.

title: Legionnaire
synopsis: Alain is a boxer in 1925 Marseille, France. When he doesn't take the dive paid to take by a mob boss, he has to split. He joins the Foreign Legion and is sent to Morocco. He makes 3 friends and they watch each other's backs.

title: Gabriel
synopsis: Gabriel the archangel fights to bring light back to purgatory - a place where darkness rules - and save the souls of the city's inhabitants.

title: Rock the Kasbah
synopsis: A down-on-his-luck music manager discovers a teenage girl with an extraordinary voice while on a music tour in Afghanistan and takes her to Kabul to compete on the popular television show, Afghan Star.

title: War, Inc.

title: City Heat

title: High School High

title: Good People
synopsis: Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it.

title: 100 Feet

title: The Great White Hype
synopsis: The boxing champ's promoter thinks, change is needed. He finds the one man who's beaten his black champ (at 17), a white man now in a rock band. Like Rocky, he trains heavily whereas the champ slacks.

title: Play It to the Bone
synopsis: Two best friends and former middleweight contenders travel to Las Vegas to fight each other for the first time.

title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
synopsis: A college student faces an impossible journey when he is left stranded in the desert, thousands of miles from home, with no money and only a few days left until Christmas.

title: Housefull
synopsis: Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.

title: The Shrine
synopsis: Two female journalists and a photographer travel to Europe to investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, only to find themselves embroiled in a struggle against a kind of evil they never expected.

title: My Little Eye
synopsis: Five people are offered one million dollars to spend six months together in an isolated mansion, with cameras watching their every move.

title: American Dreamz
synopsis: The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal (Moore) and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County (Golzari). Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

title: Alex & Emma
synopsis: A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.

title: 5 Days of War
synopsis: A drama set centered around the war between Russia and Georgia, and focused on an American journalist, his cameraman, and a Georgian native who become caught in the crossfire.

title: Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
synopsis: Naomi and Ely have loved each other their whole lives, even though Ely isn't exactly into girls. The institution of a "No Kiss List" has prevented the two from rifts in the past, but bonds are tested when they both fall for the same guy.

title: Simmba
synopsis: Simmba, a Corrupt Officer, enjoys all the perks of being an immoral and unethical police officer until a life-changing event forces him to choose the righteous path.

title: The Abandoned
synopsis: An adopted woman returns to her home country and the family home that she never knew and must face the mystery that lies there.

title: The Deaths of Ian Stone
synopsis: An all-American guy is murdered each day by horrifying pursuers, only to wake up in slightly different lives to experience the terror of being murdered again.

title: You Should Have Left
synopsis: A former banker, his actress wife, and their spirited daughter book a vacation at an isolated modern home in the Welsh countryside where nothing is quite as it seems.

title: A través de mi ventana
synopsis: Raquel's longtime crush on her next-door neighbor turns into something more when he starts developing feelings for her, despite his family's objections.

title: Tides
synopsis: Set in the distant future, a female astronaut, shipwrecked on the long-decimated Earth, must decide the fate of the wasteland's remaining populace.

title: Voyagers
synopsis: A crew of astronauts on a multi-generational mission descend into paranoia and madness, not knowing what is real or not.

title: Love in the Villa
synopsis: A young woman takes a trip to romantic Verona, Italy, after a breakup, only to find that the villa she reserved was double-booked, and she'll have to share her vacation with a cynical British man.

title: Gold
synopsis: In the not too distant future, a drifter travelling through the desert discovers the largest gold nugget ever found. He must guard it from thieves amid harsh conditions and wild dogs while waiting for his partner to return.

title: The Deep House
synopsis: A young and modern couple who go to France to explore an underwater house and share their findings on social media undergoes a serious change of plans when the couple enters the interior of... See full summary »

title: Earth Girls Are Easy
synopsis: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

title: Poison Ivy
synopsis: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

title: In the Cut
synopsis: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

title: The Addams Family 2
synopsis: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters. Sequel to the 2019 animated film, 'The Addams Family'.

title: The Rhythm Section
synopsis: A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.

title: Fatale
synopsis: After a one-night stand, a successful married man finds himself entangled in a cunning police detective's latest investigation.

title: Killing Me Softly
synopsis: A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.

title: Superintelligence
synopsis: When an all-powerful Superintelligence chooses to study average Carol Peters, the fate of the world hangs in the balance. As the A.I. decides to enslave, save or destroy humanity, it's up to Carol to prove that people are worth saving.

title: Phantoms
synopsis: In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.

title: 3 from Hell
synopsis: After barely surviving prison, the demented Firefly clan go on the run, unleashing a whole new wave of murder, madness and mayhem.

title: Barely Lethal
synopsis: A teenage special ops agent coveting a "normal" adolescence fakes her own death and enrolls in a suburban high school. She quickly learns that surviving the treacherous waters of high school is more challenging than international espionage.

title: Aliens in the Attic
synopsis: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

title: The Monster
synopsis: A mother and daughter must confront a terrifying monster when they break down on a deserted road.

title: Naked
synopsis: Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

title: The Glimmer Man
synopsis: Two cops are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man".

title: Meander
synopsis: A woman finds herself locked in a series of strange tunnels full of deadly traps.

title: Freejack
synopsis: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

title: Man of the House
synopsis: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

title: Follow Me
synopsis: A social media personality travels with his friends to Moscow to capture new content for his successful VLOG. Always pushing the limits and catering to a growing audience, they enter a cold world of mystery, excess, and danger.

title: Ladybugs
synopsis: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

title: American Ninja
synopsis: American soldier, obviously very skilled in martial arts, single-handedly takes on mercenaries in the Philippines.

title: Home on the Range
synopsis: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

title: Howl
synopsis: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.

title: Northmen - A Viking Saga
synopsis: A band of Vikings cross enemy lines and a panicked race begins. The losers will pay with their lives.

title: Bullet Head
synopsis: Three career criminals find themselves trapped in a warehouse with the law closing in and an even worse threat waiting inside - a nigh unstoppable killer dog.

title: All I See Is You
synopsis: A blind woman's relationship with her husband changes when she regains her sight and discovers disturbing details about themselves.

title: Bel Ami
synopsis: A chronicle of a young man's rise to power in Paris via his manipulation of the city's wealthiest and most influential women.

title: Ernest Goes to Camp
synopsis: Ernest, a lovable loser who works as a summer camp handyman and dreams of becoming a guidance councilor, must find a way to inspire a group of juvenile delinquents as well as stop a shady strip mining company from closing the camp.

title: Boys and Girls
synopsis: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

title: The Trust
synopsis: A pair of cops investigating a drug invasion stumble upon a mysterious bank vault.

title: Burying the Ex
synopsis: A guy's regrets over moving in with his girlfriend are compounded when she dies and comes back as a zombie.

title: The Longest Week
synopsis: Conrad (Jason Bateman) is helped by his old friend Dylan (Billy Crudup) and returns the favor by falling for Dylan's girlfriend Beatrice (Olivia Wilde).

title: I Am Wrath
synopsis: Stanley Hill opens a can of brutal vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops who are protecting them.

title: Down to Earth
synopsis: After dying before his time, an aspiring black comic gets a second shot at life - by being placed in the body of a wealthy white businessman.

title: House II: The Second Story
synopsis: The new owner of a sinister house gets involved with reanimated corpses and demons searching for an ancient Aztec skull with magic powers.

title: Hotel for Dogs
synopsis: Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.

title: Diabolique
synopsis: The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

title: Sorority Boys
synopsis: Strapped for cash, three fraternity playboys make one last attempt to live the high life - cheaply - by masquerading as girls. But their chauvinistic ways come back to haunt them as they get a crash course in the opposite sex.

title: Missing in Action

title: Hush
synopsis: Newlyweds move to the family thoroughbred horse ranch, where the husband's obsessive mother resolves to get rid of her new daughter-in-law.

title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
synopsis: After attracting both media and police attention for accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the River Thames, Edina and Patsy hide out in the south of France.

title: Head Over Heels
synopsis: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.

title: Undead
synopsis: A quaint Australian fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the ravenous undead, leaving a small group of those unharmed to find a way out.

title: Psycho III
synopsis: Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "Mother" is still watching.

title: Invasion U.S.A.
synopsis: A one-man army comes to the rescue of the United States when a spy attempts an invasion.

title: Jessabelle
synopsis: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, Jessabelle comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return -- and has no intention of letting her escape.

title: Mixed Nuts
synopsis: The events focus around a crisis hotline business on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays.

title: Mars Needs Moms
synopsis: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.

title: Fun Size
synopsis: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out he's missing.

title: Hatchet II
synopsis: Marybeth escapes the clutches of the bayou-butcher Victor Crowley and returns to the swamp with an army of hunters and gunmen, determined to end Crowley's reign of horror once and for all.

title: Darkness
synopsis: A teenage girl moves into a remote country house with her family, only to discover that their gloomy new home has a horrifying past that threatens to destroy the family.

title: Killerman
synopsis: Two NYC money launderers make a quick drug deal. Things go wrong, as dirty cops are involved. One of the friends gets amnesia during their escape with the drugs and money.

title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
synopsis: A high school janitor has not recovered from his failed career as a tennis pro. He begins coaching his beloved sport to a group of misfits and leads them to the Nebraska State Championships.

title: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
synopsis: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
synopsis: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

title: Prom
synopsis: A group of teenagers get ready for their high school prom.

title: The Princess Switch: Switched Again
synopsis: When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne to Montenaro and hits a rough patch with Kevin, it's up to her double Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike, party girl Fiona foils their plans.

title: Cocoon: The Return
synopsis: The seniors return to Earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on Earth?

title: Bordello of Blood
synopsis: The Crypt Keeper returns to tell the story of a funeral parlor that moonlights as a vampire bordello.

title: Fear and Desire
synopsis: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

title: Bad Ass
synopsis: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

title: Fast Track
synopsis: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job.

title: Synchronicity
synopsis: A physicist who invents a time machine must travel back to the past to uncover the truth about his creation and the woman who is trying to steal it.

title: The Hills Run Red

title: The Other Man

title: Banshee Chapter

title: King Ralph

title: Emelie
synopsis: A couple's replacement babysitter turns out to be more than they bargained for when she subjects their kids to a series of twisted activities.

title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?

title: Intruders

title: Feeling Minnesota
synopsis: An ex-convict and his bumbling crook brother fight for the same woman.

title: Nine Dead

title: People I Know

title: The Broken
synopsis: After seeing herself drive down the street, Radiologist Gina McVey unravels a mystery centered around a broken mirror.

title: (T)Raumschiff Surprise - Periode 1
synopsis: Three hundred years in the future, Mars is colonized by humans and their leader Regulator Rogul plans to conquer Earth. Queen Königin Metapha is advised to send the gays Captain Kork, the ... See full summary »

title: The Invitation
synopsis: A young woman is courted and swept off her feet, only to realize a gothic conspiracy is afoot.

synopsis: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

title: Beyond Skyline

title: Sleepwalkers

title: Overdrive

title: Misconduct

title: By the Sea

title: Air Bud

title: The Scarlet Letter

title: Serving Sara

title: Hagane no renkinjutsushi

title: Tom and Jerry: The Movie

title: Flipper

title: Astérix & Obélix: Au service de sa Majesté

title: Ready to Rumble

title: Nine Lives

title: Incarnate

title: A-X-L

title: Contracted

title: Town Creek

title: Welcome to Mooseport

title: The Final

title: The New Daughter

title: Unaccompanied Minors

title: 2001 Maniacs

title: Woman on Top

title: I Love Trouble

title: Replicant

title: The Brothers Solomon

title: The Super

title: The Dark
synopsis: In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.

title: House of 9

title: Edison
synopsis: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.

title: Visions

title: Race 2

title: Wrecked

title: Krrish 3

title: Celtic Pride

title: A Christmas Prince: The Royal Wedding

title: Romance

title: Wolf

title: Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin
synopsis: Margot, a young woman who was abandoned by her mother as a baby, travels to a secluded Amish community with a documentary film crew seeking answers about her mother and extended family.

title: Tall Girl

title: SAS: Red Notice

title: Ibiza
synopsis: A young American woman and her two best friends seek out a hot DJ in Spain.

title: Ram Setu

title: Empire State

title: Emmanuelle
synopsis: The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.

title: Locked Down
synopsis: A couple attempts a high-risk, high-stakes jewelry heist at a department store.

title: Superstar
synopsis: A nerdy Catholic schoolgirl, Mary Katherine Gallagher, dreams of superstardom.

title: Bad Girls

title: Desperados

title: Kadaver

title: Paradise Hills

title: Bait

title: Sandy Wexler

title: Catch That Kid
synopsis: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

title: Silent House

title: Inconceivable

title: Prêt-à-Porter

title: Simply Irresistible

title: We Summon the Darkness

title: Hangman

title: Strange Wilderness

title: Open Water 2: Adrift

title: Madea's Family Reunion

title: Father of the Year

title: King Solomon's Mines
synopsis: Fortune hunter Allan Quatermain teams up with a resourceful woman to help her find her missing father lost in the wilds of 1900s Africa while being pursued by hostile tribes and a rival German explorer.

title: Pootie Tang
synopsis: "The Man" is baffled by a chill hero's invincible weapon: gibberish.

title: Sherlock Gnomes
synopsis: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo (James McAvoy) and Juliet (Emily Blunt), recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes (Johnny Depp) to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

title: Cherry Falls

title: Dominion: Prequel to the Exorcist

title: Smokey and the Bandit II
synopsis: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.

title: The Ladies Man
synopsis: The Saturday Night Live (1975) character gets a big screen treatment.

title: Clockstoppers
synopsis: A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.

title: Rapture-Palooza
synopsis: Two teens battle their way through a religious apocalypse on a mission to defeat the Antichrist.

title: Voice from the Stone
synopsis: Set in 1950s Tuscany, Voice from the Stone is the haunting and suspenseful story of Verena, a solemn nurse drawn to aid a young boy who has fallen silent since the sudden passing of his mother.

title: First Kid

title: Bushwick

title: Walking with Dinosaurs 3D

title: Vamps

title: Racing Stripes

title: The Thaw

title: Pay the Ghost

title: See You Yesterday

title: The Late Bloomer

title: Student of the Year
synopsis: Several alumni reminisce about their final year at St. Theresa's College and the events that shaped their lives.

title: Fathers' Day
synopsis: A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father.

title: The Bag Man

title: My Mom's New Boyfriend

title: Blueberry

title: Quarantine 2: Terminal
synopsis: A plane is taken over by a mysterious virus. When the plane lands it is placed under quarantine. Now a group of survivors must band together to survive the quarantine.

title: Donkey Punch
synopsis: Things go drastically wrong for a group of British holidaymakers in Spain.

title: Over Her Dead Body

title: Riding the Bullet
synopsis: When a man finds out his mother is dying and tries to hitchhike his way to the hospital, he is picked up by a stranger with a deadly secret.

title: Arthur et la vengeance de Maltazard
synopsis: Arthur answers a distress call from Princess Selenia, who is menaced by the nefarious Maltazard.

title: Blood: The Last Vampire
synopsis: A vampire named Saya, who is part of covert government agency that hunts and destroys demons in a post-WWII Japan, is inserted in a military school to discover which one of her classmates is a demon in disguise.

title: Candyman: Farewell to the Flesh
synopsis: The Candyman arrives in New Orleans and sets his sights on a young woman whose family was ruined by the immortal killer years before.

title: The Day
synopsis: A group of five people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack.

title: Eddie
synopsis: Coincidences lead to the New York Knicks, getting its loudest fan, Edwina "Eddie" Franklin, as coach. Season victory?

title: Vivegam

title: Return to the Blue Lagoon

title: Snow Day

title: The Unholy

title: Cannibal ferox
synopsis: Three friends set out to disprove cannibalism on a trip to the Amazonian jungle, where they meet two men trying to escape a vicious cannibal tribe.

title: Gong fu yu jia
synopsis: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

Five carnival workers are kidnapped and held hostage in an abandoned, hellish compound where they are forced to participate in a violent game, the goal of which is to survive twelve hours against a gang of sadistic clowns.

title: Shingeki no kyojin
synopsis: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.

title: Ji qi zhi xue
synopsis: A Special Forces Agent is assigned to protect a scientist and his creation from a sinister gang.

title: Fire Down Below

title: Swimfan

title: Everly

title: The Breed

title: Rebound

title: Willow Creek
synopsis: A man and his girlfriend camp in the woods to capture firsthand evidence of Bigfoot.

title: Open Windows

title: Holidays

title: The D Train

synopsis: A television weatherman scams a local lottery.

title: Freedomland

title: Air

title: The Human Race
synopsis: In THE HUMAN RACE a group of 80 people are ripped out of their daily lives and all re-appear in an undisclosed location. These people are from all walks of life: young and old, athletic and... See full summary »

title: Boss

synopsis: A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player.

title: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
synopsis: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

title: Tamara

While Frankie served time, James worked to turn his life around, got a steady job and began courting his former girlfriend Emily. Now, Frankie is released and back on the streets with no money and no place to go.

title: The Bachelor

title: The Isle

title: Eye of the Beholder

title: Elephant White

title: Saaho

title: Magic Magic
synopsis: A naive young tourist's road trip across Chile with friends turns into a waking nightmare.

title: Not to Forget
synopsis: After a lifetime of scams, a self-centered millennial is condemned to take care of his grandmother.

title: The Last Boy

title: Emergo

title: Downhill

One man's journey to the future to save a dying world.

synopsis: An ambitious married woman's temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness, and forever alters the course of her life.

title: W lesie dzis nie zasnie nikt
synopsis: A group of technology-dependent teenagers goes to offline camp and faces a deadly danger lurking in the woods.

title: Turbulence
synopsis: After a shootout on a flight transporting prisoners, a flight attendant must outwit a smooth-talking serial killer and land the plane herself.

title: The Big Bounce
synopsis: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

title: In the Army Now
synopsis: Two misguided youths join the reserves to make some money for their entrepreneurial dreams. No sooner than they finish basic training are they called up to do their part to save the free world.

title: Welcome to the Jungle
synopsis: A company retreat on a tropical island goes terribly awry.

title: I Don't Know How She Does It
synopsis: A comedy centered on the life of Kate Reddy, a finance executive who is the breadwinner for her husband and two kids.

title: Amusement
synopsis: Three women are stalked by a killer with a grudge that extends back to the girls' childhoods.

title: The Crow: Salvation
synopsis: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

title: Ong-bak 3
synopsis: Continuing from Ong Bak 2's 1440s, Prince Tien fails to revenge his parents' murder by the evil new ruler. The beaten Tien is rescued. Can he bring peace to the kingdom?

synopsis: 10 stories, each inspired by one of the 10 Commandments.

title: Rise

title: Vehicle 19

title: Ratter

title: Holy Man

title: A.I. Rising

title: Blacklight

title: The Tax Collector

title: The Layover

title: Choose or Die

title: There's Someone Inside Your House

title: Supernova

title: Monkeybone
synopsis: In a coma, a cartoonist finds himself trapped within his own underground creation and must find a way to get back, while racing against his popular but treacherous character, Monkeybone.

title: Zombeavers

title: Songbird

title: The Kissing Booth 3

title: About Cherry
synopsis: A troubled young woman moves to San Francisco, where she becomes involved in pornography and aligns herself with a cocaine-addicted lawyer.

title: Primeval

title: Flight 7500

title: The Courier
synopsis: A courier in London discovers that one of the packages she's transporting is a bomb.

title: Problem Child 2

title: Killing Gunther
synopsis: A group of eccentric assassins are fed up with Gunther, the world's greatest hitman, and decide to kill him, but their plan turns into a series of bungled encounters as Gunther seems to always be one step ahead.

title: Tarzan

title: They

title: Love Wrecked

title: Trail of the Pink Panther
synopsis: Journalist Marie Jouvet (Joanna Lumley) attempts to uncover the mysterious disappearance of Chief Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Peter Sellers).

title: Kickboxer: Vengeance
synopsis: A kick boxer is out to avenge his brother.

title: Shut In

title: Aftershock

title: Jeruzalem

title: Survival of the Dead

title: Hanging Up

title: The Vault

title: Weekend at Bernie's II

title: Knock Off
synopsis: A fashion designer must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

title: Gone Fishin'

title: Lost Souls
synopsis: A Catholic teacher meets an atheist journalist, whom a group of Catholics and Priests believes has been chosen by the devil to be the Antichrist.

title: Altitude

title: Dabangg 2

title: Baaghi 2

title: Ready

title: Beta Test

title: The Bubble

title: ATM

title: Boxing Helena

title: After We Fell

title: The Boy Next Door

title: We Can Be Heroes

title: The Poison Rose

title: Staying Alive

title: Capone

title: You Get Me

title: Twixt

title: Gotti

title: Poltergeist III

title: Brahms: The Boy II

title: Occupation: Rainfall

title: Underdog

synopsis: A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.

title: The Musketeer

title: Dr. T & the Women

title: The Crow: City of Angels

title: On Deadly Ground

title: XX

title: Outcast

title: I Am the Pretty Thing That Lives in the House

title: The Craft: Legacy

title: Wild Orchid

title: Setup
synopsis: A group of friends become involved in a potentially deadly diamond heist.

title: Recep Ivedik 2

synopsis: A notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

title: Yoga Hosers

title: A Dark Foe
synopsis: A guilt-ridden FBI agent, stranded in the painful memory of the abduction of his sister, suffers from a rare condition known as Nyctophobia, an irrational fear of the dark, and will have to... See full summary »

title: Brazen
synopsis: When her sister is killed and her double life as a webcam performer is revealed, Grace ignores the warnings of a cool-headed detective and gets involved in the case.

title: Wounds
synopsis: Disturbing and mysterious things begin to happen to a bartender in New Orleans after he picks up a phone left behind at his bar.

title: The Fanatic

title: Zombie Strippers!

title: Beowulf
synopsis: In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.

title: The Patriot

title: Extraction

title: Killers Anonymous

title: Recep Ivedik 3
synopsis: Recep Ivedik has been depressed since the death of his grandmother. Everyone who tries to help him fails. A young girl named Zeynep, who can't find an apartment, stays with Recep. Initially... See full summary »

title: The Apparition
synopsis: A couple is haunted by a supernatural presence that is unleashed during a college experiment.

title: Satyameva Jayate 2
synopsis: Satyameva Jayate 2 revolves around the fight against injustice and misuse of power. From police and politicians to industrialists and a common man, the film will explore corruption in all spheres.

title: Mr. Magoo

title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua

title: Tubelight

title: Material Girls
synopsis: Two wealthy sisters, both heiresses to their family's cosmetics fortune, are given a wake-up call when a scandal and ensuing investigation strip them of their wealth.
After the death of his wife and child, an author travels to Barcelona to see his estranged brother and dying father, where he learns that his life is plagued by events that occur on 11/11/11.
